description.hltext_display: Pak cricketers to miss IPL again following omission from fourth edition auction list
description.content:
Pakistan cricketers continue to miss out on the Indian Premier League (IPL) bonanza, as none of them were included in the auction list for next year's mega event, according to organisers.
No Pakistan player featured in a list of 416 players, whose services will be auctioned in Bangalore on January 8 and 9 for the fourth edition of the tournament, which is to be held in April and May.
An IPL official revealed that the Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) had not forwarded any names for the January auction.
"The rules stipulate that a player must apply through his home board if he wanted to be put up for the auction. No names were received from Pakistan," The Nation quoted the official, as telling a news agency.
It is noteworthy that no Pakistani player was included in the last edition of IPL as well. Pakistani cricketers had taken part in the inaugural IPL in 2008, but were forced out of the 2009 edition due to security concerns in the wake of the Mumbai terror attacks, and were then ignored for the 2010 tournament.
Scheduled to run from April 8 to May 22, the tournament's fourth edition will be the first without the IPL's chief architect, Lalit Modi, who was thrown out by the Indian board over accusations about his conduct.
The Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) has registered a criminal case against Modi for misappropriation of 4.68 billion rupees (106 million dollars), and he also faces a government probe over alleged financial irregularities.

entity.property: Board of Control for Cricket in India

description.hltext_display: Copper Technical Chart Analysis
description.author: Published by: Michael Kahn, Technical Analyst
description.content:
Copper futures closed in record high ground Tuesday after Chile's Collahuasi copper mine, one of the world's largest, said it had halted shipments of copper concentrate. This market has been rallying fairly steadily since June as it gained more than 57%.
Demand from China and other growing economies has been a usual suspect behind the strength in industrial and precious metals. That supplies are in jeopardy only put the icing on the cake in what has been a strong bull market.
But technically, the bulls have run into a ceiling. While the market did indeed close at an all-time high it was a by the smallest of margins. The victory must be put into context.
The chart above shows copper futures back to early 2006. Two major peaks are clear - one in 2006 and one in 2008 - and these peaks are called resistance by technical analysts. The reason is that they have been levels in the past at which supply takes over from demand and "resists" the rally. Prices tend to stall, if not fall quickly, once they reach that level.
Of course, resistance levels are not forever but after such a strong rally into resistance going back four years it is not unreasonable to expect investors to cash in their gains. If the rally is going to stall, this is a good place to do it.
There are no guarantees, of course, but what happens to copper over the next few weeks as it decides if it had had enough or wants to push still higher should determine the market's direction for many months to follow. A breakout above such a major resistance level typically has legs.
Michael Kahn, CMT, writes the twice weekly Getting Technical column for Barron's Online and publishes the daily Quick Takes Pro newsletter. Read his blog at www.QuickTakesPro.com/blog

event_or_fact.property: the twice weekly Getting Technical column for Barron's Online and publishes the daily Quick Takes Pro newsletter

description.hltext_display: Marché de l'Avent : demandez le programme jusqu'à vendredi
description.content:
« Le square Warstein a été rouvert lundi, les gens peuvent s'y balader, mais on a dû démonter la maison du père Noël qui n'a pas résisté à la neige », annonce Alain Caveye, animateur à la Ville. Les exposants sont donc invités à s'installer sous le chapiteau de la place Pompidou, où les animations se déroulent.
Aujourd'hui, dès 15 heures, atelier scrapbooking et atelier compositions florales pour décorer la table.
À 16 h 30, toujours sous le chapiteau, les Étoiles d'or de Valhuon donneront le spectacle de majorettes promis samedi et qui avait dû être reporté à cause de la neige.
À 17 h 30, comme tous les jours, une fenêtre du calendrier de l'Avent géant sera ouverte et un gagnant de la tombola sera tiré au sort.
Vendredi, le final du marché de Noël s'annonce assez spectaculaire. Vers 15 heures, le père Noël effectuera la descente du campanile avant de distribuer des friandises.
Vers 16 heures, le gagnant du super lot de la tombola sera tiré au sort. • PHOTO ARCHIVES « LA VOIX »

description.hltext_display: HamKam begjærte seg konkurs
description.content:
Fotballklubben HamKam har begjært seg konkurs, og styret i klubben stiller sine plasser til disposisjon.
Tips en venn på e-post:
Din kommentar
Del på nettet:
Styrene i HamKam Fotball og HK Sport AS har besluttet å begjære oppbud. Beslutningen vil bli realisert torsdag 30. desember, heter det i en pressemelding.
En slik frist gir omgivelsene anledning til å ta over ledelsen av klubben og sikre manglende tilskudd og likviditet.
Tirsdag ettermiddag ble spillergruppen i HamKam og de ansatte informert om situasjonen i den nyopprykkede 1. divisjonsklubben.
Hvis ikke et nytt styre kommer på plass i tillegg til friske penger, starter klubben i 5. divisjon neste sesong.
HamKam-spillerne er mer eller mindre i sjokk etter tirsdagens vonde beskjed fra klubbledelsen.
– Vi rykket opp med et ungt og lokalt lag og vi har framtiden foran oss. Nå kan alt være ødelagt. Det føles for jævlig, sier Vegar Bjerke til TV 2 Sporten.
– Vi opplever situasjonen som svært kritisk. Hvis ikke klubben får inn friske penger innen nyttår så er det slutt, sier han.
HamKam har slitt både sportslig og økonomisk siden nedrykket fra eliteserien i 2008. Klubben rykket ytterligere nedover til 2. divisjon etter 2009-sesongen, men rykket opp igjen til 1. divisjon denne sesongen. Men forbruket på veien nedover har vært stort.
Ville dekke gjeld
Den 15. desember vedtok bystyret i Hamar å dekke klubbens gjeld på rundt 8,5 millioner kroner til Briskeby-selskapene. Dette var hvis man unngikk konkurs.
– I lys arbeidet som har vært nedlagt, resultatene vi har oppnådd og utsiktene for å drive klubben innenfor de realistiske og nøkterne rammer er det bittert å gi opp nå, sier styrelederne i HamKam Fotball Morten Andreas Meyer og Torkild Korsnes i HK Sport AS, i en felles uttalelse.
– Vi må ta vårt styreansvar på alvor. Vi har ikke vært i stand til å få på plass en løsning som løser likviditetsutfordringene og sikrer balanse i regnskapet for 2010. Uten dette er heller ikke de nødvendige rammene for 2011 på plass, konkluderer Meyer.
I denne situasjonen er også HamKam uten realistisk mulighet til å oppnå lisens fra Norges Fotballforbund. (ANB-NTB)

description.hltext_display: Mark Hurd opnieuw in opspraak
description.content:
Artikelgereedschap
De Amerikaanse beurswaakhond SEC is een informatief onderzoek gestart naar de omstandigheden rondom het plotselinge vertrek van Mark Hurd bij HP afgelopen zomer.
The Wall Street Journal maakte dit bekend op basis van niet nader genoemde bronnen. De SEC wil erachter komen of Mark Hurd wellicht inside informatie heeft gelekt ten aanzien van de overname van EDS in mei 2008. Ook wil de SEC de onjuiste onkostendeclaraties van de voormalige HP ceo aan een nader onderzoek onderwerpen en vaststellen of hij daarbij wellicht bewijsmateriaal heeft laten verdwijnen.
Volledige medewerking
HP heeft inmiddels verklaard haar volledige medewerking aan het SEC-onderzoek te zullen verlenen. Zoals bekend nam Hurd in augustus ontslag, nadat hij door Jodie Fisher, een ingehuurde kracht, was beticht van sexuele intimidatie en geknoei met declaraties. Na een intern onderzoek sprak het bestuur van HP Hurd vrij van de aanklacht van Fisher, maar liet hem vallen omdat hij door te sjoemelen met declaraties zijn relatie met Fisher wilde verbergen.
Voorkennis
Fisher werkte tussen 2007 en 2009 regelmatig voor HP en het onderzoek van de SEC lijkt zich nu te concentreren op eerdere geruchten, dat Hurd Fisher zou hebben geïnformeerd over de overnameplannen van EDS voordat die officieel bekend werden. Wanneer blijkt dat Fisher of iemand uit haar omgeving rond die tijd op basis van die informatie aandelen heeft verhandeld, zou er sprake zijn van handel met voorkennis.
In de schijnwerpers
Hurd koesterde een low-profile imago in zijn tijd bij HP en werd geroemd om zijn rol in de financiële gezondmaking van het bedrijf in zijn vierjarige ambtsperiode. Sindsdien heeft hij meer dan zijn portie media-aandacht gehad; onmiddellijk na zijn aanstelling als ceo bij HP's rivaal Oracle sleep HP de messen en begon een rechtszaak tegen Hurd, die in september in een minnelijke schikking eindigde.
Bron: Wall Street Journal

description.hltext_display: Woori Fin aims to halve NPLs next yr - chairman
description.content:
SEOUL
"By implementing a large-scale cutback plan on the non-performing loans of each affiliate and improving the group's credit culture, we expect to lower the group's 2011 NPLs by more than half," Lee said at a company event for 2011 management strategy.
Woori's master plan for next year comes after South Korea halted the country's biggest-ever financial sector privatisation of Woori, aiming to end its costly bailout of the financial sector in the wake of the 1997-98 Asian financial crisis. [ID:nTOE6BG02O]
Woori's NPL ratio at the end of September rose to 3.7 percent from 1.7 percent a year earlier.
The government suspended a public auction of its $6 billion-plus stake in Woori, citing market uncertainties, as two strong candidates -- groups led by Woori employees and customers -- pulled out of bidding.
Financial Services Commission Chairman Chin Dong-soo, promised to quickly come up with an alternative. [ID:nTOE6BL03C]
Lee told reporters that the best, most practical model for privatising Woori was to divest the stake to multiple investors.
Woori had sought an alliance with financial investors as it wants to avoid being merged with another company. However, two Woori consortiums withdrew their bid citing the hefty premium demanded by the government, a senior Woori official said earlier. (Reporting by Ju-min Park; Editing by Chris Lewis)

description.hltext_display: Circulation des bus sur le réseau Transvilles : retour progressif à la normale
description.content:
Malgré les résidus de neige, les bus se sont remis à rouler hier.
| TRANSPORTS PUBLICS |
Les derniers amas de neige effacés, il n'y paraîtra plus rien. ...
Aujourd'hui en principe, les bus devraient pouvoir circuler sur l'ensemble du réseau Transvilles qui, faut-il le rappeler, dessert soixante-quinze communes de l'arrondissement. Hier, après trois journées complètes d'arrêt liées aux intempéries, le retour à la normale s'est fait progressivement. En début de matinée, seules douze lignes avaient été rétablies, sans pour autant que l'ensemble des arrêts soient desservis. À 17 h, les « écarts » n'étaient plus que marginaux : sur la ligne 2, la circulation se limitait à Saint-Waast, la ligne 4 évitait le faubourg Duchâteau, la ligne 110 s'arrêtait à l'église de Wallers (faute de pouvoir accéder à Bellaing centre et à Arenberg), la 122 s'épargnait plusieurs arrêts au Saubois et la 108 connaissait encore des perturbations.
Intervenu là où il le pouvait pour dégager la neige (non loin de la gare de Valenciennes, avenue du Maréchal-De-Lattre-de-Tassigny, ou sur les pôles d'échanges), Transvilles ne pouvait balayer partout. Aussi peut-on légitimement s'interroger sur les conditions dans lesquelles certains axes (à commencer par celui reliant la place d'Anzin à celle de Raismes) ont été (ou pas) déneigés... Hier comme avant-hier, le tramway, sur sa ligne 1, a continué de cheminer sans le moindre incident. À compter de lundi, il verra grimper dans ses rames des automobilistes d'un genre nouveau. Transvilles a en effet décidé de mettre en libre accès les parcs relais de l'Université, en bout de ligne, et Bellevue à Denain, comme il s'y était résigné, dès février 2009, pour les P + R Anzin Hôtel de Ville et Valenciennes Saint-Waast. Cette nouvelle « reculade », imposée par la très faible fréquentation des parkings en question, remet en tout cas sur le tapis cette question brûlante : dans quelle mesure le tram a-t-il échoué à chasser la voiture du centre-ville de Valenciennes ?
Applicable du 27 au 31 décembre, la gratuité du P + R Nungesser, le plus proche du centre-ville, ne sera que provisoire. Le « der des der » sera rendu à sa fonction de parking relais dès le lundi 3 janvier avec de nouveaux horaires : 7 h 30 - 11 h 30, 13 h 30 - 16 h. Et toujours le même principe : pour un titre à 2,70 E acheté, tous les occupants de la voiture ont droit à un aller-retour gratuit en tram.

description.hltext_display: Holiday Technology Wish Lists for Learning
description.content:
Related to Classroom Technology
Every kid nowadays wants to have the biggest and baddest gifts for Christmas, and for the last decade, those gifts have gradually become more and more technology oriented. Technology like smart phones, the iPod Touch, the iPad and gaming systems are most likely what the kids will be asking for.
All these tools have a simple theme in common: to make life easier. Whether in or out of school, these technologies will make it easier for teachers to teach and for students to learn.
Shelby Archuleta:
To prepare for college, items on my stocking stuffer list this year include the essentials for dorm and college life. A slightly childish holiday wish on my list is a new bike. While touring colleges, all I saw were students on bikes as their means of transportation to and from, well, everywhere. As soon as I saw that, I really wanted a bike. It’s a practical way to get around and a great way to get some exercise.
I am also an avid picture taker. Unfortunately I am without a very good working camera, so of course a new digital camera is on my list. And where would these pictures go without picture frames? Between old pictures needing to be preserved and new ones needing to be shown off, picture frames are a perfect fit on my list. Besides, I’ll need a way to remember all of my high school friends and family while in college.
Other items on any high school girl’s holiday wish list would be clothes and iTunes cards. This is a random combination, sure, but true all the same. Clothes and music are essential for high school students.
In high school, most kids will ask for higher priced items ranged from new iPods to new laptops to gaming systems and TVs. In this new technological age, it is hard to avoid any sort of technological gadget.
Julianne Capati:
For my Christmas wish list, I want a Bamboo tablet and a Canon Rebel T2i. It is terribly on the pricey side, but I can keep wishing and hopefully save up for both presents. The Bamboo tablet ranges in prices depending on size, but the size I want would cost $199, and the Canon Rebel T2i is much more expensive. It is safe to say that it literally costs $900, but one day, I hope I will be able to afford one. Two of my biggest interests are art and photography. Tablets make it easier to integrate art into digital media. I want to be a graphic designer of some sort and hopefully expand my talents elsewhere that can include that career.
Likewise, I really love photography and I do not have a DSLR camera of my own. I would like to somehow get better at photography and make it a career so that I can travel the world just to take pictures! The Canon Rebel T2i also allows the user to record movies unlike normal DSLR cameras, which also helps because I’m really interested in cinematography!
In my photography class, we have access to Canon cameras and a tablet. It enables photography student to use a professional camera. In addition to that, our photography teacher, Mrs. Gallo, lets her students use tablets as well. The photography room has Mac computers with Photoshop, so using tablets extends creativity with our photography. I can imagine myself achieving great things if I had these tools at my fingertips right now, but I’ll have to wait a little longer.
Spencer Taylor:
For me personally, I want a screen-printing machine that would let me make my own graphic T-shirts. I have a strong interest in clothing, so it would make a good gift for me, and it is much easier than trying to use fabric paint to make designs for shirts. Other gifts that I think would be great are the new video game attachments for consoles, such as the Playstation Move and Xbox 360 Kinect. Those two attachments are good ways to have an involved and active gaming experience that can be really family oriented. However, there are much more important things than what a kid wants for Christmas.
During mid-term elections, a vote on a proposition for the Vail School District caused the district to lose 10 percent of its funding from residents in the area. The proposition was for an extended — and increased — override that would provide more funding for the district through increased local property taxes. But the proposition failed, and that meant the override that we had before was lost too. What our school needs for Christmas — and any other day of the year — is a more stable budget.
There are also new tools that could be very useful and easy to use for teachers. Recently, one of the math teachers at our school got a Smart Board in his class to replace his whiteboard. The Smart Board allows him to make graphs and use other computer tools easily. Now he can stand in front of the class throughout his instruction rather than constantly walking to his desk to change a slide on a PowerPoint or make lines on a graph.
Technologies such as this would make it much easier for teachers to teach and for students to learn. If teachers got their tech gadgets for the classroom for Christmas, then lessons could be made with a lot more ease and functionality. New projectors are already making teachers happy with their crisp and clean picture quality. Teachers and students could also benefit from having access to more research databases in order to get more sources for research projects and such, but the school does have to pay for it. All in all, more technology would make life so much easier for both students and teachers, and would enhance the educational experience of the school.
Thank you for letting us share a year with you and allowing us to have this opportunity!
Shelby Archuleta is a senior at Empire High School and she likes drama (the theatrical kind).
Spencer Taylor is a senior at Empire High School who likes drama (the movie kind).
Julianne Capati is also a senior at Empire High School who likes drama (the interpersonal kind) and wants to wish everyone a happy holiday!

description.hltext_display: 首相、小沢氏の会談決裂 政倫審重ねて拒否
كأس الملك الإسباني برشلونة يتعرض لموقف حدث له مرتين فقط في كأس الملك
description.content: وفقاً لمستر تشيب الرجل الشهير بعالم الاحصائيات في إسبانيا، فإن برشلونة تعرض اليوم للموقف الذي حدث له مرتين فقط من قبل ألا وهو التعادل السلبي في لقاء الذهاب على أرضه.إذ تعرض البرسا لنفس الموقف وأمام نفس الفريق (أتلتيك بلباو) في عام 1951 لكنه تمكن من تخطيه بينما فشل في تخطي نفس الموقف في عام 1975 أمام ريال سرقسطة.لكن البرسا سيصطدم برقم إيجابي لبلباو، حيث تمكن من التأهل في 12 من 16 مواجهة تعادل فيها سلبياً ذهاباً خارج ملعبه.جدير بالذكر أن برشلونة سيكون عليه التسجيل في السان ماميس ليتفادى توديع المسابقة أو على الأقل ليصل لوقت إضافي. تابعنا على تويتر تابعنا على الفيس بوك البرسا نجح مرة وفشل مرة في تخطي حاجز التعادل السلبي على أرضه...

description.hltext_display: Put yourself in Michael Jackson?s Thriller video
description.content:
As you may have heard, though many people don?t seem to be giving it much attention, this year marks the 25th anniversary of Michael Jackson?s Thriller album. Now, thanks to a partnership between Michael Jackson, Epic/Legacy Records, Big Stage, and YouTube you will be able to star in your very own Thriller video. You heard me correctly?thanks to technology you can replace Michael Jackson with a 3D version of yourself.
To put yourself into your own Thriller video you need the latest version of Flash and three-close up photos of yourself taking with a digital camera. The video starring you is automatically created after you have uploaded the pictures. You can access the special ?My Thriller Video? by going to the and registering for a free account.
For those children of the 80?s or those who simply remember how popular Thriller was this will be a nice nostalgic journey. I must admit I would have loved to have switched places with Michael Jackson back in the 80?s, but not so much now. Now, putting myself in a Thriller video is probably as close as I want to get to becoming like Michael Jackson. Read more from the .

description.hltext_display: Daydream Announce Public Stable Release of FocusOPEN .NET Open Source...
description.content:
We were amazed at the high level of interest and the number of users registering to download a copy. This proves there is a definite demand for open source .NET DAM and we are very excited to be trailblazers for this segment of the market
Following a beta release earlier this year, leading digital asset management vendor, Daydream, have announced a public stable release (v 3.3.4) of their .NET open source digital asset management system, FocusOPEN under an Affero General Public (AGPL) open source licence. The Enterprise DAM implementation specialists have been developing Digital Asset Management solutions for organisations since 1995 and have experienced high levels of interest from end users keen to obtain a high quality public open source .NET DAM system designed for business use:
"We ran our beta programme for some time to obtain a wide sample of feedback and ensure the public edition was robust and ready for serious use. We were amazed at the high level of interest and the number of users registering to download a copy. This proves there is a definite demand for open source .NET DAM and we are very excited to be trailblazers for this segment of the market." said Ralph Windsor, Managing Director of Daydream.
FocusOPEN Digital Asset Manager features some highly sophisticated features that are more commonly found in high cost proprietary solutions such as a dedicated asset transcoding server, embedded metadata support, multi-branding, full text search, faceted search, taxonomies, asset permissions and workflow for usage management as well as ingestion.
FocusOPEN is the only fully supported .NET open source DAM system available and exists in a sector which has previously been associated with a poor range of choices consisting of expensive proprietary solutions only. Daydream also have a thriving product website with a range of community support facilities which a team of operatives maintain and update regularly. All registered users are provided with their own account. As well as freely downloadable software and community support, Daydream offer a range of service based offerings:
"You often hear that open source systems are somehow amateurish and lack enterprise class service levels. Daydream aim to fully lay that myth to rest. We have a package of associated services like hosting, SaaS, priority 24x7 support and consulting. We have consistently proven over our 15 year track record that we never let our clients down and they always trust us to deliver." explained Windsor.
Daydream plans to reach out to the developer community and channel partners with the FocusOPEN Developer Network and a reseller programme. A public Commercial Edition is also planned for release early in 2011.
For further information, to trial or to download FocusOPEN Open Source (AGPL) Edition, visit the product website at http://www.digitalassetmanager.com or contact Daydream on +44(0) 20 7096 1471.
About Daydream
Established in 1995, Daydream is the leading UK vendor of Digital Asset Management and Brand Asset Management systems. Over the last 15 years, their FocusOPEN DAM technologies have been implemented by over 40 global organisations including Major League Baseball, WS Atkins, BNP Paribas, Adecco Group and The British Museum. For more information, visit Daydream at daydream.co.uk or contact us at press(at)daydream(dot)co(dot)uk.

description.hltext_display: Le Japon devait voir sa croissance réduire de moitié en 2011-12
description.content:
TOKYO (Reuters) - La croissance économique du Japon ralentira durant l'exercice 2011-2012 qui débute le 1er avril prochain et ne représentera plus que la moitié de celle de l'exercice en cours en raison d'un fléchissement des exportations et de la consommation intérieure, selon les prévisions diffusées mercredi par le gouvernement.
Toutefois, les prix de détail sortiront de leur spirale baissière, prévoit aussi le gouvernement japonais.
Tokyo anticipe une croissance du PIB de 1,5% réel en 2011-2012 contre 3,1% en 2010-2011.
L'inflation mesurée par les prix de détail serait nulle sur le prochain exercice, et non plus négative comme elle l'aura été sur les trois exercices précédents, et le gouvernement anticipe une inflation à nouveau positive d'ici la fin de l'exercice 2011-2012, le 31 mars 2012. "Mais il faudra peut-être attendre encore longtemps avant que le gouvernement n'annonce que le pays est sorti définitivement de la déflation car il faut prendre en compte plusieurs indicateurs économiques", a déclaré un haut fonctionnaire ministériel.
Le gouvernement ne donne de prévision que pour les prix de détail dans leur ensemble, alors que la Banque du Japon préfère suivre ces prix hors produits alimentaires frais pour se faire une meilleure idée de l'évolution de l'inflation.
Par ailleurs, le gouvernement a révisé en baisse, dans son rapport de décembre, son opinion sur les exportations et le sentiment des entreprises en raison du ralentissement de la reprise en Asie et d'un yen qui reste fort.
Toutefois son diagnostic d'ensemble de la situation économique n'a pas varié. Il estime que l'économie reste au point mort et que sa situation est délicate, avec en particulier un taux de chômage élevé.
C'est dans son rapport d'octobre que le gouvernement avait pour la première fois depuis février 2009 revu en baisse son diagnostic d'ensemble de la situation économique.
Beaucoup d'économistes anticipent une contraction du PIB au quatrième trimestre 2010, l'expiration de mesures publiques de relance se faisant sentir sur le secteur industriel. Ils prévoient toutefois une reprise de la croissance l'an prochain, dans le sillage des exportations et de la demande intérieure.
Tokyo réaffirme enfin que l'une de ses grandes priorités est la lutte contre la déflation, avec le concours de la Banque du Japon.
Rie Ishiguro et Kaori Kaneko, Wilfrid Exbrayat pour le service français, édité par Dominique Rodriguez

description.hltext_display: Swissmetal erwartet Verlust und verkauft Tochterunternehmen
description.content:
Das Fabrikgelände der Swissmetal Holding AG in Dornach (SO) (Archiv) .
Der Buntmetallverarbeiter Swissmetal steckt noch immer in der Krise: Im laufenden Geschäftsjahr erwartet das Unternehmen einen operativen Verlust von 10 bis 14 Mio. Franken. Nun stellt Swissmetal seine Tochtergesellschaft ATMOVA zum Verkauf.
Dornach SO. – Der erwartete operative Verlust vor Sondereffekten sei auf den Franken-Euro-Wechselkurs, den noch nicht optimalen Produktemix und die Mehrkosten bei ATMOVA zurückzuführen, teilte das Unternehmen am Mittwoch mit.
Für die Swissmetal Design Solutions AG (ATMOVA) sei nun der Verkaufsprozess eingeleitet worden. Das Tochterunternehmen entwickelt und vertreibt ein neuartiges System für die Energiegewinnung (Dachziegel) und beschäftigt rund 10 Personen.
Wie Swissmetal weiter schreibt, hat das Unternehmen im ersten Halbjahr zudem die Kosten weiter optimiert und die Organisationsstruktur gestrafft. Swissmetal erlebe eine spürbare Erholung, die Kapazitätsauslastung sei gut.
Das Unternehmen schreibt schon seit längerem rote Zahlen: Im ersten Halbjahr 2010 betrug das Minus nach Steuern 9,6 Mio. Franken. Bei der Präsentation der Halbjahreszahlen im August hatte der Buntmetallverarbeiter noch ein ausgeglichenes operatives Ergebnis im Gesamtjahr in Aussicht gestellt. (sda)

description.hltext_display: Que justice soit faite |*
description.content:
Synopsis : Dix ans après le meurtre de sa femme et sa fille, un homme se dresse contre le procureur en charge du procès des meurtriers, pour obtenir lui-même la justice. Sa vengeance menace tout aussi bien l'homme qui leur a accordé la clémence, que le système et la ville elle-même.
Notre avis: Que Justice soit faite est sorti aux Etats-Unis le 16 octobre 2009. Soit plus d’un an déjà. Une telle situation est assez rare pour ce type de film habitué, il est vrai, aux rayons des DTV (direct-to-vidéo). Mais pas ici. La faute à qui ? Aux 70 millions de dollars récoltés sur le sol américain comme aux deux stars que sont Gérard Butler et Jamie Foxx. Bon, faut pas vous le cachez, le film est très moyen. Médiocre même. Mais pas plus mauvais que certains blockbusters estivaux placardés à grand renfort de marketing. D’ailleurs on se demande toujours pourquoi le distributeur a décidé de sortir au cinéma un long-métrage calibré pour le home cinéma, une part de pizza sur les genoux et une canette de bière dans la main.
Que Justice soit faite parle de vengeance. Mais pas n’importe laquelle. Il s’agit d’une vengeance froide, maturée pendant dix ans, suite au massacre de la famille de Gérard Butler. Celui-ci, sous les barreaux, organisera sa propre vendetta. Elle sera sanguinaire, gratuite, violente, absurde. Prototype du film prétexte qui consiste à utiliser, bien maladroitement dans ce cas précis, un évènement perturbant pour en justifier son leitmotiv (la vengeance). Ici la loi du talion domine un métrage au ton des plus sérieux dans son approche critique d’une justice déficiente. Le réalisateur F. Gary Gray nous sert un plat réchauffé sans aucun intérêt puisque la dimension judiciaire est évincée au profit d’une accumulation de scènes grandiloquentes pour ne pas dire idiotes. Si certaines sont réussies d’un point de vue scénique elles ne portent jamais le film au-delà de l’honnête série B.
Dans ces conditions disons que Gérard Butler cabotine à qui mieux-mieux dans un rôle de sadique vengeur quasi intouchable, tandis que l’enquête, elle, patine en suivant un Jamie Fox fatigué dès les premiers plans. D’ailleurs tel n’est pas le propos d’un film défouloir n’allant pas, paradoxalement, au bout de son scénario. A défaut d’assister à un bon film on aurait pu, au moins, se réjouir devant un spectacle méchamment boursouflé et amoral. On aurait pu.
Tags liés à cet article : critique, f gary gray, Gérard Butler, jamie foxx, Law Abiding Citizen, que justice soit faite, viola davis.

description.hltext_display: Kings bring Quick end to Avalanche streak
description.content:
DENVER - Jonathan Quick stopped 23 shots for his third shutout of the season, Dustin Brown had two goals and two assists, and the Kings beat Colorado 5-0 on Tuesday to end the Avalanche's six-game win streak.
Rob Scuderi had a goal and an assist, Brad Richardson scored a goal and Anze Kopitar and Drew Doughty each had two assists for the Kings.
Craig Anderson had 27 saves for Colorado, which was shut out for the first time this season. The last time the Avalanche were shut out was a 3-0 loss at Los Angeles on Feb. 13, a span of 55 games.
The Kings took a 1-0 lead in the first period on Scuderi's first goal of the season. Anderson saved Scuderi's initial shot from the point, but the puck ricocheted to the faceoff circle where Scuderi picked it up and slid a backhander past Anderson with 7:34 left.
It stayed that way until early in the second period. Doughty took a shot from the top of the faceoff circle and Richardson deflected it past Anderson to make it 2-0 with 13:29 remaining.
It was Richardson's fifth goal and fourth against Colorado.
Both goalies made big saves. Quick stopped Matt Duchene midway through the second, and Anderson made key stops late in the period. The last came on Kopitar's shot with a minute remaining in the period.
Duchene nearly spoiled the shutout midway through the third period, but his wrist shot from the faceoff circle rattled off the post and Quick covered up the rebound.
Brown iced the game with two goals, his 12th and 13th, in the third period. Justin Williams scored a power-play goal with 2:11 left, his 12th goal of the season.
Also...
St. Louis is the only team that has not been shut out this season. ... Brown has 22 points in 20 games. ... The Avalanche had scored at least three goals in their previous eight games.

description.hltext_display: 던전앤파이터, 남격투가 이미지 삽입된 '네스티' 선보여
description.content:
네오플(대표 강신철)은 자사에서 개발하고 삼성전자 주식회사(대표 최지성)가 서비스 중인 액션 온라인게임 '던전앤파이터'의 신캐릭터 '남격투가'의 이미지로 제작된 '네스티' 캔 음료수를 선보인다고 금일(21일) 밝혔다.
코카콜라와의 제휴를 통해 선보이는 이번 제품은 지난 16일 새롭게 등장한 ‘남격투가’의 일러스트가 들어간 제품으로 내년 2월28일까지 전국 PC방과 편의점, 할인마트 등에서 구입할 수 있다.
특히 제품 캔 따개 뒷면에 부착된 쿠폰 번호를 게임 홈페이지에 입력하면, 게임 내 아이템인 '레테의 방울' '레테의 계약' '네스티 칭호' '달인의 계약’ 등 7개의 다양한 아이템 중 1개를 랜덤으로 받을 수 있으며, '네스티' 홈페이지를 방문해 퀴즈의 정답을 맞추면 계정 당 1회에 한해 게임 아이템을 선물로 받을 수 있다.
네오플의 이정헌 실장은 "이번 제휴를 통해 오프라인에서도 신규 캐릭터인 남격투가를 만나볼 수 있게 됐다"며 "글로벌 기업인 코카콜라와의 제휴를 통해 양사 모두 긍정적인 효과를 얻을 수 있을 것이라 기대한다"고 말했다. 김형근 기자 noarose@gamedonga.co.krⓒ게임동아 & GameDonga.co.kr, 무단 전재 및 재배포 금지

description.hltext_display: Get hands on with NHL Slapshot
description.author: ANTHONY VASQUEZ-PEDDIE
description.content:
TORONTO ? Montreal Canadiens forward Michael Cammalleri skates down the middle, dekes his way past the Toronto Maple Leafs defence and winds up for a shot.
He shoots - he scores!
"Yeah!" I yell. ?No.? a defeated Luke Schenn says in disbelief.
We're playing Nintendo Wii's NHL Slapshot and I'm virtually kicking the young Maple Leafs' butt.
Slapshot takes hockey video games to a whole new level. By installing the Wii's motion sensing controller and Nunchuk add-on into a hockey stick accessory, players can do things like shoot and check simply by mimicking the movement a real hockey player makes on the ice. ?You have to wind up to take slap shots and put your stick out to knock guys off the puck,? says Schenn. Just like the real thing. And as close as any video game has gotten, anyway.
The sensitivity of the controls takes a little getting used to, but once you get the hang of it you'll be accurately flailing the stick in no time.
Tapping further into the realism theme, the developer, EA Sports, builds on its ?Be a Pro? concept present in its previous NHL titles. Players can go from playing Pee Wee in backyard rinks to making the pros - and Wayne Gretzky is there all the way.
Players can either grow up in the game as the "Great One," choose another NHLer, or create their own character and have Gretzky as a coach. The game supports up to four players - so your friends and family can join in on the fun - but it only comes with one stick accessory.
The extra amount of activity involved in playing Slapshot gives the game a more immersive feel. It's far better than just pushing just buttons on a normal controller.
And the final score? Me: 2, Schenn: 1.
Title: NHL Slapshot
Developer: EA Sports
Console: Nintendo Wii
QMI Agency rating: 4.5/5

description.hltext_display: Ruth Glass
description.content:
READSTOWN — , 94, of Readstown passed away on Sunday, Dec. 19, 2010, at Vernon Memorial Hospital in Viroqua.
She was born on Dec. 5, 1916, in Platteville, Wis. to William and Cora Davis. She graduated from Platteville High School in 1934 and State Teachers College in 1937. On May 25, 1940, she was united in marriage to Roy J. Glass at the Little Brown Church in Nashua, Iowa. They operated the Glass General Store for 47 years. She also taught 5th and 6th grades at Readstown for three years and taught one year in Middleton, Wis., when Roy was in the service.
Ruth was a former member of the Readstown United Methodist Church and Maple Leaf Rebekah Lodge.
She is survived by three children, Gerry (Barbara) Glass of Readstown, Greg (Kris) Glass of Fair Oaks, Calif., and Reuben (Kathy) Glass of Verona, Wis.; eight grandchildren, Michael of Middleton, Emily (Tim Call), Elizabeth (Joe Augelli) both of Viroqua, Natalie of Onalaska, Matthew of San Diego, Nathan of Verona, Rebecca and Sarah of Fair Oaks, Calif.; one great-granddaughter, Alexis Augelli of Viroqua; one sister-in-law, Ruby Davis of West Salem; as well as nieces and nephews.
In addition to her parents, she was preceded in death by her husband, Roy; one sister; three brothers; and one great-grandson.
Funeral services will be held at 1 p.m. on Thursday, Dec. 23, at the Readstown Church of Christ. Pastor Lance Lorenz will officiate and burial will be at the Manning Cemetery. Friends may call from 11 a.m. until time of services at the church on Thursday. The Sime Funeral Home of Readstown is serving the family. Condolences may be left at simefuneralforum.com.
Blessed be our memory of Ruth Glass.

description.hltext_display: Vierter Besuchermillionär der Constantin Film in diesem Jahr / VINCENT WILL MEER durchbricht die Millionengrenze
description.content:
München (ots) - Nach STEP UP 3D, RESIDENT EVIL: AFTERLIFE 3D und
KONFERENZ DER TIERE (3D) knackt VINCENT WILL MEER als vierter
Kinofilm im Verleih der Constantin Film in diesem Jahr die
Millionenmarke. Drei der vier Besuchermillionäre der Constantin Film
sind in 3D, was eindeutig für den Erfolg der neuen Kinotechnologie
spricht.
Das tragikomische Road-Movie VINCENT WILL MEER mit Florian David
Fitz in der Hauptrolle erzählt von drei jungen Leuten, die aus ihrem
- von Therapie bestimmten - Alltag ausbrechen und das Abenteuer einer
gemeinsamen Reise wagen. Der Film ist eine Produktion der Olga Film
GmbH, einer Beteiligungsgesellschaft der Constantin Film AG. Als
Produzenten zeichneten Harry Kügler und Viola Jäger verantwortlich.
Ralf Huettner übernahm die Regie, das Drehbuch stammt von
Hauptdarsteller Florian David Fitz. VINCENT WILL MEER ist am 22.
April 2010 in den Kinos gestartet und zählte am vergangenen
Wochenende den Millionsten Zuschauer.
Bereits Ende August stürmte der dritte Teil der erfolgreichen
Tanzfilm-Reihe STEP UP 3D an die Spitze der deutschen Kinocharts und
kann bis heute rund eine Mio. Zuschauer verbuchen. Die Constantin
Film sicherte sich kürzlich auf dem diesjährigen American Film Market
die deutschen Verwertungsrechte am vierten Teil STEP UP 4 3D, der
Anfang 2012 in die Kinos kommen soll.
Mitte September ging dann RESIDENT EVIL: AFTERLIFE 3D auf
Erfolgskurs: Bis heute haben in Deutschland über 1,1 Mio. Kinogänger
den vierten Teil des erfolgreichen Franchise gesehen. Die
deutsch-kanadische Co-Produktion, die erstmals komplett in 3D gedreht
und geschnitten wurde, zählt zu einer der erfolgreichsten
Eigenproduktionen der Constantin Film. Insgesamt erzielte der
explosive Endzeit-Thriller ein weltweites Boxoffice von rund 300 Mio.
Dollar. In zahlreichen Ländern wie Japan, Russland und Mexiko hielt
sich das 3D-Action-Spektakel wochenlang auf Platz 1 der Kinocharts.
Mitte November ist RESIDENT EVIL: AFTERLIFE 3D schließlich in China
mit einem hervorragenden Wochenendergebnis von rund 10 Mio. Dollar
auf knapp 3000 Leinwänden gestartet.
Anfang November knackte dann auch noch KONFERENZ DER TIERE (3D)
die Millionenmarke in Deutschland. Das temporeiche Familienabenteuer
in 3D steht heute bei mehr als 1,4 Mio. Besuchern. In bezaubernd
realistischen Landschaften agieren liebenswerte CGI-Helden, denen
Stars wie Ralf Schmitz, Thomas Fritsch, Christoph Maria Herbst,
Bastian Pastewka und Oliver Kalkofe ihre Stimmen leihen.
RESIDENT EVIL: AFTERLIFE 3D, KONFERENZ DER TIERE (3D) und VINCENT
WILL MEER zählen zu den fünf erfolgreichsten deutschen Filmen des
Jahres 2010. KONFERENZ DER TIERE (3D) und VINCENT WILL MEER gehen am
14. Januar 2011 ins Rennen um den Publikumspreis des Bayerischen
Filmpreises 2010.
Pressematerial zu unseren Filmen finden Sie unter
www.constantinfilm.medianetworx.de .
Originaltext: Constantin Film

description.hltext_display: Obama signing 'don't ask, don't tell' repeal
description.author: Mark S
description.content:
WASHINGTONPresident Barack Obama is ready to sign a landmark law that tells America's armed services to let homosexuals serve openly for the first time.
Obama's signature will fulfill a campaign pledge, cheer his party's liberals and strike a blow for what he sees as basic human rights.
So many gay rights and Democratic activists are expected at Wednesday's signing ceremony that the White House booked an auditorium at the Interior Department.
Pentagon officials caution that activists' elation over the bill could be premature, since service chiefs have to complete implementation plans before lifting the old policy. They also have to certify that it won't damage combat readiness, as critics charge, and draft guidelines to cover a host of practical questions, like how to handle sexual orientation in making barracks assignments.

description.hltext_display: IRS claims Boston Scientific owes $525M in taxes
description.author: info@tradingmarkets.com
description.content:
It's probably not a good thing when the Internal Revenue Service claims you owe the government $525 million, even if you're an $8.2 billion corporation.
That's how much the IRS wants from Boston Scientific Corp., according to a Tuesday securities filing. The tax claim relates to Boston Scientific's $27 billion acquisition of Arden Hills-based Guidant Corp. in 2006.
Earlier this month, the Natick, Mass.-based medical technology company received notices of deficiency from the IRS, claiming it owes additional taxes plus interest based on an audit of Guidant's books for 2001, 2002 and 2003.
The dispute relates to "transfer pricing in connection with technology license agreements between domestic and foreign subsidiaries of Guidant." Boston Scientific doesn't agree with the pricing method used by the IRS, and plans to file a petition in Tax Court to contest the government's assessment.
No payment on the assessment would be required until the dispute is resolved, and that could take several years. Meanwhile, Boston Scientific said its income tax reserves are adequate and the final resolution -- whatever it may be -- will not have a material impact on its financial condition.
The acquisition of Guidant hampered Boston Scientific with debt and a host of product safety issues related to the 2005 recalls of implantable cardioverter defibrillators and pacemakers.
Janet Moore --612-673-7752

description.hltext_display: Classic holiday soups
description.author: BryAnn Becker
description.content:
About 15 years ago, Sandy Elofson made oyster stew on Christmas Eve as an act of remembrance.It was a way for the Brandon woman and her husband, Dave, to remember their family members - Sandy's mom and Dave's parents and grandparents - who used to make oyster stew as a holiday tradition.
"They all passed away suddenly, and we really missed doing stuff with them, and we wanted to start our own traditions," says Elofson, 56. She didn't think her children would like the oyster stew, but making the soup on Christmas Eve soon became a family tradition. Now, her sons, ages 19 and 29, and daughter, age 21, join in making the soup.The recipe has changed a bit over the years - they've made it into a chowder, with scallops, shrimp and scallions. The last time they made the soup, they added potatoes and celery. "It's quite tasty," Elofson says.Serving soups including oyster stew and clam chowder around Christmas and New Year's is a tradition for many families. This year, consider adding in a soup to your holiday repertoire, or revamping a recipe for a healthier twist on a favorite.You don't need to sacrifice taste to eat healthier holiday favorites, says Joanne Shearer, a registered dietitian and the food and nutrition director for Avera Heart Hospital. "You can have your cake and eat it too with many holiday recipes," she says.
Reduce fat and calories in chowders and soups by using skim or evaporated milk and eliminating or using less butter. The Avera Heart Hospital makes a corn and ham chowder with skim milk and a lower-sodium chicken base. The only butter is in the roux."It's a popular soup for us. ... The taste and the flour and the texture of the soup is very palatable and acceptable," Shearer says.Since these recipes use less fat, jazz up the soup with spices to add flavor, Shearer says. Add cayenne pepper or red pepper flakes to the corn chowder, or experiment with using Tabasco Sauce or chopped parsley.Elofson uses a recipe from an old New York Times cookbook that she found at a rummage sale. She uses the recipe mainly as a guide. "We add (ingredients) and spice it. I like to brown the oysters, sauté them until the edges curl, and then I put them in the stew. That's the way my mom always did it. I use half-and-half, doctor it up. ... It's pretty tasty." And the family makes a large batch, so there's enough for leftovers.Shearer analyzed a recipe for oyster stew from Emeril Lagasse and found that a main-course serving is comparable to a fast-food beef patty.
"You could basically take Emeril's recipe and make this recipe from the Food Network, and it would be acceptable," Shearer says.Without the extra butter, they are comparable in calories and fat as a main-course serving. The soup has 225 calories and 16 grams of fat per serving, and a beef patty has 209 calories and 14 grams of fat.Reach reporter BryAnn Becker at 977-3908.

event_or_fact.property: They all passed away suddenly, and we really missed doing stuff with them, and we wanted to start our own traditions

description.hltext_display: Vijf Afghaanse burgers gedood bij NAVO-bombardement
description.content: 22/12/10, 09u14 � afp In het zuiden van Afghanistan zijn gisteren vijf burgers om het leven gekomen bij een NAVO-bombardement. Dat heeft de woordvoerder van de gouverneur van de provincie Helmand bekendgemaakt. Bij het bombardement in het district Sangin werden volgens dezelfde bron ook zeven vermoedelijke talibanstrijders gedood.� "Drie vrouwen en twee kinderen werden gedood tijdens het gevecht, maar we weten niet wie verantwoordelijk is", klonk het. In een mededeling laat de NAVO weten dat een gebouw werd geviseerd van waaruit de taliban ISAF-troepen aanviel.� Burgerslachtoffers veroorzaakt door de internationale troepen zijn een gevoelig onderwerp in Afghanistan en zorgen voor spanningen tussen de NAVO en president Hamid Karzai. Tussen januari en september dit jaar zijn volgens de Verenigde Naties al 2.400 burgers gedood in Afghanistan. (afp/adv)

description.hltext_display: didn’t bring Musburger, Herbstreit to Vegas
description.content:
Utes-Broncos By Scott D. Pierce
The Salt Lake Tribune
Updated 1 hour ago Updated Dec 21, 2010 11:59PM
Utah and Boise State fans are perhaps feeling validated by ESPN’s choice of sportscasters for the Las Vegas Bowl.
The thinking is that the presence of Brent Musburger and Kirk Herbstreit, who are also doing the Rose Bowl and the BCS championship game, tells us that ESPN considers this to be a Really Big Game. Check the various Ute and Bronco fan boards — not to mention the universities’ official websites — and you’ll see them all but crowing about how this puts them in the company of Auburn and Oregon.
Just one problem with that: It’s simply not true.
“To tell everyone the truth, we were assigned to the game before the teams were announced,” Musburger told The Salt Lake Tribune . “Certainly before Boise. And at that time, it looked like a Mid-American [Conference] team might even be playing Utah, which in no way is going to be a big-time game.”
You couldn’t burst those bubbles any more definitively than that. Musburger, who’s been one of America’s leading sportscasters since the 1970s, was reluctant to acknowledge that his presence somehow lends a big-game aura to any event.
“That would be a little bit egotistical of me to think that way,” said Musburger, who knew that Utah and Boise State fans were practicing a bit of self-deception. “Obviously, I’m aware of why and how people would draw that conclusion. And it’s somewhat flattering.”
But the fans were jumping to conclusions. Unless you think that Utah vs. Ohio — which got stomped by Troy in the New Orleans Bowl to finish 8-5 — would have been a Really Big Game.
That does not, however, mean that Musburger thinks the matchup between No. 10 Boise State and No. 19/20 Utah doesn’t make this one of the more attractive bowls this season.
Published Dec 21, 2010 11:21:02PM 10 Comments
Published Dec 21, 2010 11:04:01PM 0 Comments
Published Dec 21, 2010 10:58:01PM 0 Comments
“Herbie and I were ecstatic when we learned that Boise State was coming in to play Utah,” Musburger said. “When you just look at the raw matchups this bowl season, this is certainly one of the half-dozen best games. One of the most interesting going into the game.
“You never know what’s going to happen once the ball’s in the air. But certainly, from the standpoint of looking forward to it, I think this one stands out as one of the best of the early games.”
This will be the third time Musburger calls a Las Vegas Bowl. He was in the booth for ABC in 2001 (when Utah beat USC) and for ESPN in 2006 (when BYU beat Oregon).
“And there is something specific about this bowl,” he said, calling it a “point-of-view game.”
“The winners of this game inevitably come in thinking that it’s a business trip. It’s a football game. It’s not a boys’ night out in one of the most entertaining cities in the country,” Musburger said. “The team that pays attention to football and comes in determined walks away with the win.
“I have seen teams like Wyoming come in when they had no chance — no chance at all — and they have beaten up on the Pac-10.”
(Wyoming overcame a 21-3 deficit to beat UCLA 24-21 in the 2004 Las Vegas Bowl.)
“The last Utah game I did here, Pete Carroll and USC were here with [Carson] Palmer and all that gang, and USC did not show up,” Musburger said. “Utah trampled them.

description.hltext_display: Man zwaargewond door brand auto
description.author: G. Hoevenaars
description.content:
Een nog onbekende man is vanmorgen in een brandende auto gevonden in IJsselstein. Het slachtoffer is zwaargewond naar een ziekenhuis in Utrecht gebracht. De hulpdiensten rukten uit, nadat een getuige om kwart voor vijf de autobrand meldde. De brandweer trof de man in de auto aan, nadat de brand was geblust. Met hulp van ambulancepersoneel werd de man uit de verwoeste auto gehaald. Zijn toestand is kritiek.
De auto stond bij het Theodore Rooseveltplein. De politie tast nog in het duister over de identiteit van het slachtoffer. Ook wordt er onderzocht wat de oorzaak van de brand is. G. Hoevenaars

description.hltext_display: Groei Japanse economie zwakt volgend jaar af
description.content:
TOKIO (ANP) - De groei van de Japanse economie zal in het komende gebroken boekjaar 2011/2012 afzwakken tot 1,5 procent. Voor het lopende boekjaar wordt nog gerekend op een economische groei van 3,1 procent. Dat liet de Japanse overheid woensdag weten.
Daarmee groeit de Japanse economie dit lopende boekjaar, dat eind maart afloopt, wel sterker dan eerder werd gedacht. De regering rekende oorspronkelijk voor het boekjaar 2010/2011 op een groei van 2,6 procent.
De afzwakkende economische groei in 2011 houdt vooral verband met de zwakke binnenlandse bestedingen in Japan en het wegebbende effect van de steunmaatregelen. Ook zet de sterke yen de export onder druk. De regering verwacht dat de werkloosheid in Japan volgend jaar zal dalen tot 4,7 procent van de huidige 5 procent.
De Japanse export
Woensdag werd verder bekendgemaakt dat de Japanse export in november voor het eerst in negen maanden weer sterker is toegenomen. De uitvoer klom met 9,1 procent vergeleken met een jaar eerder. In oktober steeg de export nog met 7,8 procent.
Vooral de Japanse export naar andere delen van Azië zat in de lift. De export naar Aziatische landen klom met 13 procent, geleid door China met een exportgroei van 18,3 procent.
De uitvoer
De uitvoer van Japanse producten naar de Europese Unie steeg vorige maand met 10,1 procent. De export richting de Verenigde Staten zwakte in november af tot 1,2 procent. In oktober steeg de Japanse export naar de VS nog met 4,7 procent.
De Japanse import klom in november met 14,2 procent. Het handelsoverschot van Japan bedroeg vorige maand 162,8 miljard yen (1,48 miljard euro).

description.hltext_display: Tres heridos por arma blanca tras una pelea en un establecimiento en León
description.content:
Añadir a favoritos

Tu nombre

Nombre de tu amigo
E-mail de tu amigo
Introduce tu mensaje
Enviar
Añadir comentario
Introduce el texto de la imagen
* Es un código para evitar envios automáticos
Introduce tu nombre
Introduce tu crítica sobre esta noticia
Tres personas han resultado heridas por arma blanca como consecuencia de una pelea registrada en un establecimiento de la capital leonesa, según han informado a Europa Press desde el Servicio de Emergencias de Castilla y León 112.
Los hechos han ocurrido esta madrugada, en torno a las 05.05 horas, momento en el que la Sala Conjunta de Policía de León informó al 112 de una pelea en un establecimiento situado en la estación de Renfe de León capital, donde, tres personas habían resultado heridas por arma blanca.
Acto seguido se dio aviso a Emergencias Sanitarias -Sacyl-, que desplazó una ambulancia de soporte vital básico y una UVI móvil.
Ya en el lugar de los hechos los facultativos de Sacyl atendieron a tres varones de 36 (M.A.F.G.), 42 (J.M.F.G.) y 58 años (J.A.A.V.), que fueron evacuados posteriormente al Complejo Asistencial de León, el último en UVI móvil.

description.hltext_display: ‘பக்காத்தான் திட்டத்தில் ஊராட்சி மன்றத் தேர்தல்களும் சேர்க்கப்பட வேண்டும்’
description.content:
பக்காத்தான் ராக்யாட் அண்மையில் வெளியிட்ட கொள்கை அறிக்கையிலும் 100 நாள் சீர்திருத்தத் திட்டத்திலும் ஊராட்சி மன்றத் தேர்தல்களை மீண்டும் நடத்துவதையும் சேர்க்க வேண்டும் என்று வலியுறுத்தப்பட்டுள்ளது.
பக்காத்தான் கொள்கையில் ஊராட்சி மன்றத் தேர்தல்கள் இடம் பெறாதது வியப்பைத் தருவதாக, நல்ல நிர்வாகத்துக்கான கூட்டணி என்னும் சிவில் இயக்கத்தின் தலைவர் மரியா சின் அப்துல்லா கூறினார்.
காரணம், டிஎபி வழி நடத்தும் பினாங்கு மாநில அரசாங்கம், அந்த மாநிலத்தில் உள்ள இரண்டு நகராட்சி மன்றங்களில் உறுப்பினர்களை தேர்வு செய்வதற்கு தேர்தல்களை நடத்துமாறு தேர்தல் ஆணையத்தைக் கட்டாயப்படுத்துவதற்கான முயற்சிகளைத் தொடங்கியுள்ளது.
தேர்தல் ஆணையம் அதனை ஏற்கத் தவறினால் அந்த விவகாரம் நீதிமன்றத்துக்குக் கொண்டு செல்லப்படும் என்று ஊராட்சி மன்ற, போக்குவரத்து நிர்வாக விவகாரங்களுக்குப் பொறுப்பான ஆட்சி மன்ற உறுப்பினர் சாவ் கோன் இயாவ் கூறியுள்ளார். ?பினாங்கில் டிஎபி செய்துள்ளது மிக நல்ல விஷயமாகும். அது அனைவருடைய ஆர்வத்தையும் தூண்டியுள்ளது. அதில் பினாங்கு அரசாங்கம் வெற்றி பெறுகிறதோ இல்லையோ ஊராட்சி மன்றத் தேர்தல்கள் நடைபெற வேண்டும் என மக்கள் விரும்புகின்றனர்,? என சின் குறிப்பிட்டார்.
பக்காத்தான் கொள்கை அறிக்கையில் அந்த விஷயம் விடுபட்டுள்ளது பற்றி மனித உரிமை கண்காணிப்பு அமைப்பான சுவாராமின் திட்ட நிர்வாகி தா மூன் ஹுய் வியப்பும் ஏமாற்றமும் தெரிவித்தார்.
ஏனெனில் பக்காத்தான் உறுப்புக் கட்சிகள் 2008 பொதுத் தேர்தல் கொள்கை அறிக்கையில் ஊராட்சி மன்றத் தேர்தல்களுக்குப் புத்துயிரூட்டப் போவதாக வாக்குறுதி அளித்துள்ளன. ?அவை அந்தத் தேர்தல்களை மீண்டும் கொண்டு வருவதற்கான ஆய்வுகளை நடத்தியுள்ளன. அதற்கான முயற்சிகளையும் தொடங்கியுள்ளன,? என்றார் அவர். ?கூட்டரசு நிர்வாகத்தை எடுத்துக் கொள்வதில் பக்காத்தான் தீவிரமாக இருந்தால் அதன் திட்டத்தில் ஊராட்சிமன்றத் தேர்தல்களும் இடம் பெற வேண்டும்.? நாட்டில் முதன் முறையாக 1952ம் ஆண்டு ஊராட்சி மன்றத் தேர்தல்கள் நடைபெற்றன. இந்தோனிசியா மலேசியா பகைமையின் போது அவை நிறுத்தப்பட்டன. 1976ம் ஆண்டு ஊராட்சிமன்றச் சட்டம் இயற்றப்பட்ட போது அந்த ?நிறுத்தம்? அகற்றப்படவில்லை. கடந்த ஞாயிற்றுக் கிழமை பினாங்கு கெப்பாளா பத்தாஸில் நடைபெற்ற பக்காத்தான் மாநாட்டில் அதன் கொள்கை அறிக்கை வெளியிடப்பட்டது. ?அச்சுக்கூட, வெளியீட்டுச் சட்டத்தை ரத்து செய்யவும்? 1984ம் ஆண்டின் அச்சுக்கூட, வெளியீட்டுச் சட்டத்தை ரத்துச் செய்யப் போவதாக அதன் தலைவர்கள் வாக்குறுதி அளித்துள்ள வேளையில் அதனைத் திருத்துவதாக மட்டும் பக்காத்தான் தனது அறிக்கையில் குறிப்பிட்டுள்ளது, சர்ச்சைக்குரிய இன்னொரு அம்சம் ஆகும்.
நிர்வாகப் பொறுப்பை ஏற்ற முதல் 100 நாட்களில் அமலாக்கப் போவதாக பக்காத்தான் அறிவித்துள்ள சீர்திருந்தங்களில் அந்தச் சட்டத்தை ரத்துச் செய்வதும் இடம் பெற்றிருக்க வேண்டும் என சுதந்திரமான பத்திரிக்கைத் தொழிலுக்கான மய்யத்தின் இயக்குநர் மாஸ்ஜாலிசா ஹம்சா கூறினார். ?ஊடகங்கள் அதனை நடத்தும் முறையைக் கருத்தில் கொண்டு அது அந்தச் சட்டம் குறித்து ஏதாவது செய்ய வேண்டும்,? என்றார் அவர். பல நாடுகள் பத்திரிக்கைகளுக்குக் கட்டுப்பாடு விதிக்கவில்லை. சந்தை சக்திகள் அந்தத் தொழிலைக் ?கட்டுப்படுத்துவதற்கு? அவை அனுமதித்துள்ளன.
அச்சுக்கூட வெளியீட்டுச் சட்டத்துக்குப் பதில் ஊடக நிறுவனங்களின் பேராளர்களைக் கொண்ட ஊடக மன்றம் ஒன்றைத் தோற்றுவிக்கலாம் என அவர் யோசனை கூறினார். ?நியாயமாக நடத்தப்படுவதற்கும் ஊடகங்கள் மீதான கட்டுப்பாடுகளை அகற்றுவதற்கும் பத்திரிக்கை சுதந்திரத்தை உறுதி செய்வதற்கும் அது உறுதுணயாக இருக்கும்.?

description.hltext_display: 4000 personnes au Palais pour le mariage
description.content:
Quelque quatre mille personnes, en plus des invités privilégiés, assisteront au mariage religieux du prince Albert et de sa fiancée sud-africaine Charlene Wittstock, sur la place du Palais de Monaco.
Les portes du Palais resteront ouvertes afin de permettre à 4.000 personnes environ d’assister à la cérémonie de mariage. (photo: Keystone)
Sur ce sujet
Quelque quatre mille personnes, en plus des invités privilégiés, assisteront au mariage religieux du prince Albert et de sa fiancée sud-africaine Charlene Wittstock, sur la place du Palais de Monaco, dont les portes seront exceptionnellement ouvertes pour cette cérémonie.
Diaporama Les photos officielles de William et Kate
«Le mariage religieux se déroulera le samedi 2 juillet, dans la cour d'honneur du Palais princier, à 17h. Les portes du Palais resteront ouvertes afin de permettre à 4000 personnes environ d’assister, assises, à cette cérémonie retransmise sur écrans géants», indique mercredi un communiqué du palais princier.
Il y aura donc deux enceintes: dans la première, à l'intérieur du palais, les invités «privilégiés», têtes couronnées et chefs d'Etat notamment, assisteront de visu au mariage. Dans la seconde, à l'extérieur du palais, sur la place, quelque 4.000 personnes assisteront au mariage sur grand écran.
Les portes resteront ouvertes pour assurer «une continuité» entre les deux assemblées, précise-t-on au Palais.
La messe sera célébrée par Monseigneur Bernard Barsi, archevêque de Monaco.
Le mariage civil aura lieu la veille, à 17H00, dans la Salle du Trône, au Palais princier. Il sera célébré par M. Philippe Narmino, directeur des services judiciaires et président du Conseil d'Etat, précise le communiqué.
M. Philippe Narmino est l’officier d’état civil de la famille princière.
Le 1er et le 2 juillet seront fériés, pour cette occasion, à Monaco.
Albert II, qui a succédé à son père le 12 juillet 2005, avait fait la connaissance de Charlene Wittstock en 2000, à l'occasion d'une rencontre de natation à Monaco.
(afp)

description.hltext_display: Besinnliches auf der Flöte
みんな、大阪維新の会に不信感 独自候補擁立へ
South Korea army to hold huge drill, North silent
description.author: Jack Kim and Sylvia Westall
description.content:
. Full Article Wild geese fly in the sky as visitors look around the military barbed wire fence at Imjingak pavilion near the demilitarised zone separating the two Koreas in Paju, north of Seoul, December 21, 2010.
Credit: Reuters/Jo Yong-Hak
By Jack Kim and Sylvia Westall The land drill, involving artillery, fighter jets and the largest number of personnel in a peace-time exercise, will take place on Thursday, after the South's live-fire artillery exercise on Monday on the island of Yeonpyeong, and is bound to infuriate the North.
"We'll be sure to deal a punishing blow if the North tries to repeat the kind of situation like the artillery shelling of Yeonpyeong," Brigadier General Ju Eun-shik said in a statement.
There was no immediate reaction from Pyongyang, with the local KCNA agency running stories about leader Kim Jong-il's visit to a power station.
South Korea is also holding three days of live-firing naval drills off the peninsula's east coast starting on Wednesday, a media official at the Defence Ministry said.
He would not provide details. Yonhap news agency said the drills were taking place 100 km (60 miles) south of the maritime border with North Korea and involved at least six naval boats.
North Korea this week offered to re-admit U.N. inspectors concerned about its nuclear-weapon programme, leading to speculation of a resumption of six-party disarmament talks and
a general sigh of relief around the world that the crisis had passed.
"Yes, it will be a show of force against that," an army officer said when asked if the shelling of Yeonpyeong last month was a factor in the land drill's planning.
He said similar drills had been staged previously on more than 50 occasions, but the scale this time was unprecedented.
"The scale of mechanised assets taking place is enormous. When we would normally have 6 K-9 mechanised artillery, we'll have 36. We'll have the F-15 jets firing. We'll have choppers. You can say most of the mechanised assets taking part will be firing live ammunition."
It will take place in Pocheon region, less than 50 km (30 miles) north of downtown Seoul.
The latest crisis peaked when North Korea shelled Yeonpyeong, just south of the disputed maritime border, killing four people -- including two civilians -- in the worst attack on South Korean territory since the end of the civil war in 1953.
South Korean President Lee Myung-bak has suffered widespread domestic criticism for his response to North Korean attacks, with critics saying he was indecisive and failed to keep the public informed.
The South carried out live-fire drills on Yeonpyeong on Monday, which provoked only a verbal reaction from the North. It had vowed to strike back if the South went ahead with the drills, prompting fears of all-out war.

description.hltext_display: 유니아나, 어드벤처RPG '로그앤' 테스터 모집
description.content:
유니아나(대표 윤대주)는 자사에서 개발 및 서비스 준비 중인 롤플레잉 온라인게임 '로그앤'의 사전 공개 테스트에 참여할 테스터를 모집한다고 금일(21일) 밝혔다.
이번 테스트는 오는 28일부터 30일까지 3일간 오후 4시부터 6시간씩 진행되며, 홈페이지에 회원으로 가입한 게이머들은 누구나 테스트에 참여할 수 있다.
이번 테스트에서는 전략성이 필요한 던전 플레이와 실시간 전투 방식의 박진감 넘치는 해상 플레이 등 게임의 주요 콘텐츠를 모두 체험할 수 있으며, 타 게이머와 경쟁할 수 있는 '랭킹던전'과 몬스터를 봉인해 펫으로 길들이는 '서번트 시스템', 게이머들과 직접 전투를 벌이는 '해전 시스템' 등도 공개된다.
이와 함께 유니아나는 테스터들을 대상으로 '아이패드' '무선 키보드 마우스 세트' 등 다양한 아이템을 증정하는 이벤트를 함께 실시한다.
이에 대한 자세한 사항은 '로그앤' 홈페이지(roguen.uniana.com)에서 확인할 수 있다. 김형근 기자 noarose@gamedonga.co.krⓒ게임동아 & GameDonga.co.kr, 무단 전재 및 재배포 금지

description.hltext_display: Casillas protagonizará el último anuncio del año
description.content:
La cervecera pretende que el spot sea un homenaje a los héroes de la vida cotidiana que levantan cada día el país y se empezará a emitir a partir del 24 de diciembre hasta principios de eneroIker Casillas, capitán del Real Madrid y de España, será el protagonista del último anuncio del año en las televisiones comerciales españolas, en una campaña de Mahou que le reunirá junto a sus amigos de toda la vida.
El spot será un "homenaje a esos héroes reales que levantan el país todos los días", indica la cervecera en un comunicado, que ha elegido la figura de Casillas por ser "un auténtico símbolo de esfuerzo y de dedicación, con sus amigos de toda la vida para demostrar que los héroes cotidianos son los realmente importantes".
En el anuncio, junto a Casillas aparecen sus amigos Alejandro, Antonio, Dani, Javier, Julito, Miguel, Chema, David y Raúl, quienes comentarán, en una recreación de una de las muchas cenas en las que se reúnen, anécdotas sobre la vida del portero que levantó la Copa del Mundo que el pasado verano conquistó España.
La campaña, que incluye dos versiones de 60 y 45 segundos, comenzará a emitirse el próximo 24 de diciembre y se mantendrá en antena hasta principios de enero.

description.hltext_display: سوق الانتقالات عاجل: ملقة على بعد خطوة من ضم مدافع البايرن ديميكيليس
description.content: ذكرت تقارير صحفية إسبانية مختلفة أن مدافع بايرن ميونيخ مارتن ديميكيليس بات لاعباً في صفوف ملقة على سبيل الإعارة حتى نهاية الموسم.ويبدو أن المستوى المزري الذي قدمه دفاع ملقة في المباريات الأخيرة -- قد دفع الملاك القطريين للنادي للبحث عن وسائل لتدعيم فريق مانويل بيلجريني الذي تولى المهمة منذ فترة خلفاً للبرتغالي المقال جيسوالدو فيريرا.جدير بالذكر أن ديميكيليس يبلغ من العمر 30 عاماً ويعد ثاني صفقة لملقة في السوق الشتوية عقب الإعلان عن صباح أمس. تابعنا على تويتر تابعنا على الفيس بوك المدافع الأرجنتيني سيلعب في النادي الأندلسي على سبيل الإعارة حتى نهاية الموسم...

description.hltext_display: Espoon sieppausjutun tuomioista pääosa koveni hovissa
description.content:
Helsingin hovioikeus on koventanut valtaosaa Espoossa toissa syksynä sattuneen sieppausjutun tekijöiden tuomioista. 14-vuotiaan pojan sieppauksen toiseksi päätekijäksi katsotun naisen rangaistus kuitenkin lieveni hieman. Hovioikeus katsoi, että tapahtumasarja kokonaisuudessaan oli poikkeuksellisen törkeä. Hovioikeuden mukaan poikaan kohdistettu väkivalta oli täysin suhteetonta ja erityisesti pojan ikään nähden poikkeuksellisen raakaa ja julmaa. Päätekijöiden katsottiin syyllistyneen muun muassa törkeään vapaudenriistoon ja törkeään pahoinpitelyyn.
Hovioikeus hyväksyi käräjäoikeuden ratkaisun perustelun rangaistuksen osalta. Se kuitenkin kiinnitti huomiota siihen, että rikokset olivat kohdistuneet tekijöille entuudestaan tuntemattomaan ja heitä selvästi nuorempaan, vasta 14-vuotiaaseen uhriin.
Korvauksia aivotärähdyksestä Tapauksen päätekijän, vuonna 1983 syntyneen miehen rangaistus koveni 4 vuoden ja 5 kuukauden vankeudeksi. Käräjäoikeuden antama tuomio oli 4 vuotta ja 2 kuukautta.
Vuonna 1986 syntyneen naisen rangaistus lieveni 2 vuoden ja 8 kuukauden vankeudeksi. Käräjäoikeus oli tuominnut hänet kolmen vuoden vankeuteen. Hovioikeus katsoi, että rangaistusta oli alennettava, kun otettiin huomioon naisen osuus rikosten teossa ja hänen syyllisyytensä määrä päätekijänä olleeseen mieheen nähden.
Mies ja nainen määrättiin yhteisvastuullisesti korvaamaan uhrille 1 200 euroa aivotärähdyksen aiheuttamasta tilapäisestä haitasta.
Asunnonhaltijallekin nyt rangaistus Edellisten lisäksi viiden muun vastaajan rangaistuksia kovennettiin. He saivat ehdolliset vankeusrangaistukset, joiden pituus oli neljästä kymmeneen kuukautta. Tuomiot tulivat muun muassa avunannosta vapaudenriistoon ja pahoinpitelyyn.
Käräjäoikeus oli hylännyt tekopaikan asunnonhaltijan syytteet, mutta hovioikeus tuomitsi hänet puolen vuoden ehdottomaan vankeuteen avunannosta törkeään pahoinpitelyyn.
14-vuotias poika siepattiin Sellon kauppakeskuksen edestä toissa lokakuussa, kun hänelle tuli sanaharkkaa tuntemattoman pariskunnan kanssa. Kiistan jälkeen poikaa pahoinpideltiin, kuljetettiin autolla ja pidettiin asunnossa, josta hän vapautui vasta seuraavana aamuna. YLE Uutiset

description.hltext_display: Holdener se régale entre les piquets
description.content:
par Oliver Dufour - La très jeune Suissesse a surpris à Courchevel. Son 18e rang en slalom n’est qu’un début, selon son coach.
Le nouvel espoir a contribué à un tir groupé des Suissesses attendu depuis 12 ans. (photo: Keystone)
L’entraîneur en chef des skieuses helvétiques n’a pas hésité à qualifier le talent de Wendy Holdener de «grandiose». A 17 ans, pour sa cinquième course en Coupe du monde seulement, la Schwytzoise a terminé 18e et meilleure Suissesse, hier sur les pentes françaises.
Longue attente
La dernière fois que quatre coureuses suisses ont inscrit des points dans un slalom de Coupe du monde remonte au 5 janvier 1998.
Ce jour-là, sur la piste de Bormio, Karin Roten (4e), Martina Accola (20e), Catherine Borghi (22e) et Sonja Nef (26e) figuraient dans le top 30 après s'être qualifiées pour la seconde manche. La course avait été remportée par la Suédoise Ylva Nowen.
Dans un slalom remporté par l’irrésistible Autrichienne Marlies Schild devant la Finlandaise Tanja Poutiainen et la Slovène Tina Maze, Holdener a inscrit des points pour la troisième fois de sa carrière. Elle a ainsi égalé son meilleur résultat sur le circuit (18e à Aspen, USA).
La performance de la jeune slalomeuse pourrait encourager les dirigeants de Swiss-Ski à la lancer dans le grand bain lors des prochains Mondiaux de Garmisch-Partenkirchen (du 8 au 20 février 2011), afin qu’elle y acquière un maximum d’expérience. «Nous devons bien planifier ses prochaines courses. Car Wendy pourra bénéficier bientôt de numéros de dossard largement plus avantageux», a commenté Mauro Pini. A Courchevel, la skieuse d’Unteriberg est partie hier matin en 52e position. Un dossard qui rend tout exploit presque impossible.
A l’épatante course de Holdener s’ajoutent celles de Rabea Grand (19e), Jessica Pünchera (24e) et Denise Feierabend (29e): quatre Suissesses qualifiées pour la deuxième manche d’un slalom, discipline pauvre de l’équipe nationale féminine, cela ne s’était pas vu depuis le 5 janvier 1998 à Bormio (I). Même s’il a été obtenu à la suite d’une avalanche d’éliminations – 24 concurrentes écartées sur 69 partantes – ce résultat d’ensemble augure certainement des jours meilleurs pour les techniciennes helvétiques.

来年度の年金、減額で決着 閣僚一致、首相も了承
Gamache et Dubé ont joué comme des Dragons
description.content:
par Julien Caloz, Berne - Berne a battu Fribourg et enregistré sa 9e victoire consécutive grâce à ses joueurs sur le départ. Mowers a pété les plombs
Dubé a brillé dans cette rencontre. (photo: Keystone)
Gamache et Dubé porteront peut-être le même maillot l’an prochain encore. Annoncés dans le vestiaire de Gottéron, les deux joueurs bernois ont profité du rendez-vous face à la formation qui les courtise pour s’illustrer: le premier a marqué un but et délivré une passe décisive; le second, ovationné par le kop adverse dès son entrée sur la glace, a offert les quatrième et sixième buts de la soirée à Rüthemann et Gerber, avant d’être longuement sollicité par les médias.
Mark Mowers a craqué après avoir été sanctionné pour simulation. Il en a même jeté un tabouret sur la glace de rage.(photo: Keystone) En trois temps
Berne a ouvert le score après moins de 5’, lorsque Gamache a habilement servi Vigier, lequel a trouvé la lucarne droite de Huet. Gamache s’est ensuite débrouillé tout seul pour orienter l’envoi de McLean (11e), avant que Melin ne réduise l’écart (18e, tir de Heins dévié). La rencontre s’est ensuite équilibrée, jusqu’à ce que Mowers ne soit puni et que Fribourg ne concède le troisième but en infériorité numérique par Rüthemann. Plüss et Gerber ont salé l’addition, Bykov a manqué la cage vide (54e).
«Je n’assisterai pas à la conférence de presse organisée par Fribourg (n.d.l.r.: elle se tiendra aujourd’hui et devrait annoncer l’arrivée du joueur à Saint-Léonard)», a-t-il affirmé, avant que Gamache ne lui rende hommage. «Si j’avais le choix, je continuerais à évoluer aux côtés de Christian l’an prochain. On verra où il va signer.» Mais, malgré l’actualité et leur impact sur le cours du jeu, les deux joueurs de la capitale se sont fait voler la vedette par le Fribourgeois Mark Mowers.
L’Américain, sanctionné pour s’être laissé tomber au contact de Travis Roche (la simulation est aussi nette que le coup de canne du défenseur), a complètement pété les plombs à la 38e minute. Après s’être rebellé contre le directeur de jeu Reiber, il s’est saisi d’un tabouret qu’il a aussitôt lancé sur la glace. «C’est une plaisanterie, a-t-il lâché. La décision de Reiber est une affaire personnelle. C’est déjà lui qui avait dirigé la partie contre Langnau au cours de laquelle j’avais été commotionné.» Le joueur pourrait être suspendu plusieurs matches.

description.hltext_display: 스페셜포스, 겨울방학 맞아 '호러모드' 업데이트
description.content:
네오위즈게임즈(대표 이상엽)는 드래곤플라이(대표 박철우)가 개발하고 자사의 게임포털 피망에서 서비스 중인 FPS 온라인게임 스페셜포스에 신규 모드 '호러모드'를 업데이트 한다고 금일(21일) 밝혔다.
‘호러모드’는 게임 시작 시 무작위로 편성된 인간 진영과 언데드 진영간에 쫓고 쫓기는 양상을 그린 신규 모드이다.
언데드 진영은 정해진 시간 안에 인간을 최대한 많이 감염시키면 승리하게 되며, 반대로 인간 진영은 감염되지 않고 오래 살아남는 것을 목적으로 한다.
아울러 기존 인기 맵을 ‘호러모드’에 맞게 변형 제작한 ‘호러 플라즈마’와 ‘호러 너브가스’도 새롭게 선보인다. 이번에 출시되는 2종의 맵은 신규 모드의 재미를 극대화 할 수 있도록 공략 포인트를 재설정하였으며, 탁월한 맵 디자인과 밸런스를 자랑한다.
이에 대한 자세한 내용은 홈페이지(specialforce.pmang.com)에서 확인할 수 있다. 김한준 기자 endoflife81@gamedonga.co.krⓒ게임동아 & GameDonga.co.kr, 무단 전재 및 재배포 금지

description.hltext_display: Тимошенко дадуть 5 років з відтермінуванням вироку, – джерела
description.content:
Порушивши кримінальну справу проти Юлії Тимошенко, влада має намір не допустити лідера партії «Батьківщина» до наступних парламентських виборів
Про це з посиланням на джерела в Блоці Юлії Тимошенко пише газета «Сегодня».
«Порушення закону було – значить, справу покійно можна доводити до суду, – сказало джерело, – Але зрозуміло, що цілі у цієї справи чисто політичні. Основний розрахунок – не допустити Тимошенко на парламентські вибори-2012 ні на чолі партійного списку, ні по «мажоритарці».
«Для цього недостатньо завести справу – за законом підслідний може балотуватися в депутати. Тому справу доведуть до суду і вироку», – додав представник БЮТ.
За словами нардепа, кращим для влади моментом для суду є кінець 2011 року: буде достатньо часу, щоб Тимошенко пройшла всі апеляції і вирок набув чинності. «Швидше за все, їй дадуть років п’ять, з відтермінуванням виконання вироку на два роки, тобто засудять, але не посадять. Що, власне, і потрібно владі: з одного боку, з діючим вироком Тимошенко не зможе балотуватися, з іншого – не стане мученицею», – підсумував депутат.
Цю думку поділяє і політолог Михайло Погребинський: «Безумовно, у випадку з Тимошенко у нинішньої влади існує емоційна складова – вона неодноразово ображала регіоналів і особисто Януковича. Тому явно простежується мета – витіснити її з політичного поля раз і назавжди. Для цього, з одного боку, використовується кримінальне переслідування, з іншого, режим найбільшого сприяння «Свободі», яка відбирає електорат у БЮТ. Але у випадку з вироком, думаю, влада відкине емоції – тобто Тимошенко засудять, але вона не сяде. Посадити її – це гірше, ніж злочин, це помилка».

description.hltext_display: 小沢氏証人喚問も選択肢 民主執行部、２７日にも結論
Cristiano entra en la lista con amigdalitis aguda
description.content:
· Mourinho da descanso a Ramos, Arbeloa y Khedira y recupera a Marcelo y Xabi Alonso, que se perdieron el duelo ante el Sevilla por sanciónCristiano Ronaldo figura en la lista de convocados para el duelo de ante el Levante, a causa de una amigdalitis aguda.
La presencia de CR7 no es la única novedad de una convocatoria de la que se caen, sin que medien razones médicas para ello, Sergio Ramos, Álvaro Arbeloa y Sami Khedira.
Vuelven Marcelo y Xabi Alonso, que no jugaron ante el Sevilla por lesión, y entran los canteranos Pacheco (portero), Juanfran y Morata. Las bajas son Kaká, Gago, Dudek, Higuaín y Canales.

description.hltext_display: فريق عمل Goal.com جول.كوم يفوز بجائزة سوكر لنس لأفضل موقع لكرة القدم
description.content: يسعدنا أن نعلن عن أن موقع "جول.كوم" فاز بجائزة "أفضل موقع لكرة القدم في العالم" عن عام 2010 التي يمنحها موقع "سوكر لنس".كان "سوكر لنس" قد طرح أسماء عدة مواقع كروية وكانت فئة "أفضل موقع لكرة القدم" ضمن عدة فئات تم وضعها.وتم منح الجائزة عن طريق تصويت من المشجعين ليفوز الموقع بجائزة يعدها كثيرون واحدة من أهم المصادر لتحديد الأفضل والأكثر بريقاً من بين المواقع الكروية والكُتّاب.جوائز 2010 التي منحها "سوكر لنس" تم رعايتها عن طريق موقع "كاسترول" وهي الجوائز التي صوت فيها ما يزيد عن 37 ألف شخص.جول.كوم فاز بالجائزة بعد أن حصل على 49% من الأصوات متقدماً على مواقف بي بي سي فوتبول، سوكر نت، جارديان فوتبول وسكاي سبورتس.وصرح مدير العلاقات العامة لجول.كوم ويل وود "نحن سعداء بفوزنا بجائزة سوكر لنس لأفضل موقع كروي، وهي نهاية مثالية لمحررينا ومراسلينا الذين عملوا بكد حتى يجلبوا الأفضل، الأكثر شمولاً لتغطية كرة القدم"."التصويت لتحديد الفائز تم عن طريق المشجعين، ما يمنح الجائزة قيمة أكبر للفوز بها. نشكر كل من صوّت لجول.كوم ونأمل في أن نستمر في التطور في 2011".هذا الإنجاز يجسد سنة ناجحة جداً لجول.كوم الذي شهد فيه أكبر مجتمع كروي إعلامي في العالم تحطيمه لأرقامه في عدد الزوار بالإضافة لنجاحات كبيرة في أكثر من مكان.وبإمكانكم زيارة موقع سوكر لنس للاطلاع على القائمة الكاملة للجوائز .. اضغط هنا (http://soccerlensawards.com/2010-winners/) تابعنا على تويتر تابعنا على الفيس بوك

description.hltext_display: Stadt kämpft um ihr Stimmrecht
Gl�nzendes drittes Quartal bei Winterthur Technologie
description.content:
Zug. – Allein im dritten Quartal betrug der Gewinn 5,3 Mio. Euro (Vorjahr: -0,7 Mio. Euro). Winterthur Technologie (WTG) verzeichnet damit nach dem positiven Halbjahr erneut schwarze Zahlen, nachdem die Firma wegen der Krise mit der Profitabilität gekämpft hatte. Ende September 2009 hatte WTG noch einen Verlust von 2,2 Mio. Euro ausgewiesen.
Auch der Umsatz stieg zwischen Januar und Ende September kräftig an. Er betrug in den neun Monaten 133,6 Mio. Euro, was einer Verbesserung um 36 Prozent gegenüber der Vorjahresperiode entspricht. In China sei die Steigerung am höchsten ausgefallen, hiess es im Communiqué.
Der Trend zeigt weiter nach oben. Die Auftragseingänge per Ende September lagen um 81,4 Prozent höher als nach drei Quartalen im 2009. Auch der Auftragsbestand verbesserte sich per Ende September um 41 Prozent gegenüber dem Vorjahr. Aufgrund dieser Zahlen rechnet WTG mit einem «sehr guten» Ergebnis für das gesamte 2010 und auch für das erste Quartal 2011.
WTG steht vor einer Übernahme: Der US-Technologiekonzern 3M will sich das Schweizer Unternehmen für insgesamt 448 Mio. Dollar einverleiben. Das öffentliche Übernahmeangebot wurde am Mittwoch wie angekündigt veröffentlicht. Voraussichtlich vom 10. Januar bis zum 7. Februar wird die Angebotsfrist laufen.
Der Verwaltungsrat von WTG stimmte der Übernahme durch den US-Konzern zu. WTG-Verwaltungsratspräsident Edgar Rappold, der 14,4 Prozent an WTG hält, kündigte an, er werde seine Aktien 3M andienen. Die Übernahme kommt zustande, wenn 3M mindestens zwei Drittel der WTG-Aktien angedient werden. Fernziel ist eine Vollübernahme. (sda)

description.hltext_display: 署名５人分に異議申し立て 阿久根市議会リコール
Schumacher: "Não sou o melhor piloto de sempre"
description.content:
Um dos assuntos que provoca mais discussão entre os adeptos da Fórmula 1 é sobre quem será o melhor piloto de todos os tempos. Certamente que no topo das estatísticas está o heptacampeão do mundo Michael Schumacher.
O maestro teutónico com a vontade de aço tem o recorde de 91 vitórias em Grandes Prémios, embora a ausência de uma verdadeiro adversário durante as suas conquistas prejudicam a sua ‘candidatura’ a melhor de sempre. Por exemplo, o cinco vezes campeão do mundo Fangio não esteve em pista com ele, nem encontrou um adversário como Senna tinha em Alain Prost.
DE acordo com o próprio, ele não deve ser considerado o melhor de sempre porque apenas se concentrou na F1. “ A conversa deve ser apenas em relação à Fórmula 1, pois existem tantas categorias de competição diferentes”, referiu à CNN, à pergunta se era ‘o melhor piloto de sempre ou o melhor piloto de sempre da F1’. “Temos o DTM, onde o meu irmão corre e que quando tentei percebi rapidamente que não conseguia ter o mesmo sucesso que tive na F1”.
Outro facto a ter em contra Schumacher é a sua capacidade de, por vezes, ter ‘esticado a Lei’, estando envolvido em acidentes que ditaram papel fundamental na decisão de campeonatos e, este ano, esteve a centímetros de enviar o antigo colega de equipa Rubens Barrichello contra o muro na recta do GP da Hungria.
