description.hltext_display: Соколова стала чемпионкой мира во второй раз за год
description.content:
21 декабря 22:36 � оссийская волейболистка Любовь Соколова стала победительницей клубного чемпионата мира в ОАЭ в составе турецкого Фенербахче, который в финальном матче в трёх партиях переиграл бразильский Соллис. 33-летняя россиянка стала второй по результативности в своей команде, набрав 14 очков - 13 в атаке и еще одно на подаче. Напомним, что для Соколовой титул чемпионки мира стал уже вторым за последние полтора месяца: в середине ноября она завоевала его в составе сборной � оссии на первенстве планеты в Японии.
Клубным чемпионом мира среди мужчин стал итальянский Трентино, в финале одолевший польскую Скру. . Катар Женщины. Финал. Фенербахче (Турция) Соллис (Бразилия) 3:0 (25:23, 25:22, 25:17) Мужчины. Финал. Трентино (Италия) Скра (Польша) 3:1 (25:22, 25:19, 20:25, 25:16) Теги: � оссия Волейбол Любовь Соколова

description.hltext_display: La politique de l'enfant unique fait débat
description.content:
Une organisation chinoise de défense des droits de l'Homme a demandé l'abolition de la politique coercitive de l'enfant unique en vigueur depuis 30 ans en Chine.
La politique de l'enfant unique augmenterait les violences contre les femmes, selon une organisation chinoise de défense des droits de l'Homme. (photo: Keystone)
L'une des principales organisations chinoises de défense des droits de l'Homme a demandé l'abolition de la politique coercitive de l'enfant unique en vigueur depuis 30 ans en Chine, à cause des violences contre les femmes qu'elle provoque.
Dans un rapport intitulé «Je ne dispose pas de mon propre corps» publié mardi, le groupe Chinese Human Rights Defenders (CHRD) fait état d'avortements et de stérilisations forcés, d'insertions par la contrainte de dispositifs intra-utérins et de tests de grossesse obligatoires dans le pays le plus peuplé du monde.
«L'application de la politique (de l'enfant unique) encourage la violence contre les femmes», déplore la directrice internationale de CHRD, Renee Xia, dans un communiqué.
«Rien n'indique que les responsables locaux, qui cherchent à remplir les quotas (du planning familial), doivent rendre des comptes pour les violations perpétrées», poursuit Mme Xia.
La population chinoise s'élevait fin 2009 à 1,33 milliard de personnes. Tandis que les couples urbains ne sont en majorité autorisés qu'à avoir un seul enfant, une deuxième naissance est en général permise dans les campagnes si la première est une fille.
«Peu importe que les couples soient autorisés à avoir un ou deux enfants, le fait est que le gouvernement continue à utiliser la contrainte pour décider non seulement du nombre d'enfants qu'un couple peut avoir mais aussi de ses méthodes de contraception», souligne la responsable de CHRD.
Lundi, un responsable gouvernemental, Li Bin, a déclaré que la politique actuelle demeurerait «largement la même» durant les cinq années à venir, a rapporté la presse officielle chinoise.
La mise en oeuvre de la politique de l'enfant unique varie d'un endroit à l'autre, selon le rapport de CHRD, qui précise que certaines régions sont devenues financièrement dépendantes des amendes infligées aux parents pour les naissances non autorisées.
Les avortements forcés, souvent durant les derniers mois de grossesse, restent monnaie courante pour les femmes célibataires et les couples n'ayant pas atteint l'âge légal pour se marier, qui est de 22 ans pour les hommes et de 20 ans pour les femmes, selon le rapport.
La population chinoise est caractérisée par un grave déséquilibre des sexes, avec 119 naissances masculines pour 100 féminines, selon les chiffres officiels. Cet écart est dû en large part à des avortements sélectifs suite à des échographies illégales.
(afp)

description.hltext_display: 오디션, '메리 크리스마스, 오디션' 이벤트 실시
description.content:
와이디온라인(대표 유현오)은 티쓰리엔터테인먼트(대표 김기영)가 개발하고 자사에서 서비스 중인 댄스 온라인게임 '오디션'의 게이머들을 대상으로 '메리 크리스마스, 오디션' 이벤트를 실시한다고 금일(22일) 밝혔다.
오는 23일부터 2011년 1월6일까지 진행되는 이번 이벤트에서는 커플 게이머들이 데이트 계획이나 즐거웠던 크리스마스의 기억을 게시판에 등록하면 추첨을 통해 놀이공원 자유이용권과 영화 예매권이 증정된다.
또한 크리스마스 당일 게임 내에 산타복을 입은 운영자와 함께 플레이한 스크린샷을 게시판에 등록한 게이머에게는 추첨을 통해 문화상품권을 선물한다.
이와 함께 오는 30일까지 최신 아이템과 기능성 아이템을 제외한 아이템들을 30% 할인된 가격에 판매한다.
이벤트에 대한 자세한 사항은 '오디션' 홈페이지(clubaudition.ndolfin.com)에서 확인할 수 있다. 김형근 기자 noarose@gamedonga.co.krⓒ게임동아 & GameDonga.co.kr, 무단 전재 및 재배포 금지

description.hltext_display: 中京、大阪の都構想で連携 河村・大村両氏と橋下知事
الدوري الاسباني ميسي سيحصل على "امتياز خاص" خلال أعياد الميلاد
description.content: أكد بيب جوارديولا أن لاعبي برشلونة سيعودون للتدريبات في الـ29 من ديسمبر المقبل باستثناء ليونيل ميسي الذي سيعود في الأول أو الثاني من يناير من العام الجديد.وأضاف "هذا القرار قراري، وهو ليس الأول من نوعه، بل إنها السنة الثالثة التي يتم فيها هذا الأمر. أنا أريد أن يقضي ميسي عيد الميلاد رفقة عائلته".أما عن الكلمات الأخيرة للاعبيه فقال "لقد قلت لهم بأن يأكلوا ويشربوا ما يحلو لهم، لكنهم يعلمون تماماً اليوم الذي سيتعين عليهم العودة للحرص فيما يأكلوه". تابعنا على تويتر تابعنا على الفيس بوك جوارديولا يؤكد أنه من قرر هذا الأمر...

description.hltext_display: So feiert die lokale Prominenz Weihnachten
Mon beau-père et nous |**
description.content:
(Little Fockers) U
USA / 2010
22.12.2010 Il aura fallu 10 ans, deux enfants avec sa femme Pam et dinnombrables obstacles pour que Greg soit enfin accepté par son beau-père. Les doutes de Jack réapparaissent lorsque Greg, à court dargent, travaille au noir pour un laboratoire Quand lensemble du clan Furniker, y compris Kevin, lex de Pam, se retrouve pour lanniversaire des jumeaux, Greg doit prouver à Jack quil est un vrai chef de famille. Mais après tous les malentendus, lespionnage et les missions secrètes, Greg va-t-il réussir lexamen final de Jack et lui succéder à la tête du clanou le cercle de confiance sera-t-il brisé pour toujours ? EN

description.hltext_display: Richtingloze handel op Europese markten
description.content:
AMSTERDAM (ANP) - De Europese aandelenbeurzen openden woensdag vlak bij gebrek aan richtinggevend nieuws. Volgens handelaren is het onderliggende sentiment echter positief, mede dankzij goede macro-economische cijfers en overnamenieuws dat dinsdag naar buiten kwam.
Kort na de opening noteerde de AEX-index van meest verhandelde fondsen in Amsterdam 0,1 procent hoger op 356,40 punten. De MidKap-index van middelgrote fondsen was onveranderd en stond op 634,10 punten. Ook in Frankfurt, Londen en Parijs stonden de graadmeters onveranderd.
Chemieconcern DSM (min 0,3 procent) was een van de sterkste dalers in de AEX. Amerikaanse advocatenkantoren onderzoeken of DSM de aandeelhouders van Martek Biosciences genoeg betaalt voor hun stukken. Na de aankondiging dinsdag van de overname voor circa 1,1 miljard dollar steeg het aandeel DSM 3,9 procent.

民主、政党交付金総額が過去最高 １７１億円
Fallece el conductor de un camión con bombonas de butano tras chocar contra una valla en la A-65 en Palencia

Un varón de 49 años cuya identidad responde a las iniciales F.J.G.C. ha perdido la vida esta madrugada tras sufrir un accidente con su camión, que estaba cargado de bombonas de butano, según han informado a Europa Press desde el Centro de Gestión de Tráfico.
Los hechos han ocurrido a las 04.10 horas de hoy, miércoles 22 de diciembre, en el kilómetro 7,7 de la A-65, en Palencia capital, donde un camión chocó contra una valla de seguridad.
El Centro de Gestión de Tráfico ha precisado que se están investigando las circunstancias de este accidente y no se descarta que la muerte se haya podido deber a causas naturales.

description.hltext_display: «Hugo» le moineau nargue le personnel
description.content:
Un lieu culturel est «squatté» par le volatile, qui ne veut plus s’en aller. Il y est devenu une vedette.
Christian Mühlestein pointe du doigt le volatile. (photo: dr)
En septembre dernier, le nouveau lieu culturel de Saint-Gall, la Lokremise, a ouvert ses portes aux visiteurs dans une ancienne rotonde des CFF. Si les humains sont venus en nombre, un petit moineau a également été séduit par les lieux. «Il est entré par une fenêtre et a volé un peu partout, raconte le gardien Christian Mühlestein. Sauf que lui est resté et a fait de ce vaste lieu qui accueillait jadis les locomotives des CFF son nouveau logis.»
Le petit piaf est protégé des prédateurs naturels et réussit à se nourrir des reste de pain et autres victuailles abandonnées sur les tables du restaurant. «Pour «Hugo» (tel est le nom du volatile), la Lokre­mise est devenue une immense volière.»
Pourtant, Bettina Ammann, administratrice du lieu, veut se débarrasser du squatteur. «A cause du restaurant et pour des raisons d’hygiène», déclare-­t-elle. Et ce n’est pas faute d’avoir essayé. Mais «Hugo» est coriace et toutes les tentatives pour le chasser ou l’attraper ont échoué. A ­force de ténacité, le moineau est devenu une sorte de mascotte du lieu, et les discussions à son sujet vont bon train. «Les gens prennent régulièrement de ses nouvelles», avoue le patron du restaurant, David Güntensberger.
(Pascal brotzer/jbm)

description.hltext_display: 諫早開門の高裁判決確定 首相に長崎知事は強く反発
Braaten forlenger
description.content:
Daniel Braaten som i det siste også har vært med på det norske landslaget har forlenget avtalen med Toulouse fram til sommeren 2013.
28-åringen er toppscorer for klubben som spiller den siste kampen i år borte mot Valenciennes onsdag.
– Det var interesse både fra England og andre franske klubber, men for Daniel er dette det beste alternativet og vi har fått en løsning vi er svært tilfreds med, sier Braatens agent Stig Lillejord til TV 2 Sporten.
Braaten kom til Toulouse sommeren 2008 etter et mislykket i Bolton i engelsk eliteserie. Den tidligere Skeid- og RBK-spilleren har hatt tillit og blomstret i den franske klubben. (ANB-NTB)

description.hltext_display: Florentino: "Lo que había que decir de los árbitros lo dijo Valdano"
description.content:
· El mandatario considera que el incidente protagonizado por Mourinho tras el partido ante el Sevilla "fue una anécdota, un accidente"El presidente del Real Madrid, Florentino Pérez, ha analizado este martes la polémica surgida entre José Mourinho y Jorge Valdano a raíz de la tensa rueda de prensa
El presidente blanco, en declaraciones al programa 'Protagonistas', de Luis del Olmo, con el que conversó en directo tras la concesión a Iker Casillas de uno de los premios anuals de dicho espacio, fue claro: "Es costumbre del club no hablar de los árbitros. Lo que teníamos que decir de los árbitros ya lo ha dicho Jorge Valdano, que es nuestro portavoz, el que representa mejor la imagen de nuestro club, y todo lo que había que decir ya lo dijo. Lo de Mourinho fue una anécdota y un accidente. Ahora que mirar para el futuro", zanjó el asunto el presidente blanco.
Pero Florentino tocó otros temas. Entre otros, el futuro regreso de Kaká, en el que el dirigente tiene depositadas muchas esperanzas: "Creo que vamos a ver a Kaká muy pronto jugando al fútbol como él sabe. Es un gran jugador, tuvo una pubalgia y luego tuvo la fatalidad de lesionarse la rodilla en el Mundial".
"He hablado con él y está en perfectas condiciones. Va a dar grandes satisfacciones y vamos a ver al gran Kaká. Creo que el Real Madrid tiene magníficos jugadores y si Kaká está en condiciones nos va dar grandes tardes de fútbol", añadió.
Florentino añadió que tiene "muchos sueños" para 2011 y que desea "hacerlos realidad. Tenemos un equipo joven, con talento y hambre, tenemos al mejor entrenador del mundo. Nos hacemos ilusiones con ganar en la primavera algún título", afirmó.
Elogios a Casillas, "un referente de la entidad" El presidente blanco intervino en Punto Radio con motivo de la entrega a Iker Casillas del Premio 'Protagonistas 2010 del Deporte'. Pérez se deshizo en elogios hacia el mostoleño, "un símbolo, un ejemplo y un referente en la entidad. Se ha formado en la cantera y da lealtad al club. Lleva el madridismo en el alma, es un hombre correcto que representa perfectamente los valores del Real Madrid y se merece todo lo logrado en su trayectoria deportiva", prosiguió.
"Mirarle a los ojos es contemplar la historia del Real Madrid, al mejor portero de la historia del Real Madrid y España, uno de los mejores de la historia, habría que reconocérselo con un 'Balón de Oro'. Es algo muy especial para el fútbol y el madridismo", comentó.
Además, descartó que el Barcelona pudiese fichar a Casillas. "Creo que el Barcelona tiene su estrategia y su identidad muy definidas. Es un magnífico club, y ambos respetan sus iconos y sus referentes. Lo vería más como una broma, como un piropo hacia Casillas".
Finalmente, el empresario advirtió que "todavía queda" mucho trabajo para cubrir el Santiago Bernabéu y que el objetivo es "modernizar la parte exterior" para convertir el recinto en "un edificio emblemático de Madrid. Cuando haya algo más concreto ya lo diremos. Estamos trabajando con el Ayuntamiento y en estos casos es mejor llevarlo desde la discreción", sentenció.

description.hltext_display: 이즈메이커, 아이폰용 게임 '심심이 츄츄' 출시
description.content:
네트워크 콘텐츠 전문 기업 이즈메이커(대표 최정회)는 자사에서 개발한 아이폰용 게임 '심심이 츄츄'를 새롭게 출시했다고 금일(22일) 밝혔다.
이번에 출시된 '심심이 츄츄'는 귀여운 심심이가 운전하는 츄츄기차를 조작해 화면 곳곳에 흩어져 있는 다른 심심이들을 하나씩 붙여가며 길이를 늘려가는 방식의 게임이다.
이 제품은 광고가 들어있는 무료 버전과 광고가 없는 유료 버전의 두 가지 형태로 출시되며, 게임의 내용은 동일하다.
이와 함께 이즈메이커는 제품의 출시를 기념해 게임 점수 기록을 캡처해 심심이 공식 트위터(twitter.com/@simsimi_kr)에 등록한 게이머들에게 점수집계 및 추첨을 통해 한정판 심심이 인형을 증정하는 이벤트를 실시한다.
이에 대한 자세한 사항은 이즈메이커 홈페이지(www.ismaker.com)에서 확인할 수 있다. 김형근 기자 noarose@gamedonga.co.krⓒ게임동아 & GameDonga.co.kr, 무단 전재 및 재배포 금지

description.hltext_display: Spider-Man stuntman injured during show
description.content:
A leading stuntman in the Broadway musical Spider-Man was recovering in hospital on Tuesday after falling from a high platform during a preview performance in yet another setback for the troubled musical.
An aerialist and stunt double for the title character in the show, Christopher Tierney, was taken to a nearby hospital after he fell about seven minutes before the end of the performance on Monday night, the show's spokesperson Rick Miramontez said in a statement.
The show has temporarily stopped production and will return to its normal schedule from Wednesday night, Miramontez added.
Show producers agreed to new safety protocols on Tuesday aftr meeting with the labor union Actors' Equity, as well as several government work and safety bodies.
Specifics of the new safety measures were not given.
Another show spokesperson declined to comment on Tierney's condition or reveal how the actor, who was performing as a stunt double for the masked Spider-Man character, plunged off the platform during a tense moment in the show.
After the performance, audience member Charlie Bernard told television station NY1 that he saw the cord or cable that was supposed to hold the actor was either not attached properly or snapped in a scene with Spider-Man's love interest, Mary Jane. "You just hear a bang. And then you hear the actress who plays Mary Jane, she was screaming and crying. The audience was a little disturbed and then everybody was quiet," he said. The fall is the latest mishap for the $65 million musical. Tierney is the fourth actor to be injured.
Two others were hurt during hi-tech flying sequences and actress Natalie Mendoza suffered a concussion earlier this month when she was hit by a rope while offstage. During the show's first preview performance, actors including Reeve Carney, who plays the title character, were stuck suspended in mid-air, forcing it to stop several times.
The musical written by U2 rockers Bono and The Edge is the most expensive Broadway show ever produced.
The two musicians are due to return to New York and work on the musical early in January.
Last week the opening of the musical was officially delayed again until February 7 for changes. It already had been delayed several times after running out of financing and experiencing technical problems.
While previews generally are a time for shows to fix problems, the number of injuries and technical glitches in the musical, whose full title is Spider-Man: Turn Off the Dark, has suffered is unusual on Broadway.

description.hltext_display: The model whisperer
description.author: Marie-Joelle Parent
description.content:
NEW YORK CITY - This is a guy that a number of men would gladly switch day jobs with for a few hours. After all, most of the stunning women featured in Sports Illustrated or on the Victoria's Secret catwalk have one thing in common: Justin Gelband, nicknamed 'The Model Whisperer.'
The personal trainer from New Jersey sculpts the bodies of over twenty top models in New York City. Yes, gentlemen, he let me into one of his training sessions.
"We all go to Justin," is what you heard backstage at the Victoria's Secret fashion show last month. The girls seemed to swear by him, saying he helped them get their nearly perfect physiques.
On a chilly December morning, the elevator doors open onto a private gym on Fifth Avenue near 14th street. It's the same gym where Quebec UFC star Georges St-Pierre trains when he's in the Big Apple.
And it's where Gelband performs his magic on the likes of Australian model Miranda Kerr, British model Rosie Huntington-Whiteley and U.S. model Lily Aldridge.
Now, sprawled on an exercise mat, is Sports Illustrated model and girlfriend to Maroon 5 singer Adam Levine, Anne Vyalitsyna. She's finishing up a workout session, her face covered in sweat.
As I speak with Gelband, she comes over, hugs him, plants a kiss on his cheek, tosses a fur coat over her shoulders and heads out the door.
"I'm very close to these girls, they are my best friends," says the 37-year-old trainer. So close in fact, that he sometimes gets uncomfortable when he sees their photo spreads in magazines.
"When they are not wearing much, it's embarrassing. They're like family," he says.
Just like mortals, models also have their insecurities.
"Listen, they are born beautiful but that doesn't mean they don't feel fat. I see it every day," maintains the man who was in charge of preparing eight girls for the Victoria's Secret show in November.
"Every single one of these girls is insecure. The number one insecurity is they think they are never good enough."
Models need to be trained differently from other clients because the standards are different.
"Inner thighs are probably the number one concern in the business," says Gelband. "Everyone talks constantly about the gap between the girls' legs."
His success, he says, is not only due to the variety and diversity of his training methods, but also in knowing what exercises to avoid.
"I don't want to take away anything from the style of my competitors, but I don't do lunges, jumps, crazy weights and dance moves - these girls can't afford to bulk," he says. "They are supposed to look like models."
And it certainly sounds like he's proud of his results.
"When I started this job in New York five years ago, I said to myself: 'I will break the trend and bring sexy back on the runway,'" he says.
He explains that the high fashion androgynous look created models who deny themselves a balanced diet, smoke like chimneys, and in some cases, take prescription drugs like Adderall or OxyContin to suppress their appetite.
"The pressure on them to be very, very, very skinny is constant. I'm fortunate because all the girls I train are Victoria's Secret and Sports Illustrated models."
Justin got his start training model Angela Lindvall.
"She had just given birth to her second child and had to lose 20 lbs in three months for a fashion show," he says.
She did, and from there his skills spread through the fashion world by word of mouth.
There was Bridget Hall and Canadian supermodel Coco Rocha. In 2007, Miranda Kerr came to see him to add curves to her tomboy frame.
"They wanted her to gain five to 10 pounds to look more voluptuous," says Justin.
And what does his girlfriend think of all this?
"I'm lucky to have a woman who is comfortable with who she is, but I have to say for a long time, the dating was really hard. Every woman was comparing themselves with the girls!"

description.hltext_display: april
description.content:
As you may have heard, though many people don?t seem to be giving it much attention, this year marks the 25th anniversary of Michael Jackson?s Thriller album. Now, thanks to a partnership between Michael Jackson, Epic/Legacy Records, Big Stage, and YouTube you will be able to star in your very own Thriller video. You heard me correctly?thanks to technology you can replace Michael Jackson with a 3D version of yourself.
To put yourself into your own Thriller video you need the latest version of Flash and three-close up photos of yourself taking with a digital camera. The video starring you is automatically created after you have uploaded the pictures. You can access the special ?My Thriller Video? by going to the and registering for a free account.
For those children of the 80?s or those who simply remember how popular Thriller was this will be a nice nostalgic journey. I must admit I would have loved to have switched places with Michael Jackson back in the 80?s, but not so much now. Now, putting myself in a Thriller video is probably as close as I want to get to becoming like Michael Jackson. Read more from the .

description.hltext_display: EDF : le CE s'impose un plan d' austérité drastique (presse)
description.content:
(AOF) - En état d'urgence financière, le Comité d'entreprise d' EDF Selon les "Echos", cette perte serait le résultat d'investissements contestés -comme l'OPA lancée en début d'année sur les campings Trigano -, mais aussi d'une gestion défaillante, régulièrement dénoncée par la Cour des comptes.
Le deuxième acteur mondial dans le domaine de l'électricité est né. Deux ans après la fusion entre Gaz de France et Suez, GDF Suez vient de reprendre le britannique International Power. Il est ainsi propulsé du neuvième au deuxième rang des producteurs mondiaux d'électricité, derrière EDF. Il devient également le leader mondial des groupes de services aux collectivités (utilities) en tenant compte de la production de gaz. Toutefois, cette opération va accroître la dette de GDF Suez, qui va passer de 33,5 à 42,4 milliards d'euros. Le groupe français compte donc lancer des cessions de 4 à 5 milliards d'euros. RBS a relevé son objectif de cours sur EDF de 36 euros à 40,70 euros tout en réitérant sa recommandation d'Achat. Le broker estime que le groupe français a cédé sa participation dans son homologue allemand EnBW à un bon prix. Mais l'opération suscite des questions sur la stratégie d'EDF. Les réponses devraient intervenir dans les mois à venir. Le bureau d'études a relevé de près de 5 euros son objectif de cours pour refléter la cession d'EnBW et une confiance accrue dans les perspectives du groupe en France, son principal marché.
D'après le consensus de marché calculé à la date du 15/12/2010, les analystes conseillent d'acheter le titre EDF. En effet, sur un total de 11 bureaux d'études ayant fourni des estimations, 9 sont à l'achat et 2 sont neutres. L'indice de recommandation AOF, reflétant l'avis moyen des analystes et s'étendant de -100% à +100%, est de 82%. Enfin, l'objectif de cours moyen est de 44,25 EUR. Le consensus précédent conseillait d'acheter la valeur .

description.hltext_display: Le renard collectionnait les souliers
description.content:
Le coupable a enfin été confondu, grâce à une caméra infrarouge. Il s’agit d’un renard, dont le butin – une centaine de souliers – a été retrouvé.
Et ce goupil fétichiste ne faisait pas la fine gueule: que les modèles soient chers ou bon marché, en cuir ou en plastique, le prédateur semblait tout autant les apprécier.

description.hltext_display: 広島県が暴力団排除条例案を可決 一般市民も氏名公表
미르의 전설2, 신규 지역 업데이트 실시
description.content:
위메이드 엔터테인먼트(공동대표 서수길, 박관호 / 이하 위메이드)는 자사에서 개발 및 서비스 중인 롤플레잉 온라인게임 '미르의 전설2'에 신규 지역인 '호중천'과 '석초광산'을 새롭게 업데이트한다고 금일(22일) 밝혔다.
먼저 '항아리 속 하늘'이라는 뜻의 '호중천'은 별세계나 신천지를비유하는 고사성어에서 온 명칭으로, 항아리 속 세계로 들어가 항아리 몬스터를 사냥하며 신비로운 전장을 경험할 수 있다.
다음으로 '석초광석'은 기존의 아이템을 강화하고 색다른 아이템을 제조할 수 있는 '녹광석'을 채집할 수 있다.
위메이드의 이경호 본부장은 "올해 초 '남만'을 선 보인 이후 오랜만에 야심차게 준비한 신규 지역을 공개하게 됐다"며 "이번 업데이트를 통해 한층 더 새로워진 '미르의 전설2'가 이용자들의 신년을 책임지겠다"고 말했다.
이에 대한 자세한 사항은 '미르의 전설2' 홈페이지(www.mir2.co.kr)에서 확인할 수 있다. 김형근 기자 noarose@gamedonga.co.krⓒ게임동아 & GameDonga.co.kr, 무단 전재 및 재배포 금지

description.hltext_display: PRESS DIGEST - New York Times business news - Dec 22
description.content:
n"Dec 22 (Reuters) - The following were the top stories in The New York Times business pages on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
* Critics said a tide of lawsuits accusing banks of wrongfully breaking into homes reinforced their claim that the foreclosure process is fundamentally flawed.
* Sales at Sears Holdings (SHLD.O
* The U.S. House of Representatives gave final approval on Tuesday to a long-awaited modernization of the nation's food safety laws, voting 215 to 144 to grant the Food and Drug Administration greater authority over food production.
* Deutsche Bank (DBKGn.DE
* Want to watch hours of YouTube videos or sort through Facebook photos on the computer? Your Internet providers would be forbidden from blocking you under rules approved by the Federal Communications Commission on Tuesday. But if you want to do the same on your cellphone, you may not have the same protections.
* Sending a sharp warning to employers nationwide, the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission sued the Kaplan Higher Education Corp on Tuesday, accusing it of discriminating against black job applicants through the way it uses credit histories in its hiring process.
* The New York attorney general on Tuesday sued Ernst & Young, accusing the accounting firm of helping Lehman Brothers, its client, "engage in a massive accounting fraud" by misleading investors about the investment bank's financial health.
* The National Labor Relations Board is weighing a requirement that companies give their workers information about their ability to unionize under federal law.
* The New York School Construction Authority has swooped in to take advantage of lower construction costs, amenable landlords and available land.

description.hltext_display: Egypt's economy to grow steadily
description.content:
Egypt's economy will grow steadily over the next two years thanks to growing private investment but the expansion will be slower than that forecast by government officials, a Reuters poll showed.
The survey of 12 economists predicted gross domestic product (GDP) in the Arab world's most populous nation would grow 5.4 percent in the fiscal year ending June 2011, based on the median figure. Egypt's economy is seen growing faster than all Gulf states except Qatar.
Forecasts from 13 economists showed it would grow 5.5 percent the year after, boosted by more private investment and a recovery in Suez Canal and tourism revenue.
"We forecast very steady growth, mainly due to domestic demand and private consumption as well as growth in private investments," said Mohamed Rahmy, economist at Beltone Financial.
"There is also a gradual recovery in external sectors including the Suez Canal revenues, tourism and non-oil exports."
The poll forecasts are well below the annual rates of more than 7 percent that Egypt had posted before the global financial crisis hit and the 6 percent annual rate that economists say Egypt must sustain to create jobs.
Egypt's finance minister said last week he expected the economy to grow by 7 percent in the financial year from July 2011, and 6 percent this year.
Egypt lowered its GDP growth figure for the last fiscal year that ended June 30, 2010 to 5.1 percent from a previously stated 5.3 percent.
The poll forecast inflation would accelerate to an average of 11.4 percent in the 2010/2011 financial year, before falling to 10 percent the year after.
Economists expect rising food prices to push up inflation in this fiscal year, but with a contained effect the year after.
"We expect that supply shocks will subside, and we see limited impact of vegetable and meat supply shocks on inflation," said Mohamed Abu Basha, an economist at investment bank EFG-Hermes.
Urban consumer price inflation, the most closely watched indicator of prices, fell in the year to November to its lowest in 15 months at 10.2 percent.
The Central Bank of Egypt held its benchmark overnight lending rate steady at 9.75 percent at its last meeting on December 16, saying inflation was contained but that limited investment and concerns over the global recovery could weigh on the economy.
The Egyptian pound, which fell this week to its weakest level against the US dollar since February 2005 to 5.8021, is seen remaining relatively steady at 5.80 for the financial year ending in June 2011 and the year after. - Reuters

event_or_fact.property: We expect that supply shocks will subside, and we see limited impact of vegetable and meat supply shocks on inflation

We forecast very steady growth, mainly due to domestic demand and private consumption as well as growth in private investments; There is also a gradual recovery in external sectors including the Suez Canal revenues, tourism and non-oil exports.

description.hltext_display: Séances de gym imposées aux ouvriers
description.content:
L’entreprise de construction Losinger mobilise ses employés le matin. Meilleure concentration et moins d’accidents garantis.
Des exercices effectués avant de commencer le travail permettent de se chauffer les muscles. (photo: dr)
L’image ressemble un peu à un ballet. Sauf que les protagonistes portent un casque de chantier et que la scène se déroule au pied d’un bâtiment en construction. Et l’exercice se répète chaque matin: les travailleurs se déhanchent, font des moulinets avec leurs bras, plient les genoux ou encore se frappent la poitrine.
«Nos ouvriers suivent une dizaine d’exercices spécialement concoctés par des physiothérapeutes ou des ergothérapeutes», explique Alejandro Segovia, porte-parole de Losinger. Depuis que le pro­gramme a débuté, la concentration des ouvriers a augmenté tandis que le nombre d’accidents a diminué. Avec, à la clé, une baisse­ des primes accidents de 300 000 fr. La pratique n’est pas tout à fait nouvelle.
Depuis 2009, au centre intercommunal de logistique de Lausanne, les employés font douze minutes d’éveil musculaire chaque matin à 6 h 30, juste avant de prendre leur service. Ce programme de la Caisse nationale d’assu­rance accidents (Suva) mobi­lise 90 personnes chargées de l’enlèvement des déchets.
(mar/jbm)

description.hltext_display: 自民、小沢氏の証人喚問を要求 仙谷長官の辞任も
이세돌 9단, 2년 만에 바둑대상 MVP 등극
description.content:
’쎈돌’ 이세돌이 2년만에 ’바둑대상 MVP’를 탈환했다.
이세돌 9단은 21일 강남구 역삼동 GS타워 1층 아모리스룸에서 열린 ’2010 바둑대상 시상식’에서 바둑기자단과 인터넷 기자단 투표에서 유효투표 29표 중 19표를 얻어 6표에 그친 박정환 8단을 제치고 영예의 대상을 수상했다.
2000년에 32연승을 올리며 바둑대상의 전신인 바둑문화상 최우수기사상을 수상, 입단 후 처음으로 MVP에 올랐던 이세돌은 이로써 통산 6회 MVP에 올랐다. 11회의 이창호, 8회의 조훈현에 이은 3번째 기록이다.
이세돌은 사전에 실시된 인터넷 팬 투표에서도 총 1만9천710표 중 9천815표의 지지를 받아 5천222표의 이창호 9단과 4천673표의 박정환 9단을 크게 앞질렀다.
지난 해 6개월간의 휴직을 끝내고 올해 1월에 바둑계에 돌아온 이세돌은 휴직이 휴식이 된 듯 연초부터 펄펄 날았다. 복귀하자마자 24연승을 구가하며 자신의 13번째 세계대회 타이틀인 비씨카드배를 품었고, 약세를 보여왔던 이창호를 상대로 물가정보배 우승컵도 들어올렸다. 또한 11월에는 국내최대기전인 KT배에서도 초대우승자에 이름을 올리며 3관왕에 등극하는 등 최고의 한해를 보냈다.
수상자로 선정된 뒤 이세돌은 “딸 혜림이에게 자랑할 일이 생겨서 기쁘다. 내년에도 동료기사들이 많이 봐줬으면 좋겠다”며 엄살을 떤 후 “이 상은 내년에는 중국의 기세를 꺾어달라는 의미로 받아들이겠다. 한국 바둑팬들이 두 다리 뻗고 주무실 수 있도록 해 주겠다”며 ’쎈돌’다운 소감을 밝혔다.
생애 한번뿐인 신인왕에는 박지연 2단이 올랐다.
박지연은 삼성화재배 16강으로 토종여류기사로는 세계대회의 가장 높은 고지까지 올랐고 정관장배 한국대표로 선발됐다. 지지옥션배 4연승, 여류기성전 준우승으로 올 한해 34승(20패)을 올려 여류기사 중에는 박지은 9단에 이어 다승2위에 오르는 등 남자기사 못지않은 맹활약을 펼쳤다. 여자기사가 신인왕에 오른 것은 처음이다.
한 해 동안 인상적인 활약을 펼친 기사에게 수여하는 감투상은 허영호 8단이 받았다.
허영호는 십단과 천원 등 2관왕의 박정환과 경합을 벌였으나 12월에 삼성화재배와 춘란배에서 인상깊은 남기며 2표차로 감투상을 차지했다.
시니어기사상은 국가대표 감독으로 아시안게임 금메달 3개를 휩쓴 양재호 9단이 차지했고 이슬아 2단은 여자기사상을 받았다.
비씨카드배와 하이원리조트배 명인전, KT배 등 오픈기전에서 프로들을 상대로 9승3패를 거뒀던 박영롱 아마7단은 아마기사상을 차지했다.
한편 기록부문은 이세돌 9단이 휩쓸었다.
이세돌은 다승부문에서는 75승을 올리며 공동2위인 박영훈과 허영호(60승)를 큰 차이로 따돌리고 1위에 올랐다. 승률은 82.4%, 연승에서는 24연승으로 모두 1위를 차지한 이세돌은 역대 11번째로 전 기록부문을 석권했다. 이세돌은 춘란배 참가로 연기된 GS칼텍스배 예선이 연내에 최다 3판이 예정돼 있어 다승과 승률기록은 더욱 늘어날 전망이다.
또한 누적상금도 5억9천550만원(21일 현재)을 벌어들이며 2위 이창호(3억7천450만원)를 누르고 상금킹을 확정지었고 최다대국에서도 91국을 기록해 비시상부문까지 포함하면 5관왕의 대기록을 작성했다.
강신호 동아쏘시오그룹회장과 최종준 대한체육회 사무총장은 공로상을 받았다.

description.hltext_display: El padre de Canales asegura que el jugador no se irá en invierno
description.content:
· "Ya habíamos decidido hace algunos días que Sergio continúe en Madrid buscando su oportunidad" · "Un club tan exigente te lleva a esta situación tan difícil, es el peaje de estar en un club grande"Ángel Canales, padre y representante de Sergio Canales, asegura que "en cierta manera" se esperaban que el futbolista no gozara de demasiados minutos en el Real Madrid, porque el club blanco es "muy exigente", al tiempo que recalca que no piensan en una cesión en el mercado de invierno.
"Realmente, tratándose de un club tan grande como el Real Madrid esta situación nos la esperábamos en cierta manera. Lo del verano, con Sergio copando todas las portadas de los periódicos no era normal. Todo eran halagos. Un club tan exigente te lleva a esta situación tan difícil. Ir con 19 años a un equipo como el Real Madrid es muy exigente a todos los niveles", destacó en declaraciones 'Onda Cero Cantabria'.
Por eso, señala que no le dan "vueltas" a esta situación, como tampoco quieren pensar en que la recuperación de Kaká sea más competencia. "Particularizar en un jugador o en un puesto determinado no vale la pena. En un club de este nivel siempre va a haber un compañero que juegue igual o mejor que tú. Siempre va a existir ese inconveniente porque es el peaje de estar en un club grande", argumenta.
"Kaká es uno más allí y nuestra idea es seguir trabajando para que llegue una oportunidad y que cuando llegue, tratar de aprovecharla de la mejor manera. Ahora, debe tener paciencia. Él está contento en el club y con su vida en Madrid. Entrena a diario con gente de muchísimo nivel. Indudablemente, sería mejor que tuviera minutos, pero la situación es difícil y debe pelear para que cambie", añade.
Además, confirma que en no tiene pensamiento de que el jugador se marche cedido en el mercado de invierno. "Ya habíamos decidido hace algunos días que Sergio continúe en Madrid buscando su oportunidad", sentenció.
En cualquier caso, la opción del regresar al Racing de Santander está descartada, sobre todo después de que el presidente del club cántabro, Francisco Pernía, acusara a Ángel Canales de querer jubilarse de forma prematura a costa de su hijo. "Sus declaraciones se califican por sí solas. Según han presentado las cuentas del Racing, la operación de Sergio ha dado al club un beneficio de más de tres millones y medio de euros, aunque la operación haya sido cercana a los seis millones (la otra parte le corresponde al Deportivo), por lo que el Racing tiene como mínimo tres millones y medio de razones para estar agradecido a la familia Canales", sentencia.
Además, recuerda que Canales se podía haber marchado gratis del Racing. "Pero nosotros siempre pusimos por delante en cualquier negociación que el Racing tuviera que intervenir. Los clubes que no aceptaran eso, quedaban descartados automáticamente. Cada uno es muy libre de decir y pensar lo que quiera. Las palabras de Pernía ni las entiendo ni las entenderé nunca. Yo sé lo que ha ocurrido. En el Racing no puede haber nadie que ponga un pero a la salida de Sergio. Creo que, como mínimo, nos hemos portado muy bien", recalca.
Finalmente, asegura que no sabe por qué el Racing no le hizo antes un contrato profesional a su hijo: "Ésa es una pregunta para el club. Mucho tiempo antes de que Sergio explotara con el primer equipo, quisimos saber cuál era la idea que el club tenía sobre el futuro del jugador". "Se tardó demasiado y luego las cosas fueron como fueron. Tengo la conciencia muy tranquila. Sergio podía haber salido del Racing de otras maneras. Que te lo agradezcan o no, queda para la conciencia de cada uno", concluyó.

description.hltext_display: Coeur de rocker : après le concert samedi, les associations ont reçu les cadeaux, hier
description.content:
Actualité Saint Pol El Manos a enfin pu se produire à Saint-Pol, après une annulation cet été à cause de la pluie.
| SOLIDARITÉ |
Pour la première fois dans le Ternois, un concert de solidarité avait lieu samedi à la salle des fêtes. ...
Modèle connu dans la région lilloise sous le nom « Le père Noël est-il un rockeur ». Samedi, c'est « Coeur de rocker », qui a été lancé par l'association Ternois événement de Pierre Lalin, en partenariat avec le conseil général du Pas-de-Calais et la municipalité.
Le public devait offrir un jouet neuf en guise d'entrée, afin de redistribuer ensuite ces cadeaux à des enfants défavorisés. En échange, deux concerts : El manos et Delbi. El manos, déjà déprogrammé cet été au parc du Château à cause des conditions climatiques, a cette fois affronté la neige. Seul avec sa guitare, aidé d'un looper et de quelques instruments originaux, pour un résultat bluffant.
Dans un autre style, Delbi and the three fantastics, plus « rock », a trouvé également son public. Un public trop peu nombreux à cause des routes glissantes, ce qui reste le seul regret de Pierre Lalin : « L'affiche est belle, ça manque juste de monde ». Rendez-vous désormais en avril, pour les Frigorythmiks, en attendant peut-être la deuxième édition de « Coeur de rocker ».
Hier, après la musique, place à l'organisation de la chaîne de la solidarité. Pierre Lalin, des élus et des responsables d'associations étaient réunis rue de Fruges pour réceptionner les cadeaux.
Dans la hotte des rockeurs, des peluches, des poupées, des figurines... Les associations vont maintenant pouvoir s'atteler à la distribution des présents à la veille des fêtes. Les comptes devront être faits et les cadeaux répartis entre la Croix-Rouge, les Restos du coeur et le Secours populaire. Des associations qui ne baissent pas leurs rideaux entre Noël et nouvel an, comme les Restos qui assurent même pendant cette période une distribution hebdomadaire de denrées alimentaires. Mardi, à côté des jouets, les bénévoles de l'association créée par Coluche empilaient les boîtes de conserve, déchargées du camion comme toutes les semaines. •

description.hltext_display: 하이원, 삼국지존 영웅 업데이트 및 신규 서버 오픈
description.content:
하이원엔터테인먼트(대표 이학재)는 큐빅스튜디오(대표 최웅규)가 개발하고 자사가 서비스 중인 전략시뮬레이션웹게임 삼국지존의 신규 서버 오픈 및 캐릭터 업데이트를 실시한다고 금일(22일) 밝혔다.
'삼국지존'은 하이원엔터테인먼트의 첫 번째 웹게임으로 지난 11월30일에 오픈베타를 시작하여 현재까지 좋은 성과를 올리고 있다. 이와 같은 성과에 대해 하이원엔터테인먼트에서는 모든 브라우저에서 가능한 웹게임이라는 점과 수백여 가지의 영웅카드를 통해 다양한 전략과 전술이 가능하다는 점을 성공요인으로 꼽고 있다.
하이원엔터테인먼트는 더욱 원활한 게임 환경을 만들기 위해 제갈량, 서서, 손상향 등 50명의 신규 영웅 업데이트와 함께 신규 서버 '장안'을 오픈하고, 이를 기념하여 3가지 이벤트를 실시한다.
이번에 실시하는 '신규 영웅들과 함께 장안을 평정하라' 이벤트는 게임을 보다 재미있게 즐길 수 있도록 게임 내에서 사용할 수 있는 아이템 증정을 위주로 진행할 예정이다. 첫 번째 '장안을 평정하라'는 신규 서버 '장안'에 군주를 생성하는 모두에게 '우수 영웅 즉시 영입' 아이템 5개를 증정한다.
또한, '군주여, 포상을 받아라'를 통해 29일까지 생성된 모든 군주에게 게임 내에서 사용할 수 있는 게임 머니 200큐빅을 지급한다. 마지막 이벤트인 '토벌령을 완수하라'는 게임 내에서 토벌령 퀘스트를 완수하면 다양한 아이템이 들어있는 '보따리'를 지급할 예정이다.
하이원엔터테인먼트 사업팀 박종국 과장은 "수많은 웹게임 속에서 삼국지존을 사랑해주셔서 감사하다. 이번에 실시하는 서버 오픈가 장수 업데이트 등 앞으로도 끊임없이 서비스 질 향상과 다양한 업데이트를 통해 장수하는 웹게임으로 자리매김하고 싶다"고 소감을 밝혔다.
업데이트 및 신규 서버에 대한 자세한 내용은 삼국지존 홈페이지(sam.hionegame.com)에서 확인할 수 있다. 최호경 기자 neoncp@gamedonga.co.krⓒ게임동아 & GameDonga.co.kr, 무단 전재 및 재배포 금지

description.hltext_display: Débat d'orientation budgétaire 2011 : faudra se serrer la ceinture...
description.content:
Au final, c'est le journal de 20 h qui s'était invité, lui aussi, au débat valenciennois. Le grand vent de la planète comme elle tourne, la litanie des tristes nouvelles boursières égrenée depuis des semaines, des mois, par tous les bulletins télévisés. C'est bien le vent mauvais des marchés financiers qui a pesé de tout son poids sur le débat d'orientation budgétaire, une figure imposée à travers laquelle, chaque année, le conseil se projette et jette les grandes bases de son budget à venir. Le porte-monnaie de la ville, pour 2011, en somme.
Il sera efflanqué, disons le tout net. L'adjointe aux finances, Michèle Vaur, n'a pas tourné autour du pot. Elle a rappelé toute l'infernale mécanique. Un : les marchés reprochent au ventre mou des pays européens d'être trop endetté. La fameuse crise des dettes souveraines. Deux : l'État français, visé comme d'autres, serre les dents et verrouille toutes les dépenses. Trois : toutes, et en particulier, ce que l'État reverse aux collectivités locales, dont Valenciennes. Qui devra donc se serrer la ceinture. Heureusement la Ville estime-t-elle avoir singulièrement musclé sa gestion financière ces dernières années. En 2011, elle ne fera plus comme lors des années d'opulence, enfin façon de parler. Pour présenter le budget 2011, on attendra début 2011, en partant des recettes estimées au plus juste, c'est plus prudent.
En aparté, avant le conseil, Dominique Riquet lui-même l'avait dit. Budget encore un peu plus difficile que d'habitude, tous les indicateurs (sauf la dette de la ville, stabilisée) étant au rouge. Soit un global de dotations État (environ 15 millions d'euros) revenant au niveau de... 2007. Les autres partenaires, type conseil général, eux aussi étranglés. Des dépenses (énergétiques, sociales) qui continuent d'augmenter, tout comme la masse salariale, par simple effet de l'ancienneté. Même les démolitions de l'ANRU impactent aujourd'hui les recettes fiscales.
Jean-Claude Dulieu a pris le mors au dent. Dés pipés par la politique fiscale de Sarkozy, qui fait glisser la pression des entreprises vers les ménages. « Il faut refuser cette austérité, criminelle pour l'emploi ». Bernard Frimat a porté le fer. « Budget contraint, ajoutant la crise à la crise ». Et à l'adresse de Dominique Riquet. « Vous êtes victimes d'une politique. Mais vous êtes solidaires du gouvernement ». Réponse du maire. « Solidaire de la politique de désendettement, oui ».
Cri du coeur de Nathalie Laurette : ne sanctionnez pas les associations. Ni les dépenses sociales de solidarité. Réponse du maire. Oui, la solidarité sera préservée. Tant au niveau du budget de fonctionnement (le guichet du centre communal d'action sociale). Que des investissements (l'effort de l'ANRU vers les quartiers). Mais pour le reste, oui, il faudra bien regarder tous les postes de dépenses, tous, pour limiter au maximum une éventuelle hausse de l'imposition locale. •

description.hltext_display: 未着工新幹線の年内判断見送りへ 国交相、年明け以降に
'Crisis heeft permanent effect op levenscyclus computerapparatuur'
description.content:
Artikelgereedschap
De recessie heeft er zeker toe bijgedragen dat bedrijven de gebruikscyclus van hun pc's, laptops en servers hebben opgerekt, maar die tendens kon wel eens blijvend zijn.
Twee recente onderzoeken wijzen op verandering in het vervangingsbeleid van computerhardware. In de onderzoeken werden it-beslissers van in totaal zo'n 1.300 Amerikaanse bedrijven gevraagd welke aankoop van it-producten zij afgelopen jaar hebben uitgesteld.
Uitstel is geen afstel
Met 49 procent van de respondenten stond de pc bovenaan de lijst van het onderzoek onder ruim 1.100 bedrijvan dat werd uitgevoerd door onderzoeksbureau Richard Day Research, in opdracht van een hardwareleverancier. Maar voor volgend jaar ziet het beeld er totaal anders uit: 55 procent van de ondervraagden gaf aan komend jaar wel weer nieuwe pc's te zullen aanschaffen.
Nieuwe flexibiliteit
De onderzoeksresultaten wijzen er deels op, dat bedrijven volgend jaar uitgestelde investeringen in hardware alsnog gaan inhalen, maar tonen ook een nieuw soort flexibiliteit in het nemen van zakelijke inkoopbeslissingen. Alles wijst erop dat de vervangingscycli worden opgerekt, zonder dat dat kennelijk al te grote problemen oplevert.
'De recessie heeft veel cfo's doen inzien, dat de levenscyclus van hardware langer kan zijn dan wat it-managers en leveranciers hen in het verleden hebben verteld,' zei Bob Houghton, president van Redemtech, een Amerikaans refurbishingbedrijf uit Columbus, Ohio, dat jaarlijks enkele miljoenen afgeschreven pc's en servers opknapt en opnieuw aan de man brengt. Volgens hem is er al enkele jaren een ontwikkeling gaande, waarbij de gebruiksduur van hardware langer wordt, maar de recessie heeft die beweging versterkt.
Een of twee jaar langer
Redemtech heeft zelf ook een onderzoek gedaan onder zo'n 180 bedrijven, waaronder ook een groot aantal niet-klanten van het bedrijf. Uit dat onderzoek blijkt dat het idee, dat bedrijven laptops hooguit drie jaar gebruiken, niet meer opgaat. Bij ruim 40 procent is dat weliswaar nog wel het geval, maar ruim 30 procent ververst eens in de vier jaar, terwijl nog eens 20 procent van de bedrijven vijf jaar of langer met dezelfde laptops blijft werken. Desktops worden door 39 procent van de bedrijven om de vier jaar vervangen, iets meer dan 30 procent gebruikt ze vijf jaar of langer.
En ruim 60,5 procent van de respondenten gebruikt hun servers langer dan vijf jaar.
Gartner
Volgens Houghton is dat mede mogelijk omdat in de afgelopen jaren de kwaliteit van de hardware aanzienlijk is verbeterd.
Gartner analist Raphael Vasquez onderschrijft de conclusies dat de recessie een belangrijke factor is voor het langer worden van de levenscyclus van pc's, zowel in de zakelijke als particuliere markt. Gartner verwacht wel dat de investeringen in pc's de komende 2 jaar weer omhoog zullen gaan omdat apparatuur nu eenmaal ouder en ouder wordt, en ook omdat de ondersteuning van Microsoft Windows XP afloopt.
Volgens Vasquez staat het buiten kijf dat de levenscycli langer worden. De vraag is wel of ze alleen maar langer worden vanwege de recessie. Of komt het omdat meer mensen tablet-pc's kopen, of omdat de aanwezige pc's minder worden gebruikt omdat mensen voor een deel andere platforms of smartphones voor hun werk gebruiken?
Ook John Spooner, analyst van Technology Business Research, is van mening dat steeds meer mensen de gebruiksduur van hun laptop van drie naar vier of vijf jaar oprekken. Veel bedrijven gaan inmiddels uit van een levendsuur van vier jaar. 'Met de kwaliteit van de hardware van tegenwoordig hoeft dat geen probleem te zijn,' stelt Spooner.

description.hltext_display: Lakers look like deer in headlights against Bucks
description.author: Elliott Teaford
description.content:
In last game before Christmas Day affair with Heat, L.A. looks nothing like champs in loss to Milwaukee; Bryant gets ejected
Posted: 12/21/2010 11:52:48 PM PST
In last game before Christmas Day affair with Heat, L.A. looks nothing like champs in loss to Milwaukee; Bryant gets ejected
Kobe Bryant looks back and has a few choice words to the referee, who then called a double technical foul on the Lakers star and ejected him. The Lakers were defeated by the Milwaukee Bucks 98-79 Tuesday at Staples Center. (John McCoy/Staff Photographer)
The Lakers forgot about the game before THE GAME.
It was such an obvious trap game the Lakers huddled after their morning shootaround Tuesday to remind themselves they had to play against the Milwaukee Bucks that night at Staples Center before meeting the Miami Heat on Saturday.
Lakers coach Phil Jackson said he didn't have to say a word about looking past Milwaukee to Miami and about handling their business against the lackluster Bucks before their possible NBA Finals preview against the Heat.
"They did it on their own, at the huddle, after the walkthrough this morning," Jackson said. "It was mentioned, like, 'Don't mess around and let this game get away from us and ruin what we're trying to do on Christmas.'"
In
GO INSIDE THE LAKERS:
For the best around-the-clock coverage of the Lakers, visit our Inside the Lakers blog.
the end, the Lakers talked a far better game than they played in falling to the Bucks 98-79 and ending their five-game winning streak with a lifeless clunker that had many in a sellout crowd of 18,997 booing in the closing minutes.
The Bucks outscored the Lakers 26-13 in the fourth quarter.
The Lakers had more turnovers (18) than assists (17).
"I told them I didn't think they could play any worse than that," Jackson said.
Kobe Bryant's day started and ended poorly. He was involved in what Jackson called a "fender-bender" and arrived about 30 minutes late to the team's shootaround. Then he didn't stick around for the finish of the game.
Bryant drew two technical fouls and an automatic ejection after he was
called for an offensive foul with the Lakers trailing the Bucks 92-77 with 2:07 remaining. He scored a team-leading 21 points on 9-for-16 shooting.
He left the arena without speaking to reporters after his first ejection since March 26, 2008, against the Charlotte Bobcats.
"Frustration," Jackson said when asked about Bryant's late-game outburst. "Just being frustrated. The referees are only human. They see the other team outwork you, they're going to give them the benefit of the doubt."
Lamar Odom, who didn't attend the team's shootaround because he was feeling ill, also tried to make a hasty postgame exit. But a group of reporters stopped him in the hallway before he could leave the locker room.
"We just didn't play well," he said. "We could have lost to anybody tonight, anybody in the league. We've played in big games before.
"We understand you've got to take care of the game that's in front of you, but we didn't."
Odom scored 12 points, grabbed 10 rebounds and added six assists in a team-leading 37:44. Pau Gasol had 15 points and 11 rebounds.
Bryant, Gasol and Odom were the only Lakers to score in double figures.
After treading water for the better part of the game, the Lakers were within 72-66 going into the fourth quarter. Instead of surging, as they so often have this season when it matters most, the Lakers went ker-plunk down the stretch.
They trailed 82-72 after Earl Boykins hit a 3-pointer and Luc Richard Mbah a Moute followed with a jumper on consecutive possessions midway through the fourth quarter. Moments later, Andrew Bogut's layup extended Milwaukee's lead to 85-72.
The Lakers paid a steep price for their inattention to details. For instance, their offense went stagnant far too often, particularly after they fell behind by double digits in the fourth quarter and failed to catch up.
"We stopped moving the ball," Jackson said, pinpointing what went wrong. "We started playing individual basketball. I think one of the things about us is we have to analyze our individual games and how it applies to what we're doing as a group."
Asked to expand on his final thought, Jackson said, "It's a part of these things that are self-evident that can be corrections that teams go through. Then you can use some of the things that happened in the game as a starting point to get better, or whatever you want to do to help a team along. But this game was a wake-up game of sorts for our team."
Milwaukee ended a six-game losing streak against the Lakers, thanks in large part to the 5-foot-5 Boykins, who scored 13 of his team-high 22 points in the fourth quarter. John Salmons added 20 points and Ersan Ilyasova had 17 points and 11 rebounds.

description.hltext_display: Calmy-rey défend l'indépendance du Kosovo
description.content:
Micheline Calmy-Rey défend la prompte reconnaissance par la Suisse de l'indépendance du Kosovo, en dépit des accusations portées contre l'actuel premier ministre Hashim Thaci.
La déclaration d'indépendance du Kosovo ne dépend pas de l'actuel premier ministre Hashim Thaci, a déclaré Micheline Calmy-Rey. (photo: Keystone)
Sur ce sujet
Berne a rapidement exigé que Pristina respecte les règles de l'état de droit, souligne-t-elle.
M. Thaci, ancien chef de la guérilla indépendantiste de l'Armée de libération du Kosovo (UCK), «n'est chef du gouvernement que depuis janvier 2008. La déclaration d'indépendance et sa reconnaissance par de nombreux Etats ne dépendent pas de sa personne», a déclaré la conseillère fédérale dans une interview publiée mercredi par le «Tages-Anzeiger» et le «Bund».
La Suisse n'a pas été le premier Etat à reconnaître l'indépendance de l'ancienne province serbe, mais «le 30e ou le 31e», a souligné la cheffe du Département fédéral des affaires étrangères (DFAE). «L'Autriche l'a fait avant nous, si cela vous rassure», a-t-elle ajouté.
«Mais nous avons sûrement été les premiers à dire à l'ONU qu'il fallait parler de l'indépendance du Kosovo», a rappelé la cheffe de la diplomatie helvétique. Il s'agissait alors, après la guerre au Kosovo, de stabiliser la région.
(ats)

description.hltext_display: Namibia: A Year GIPF Would Want to Forget
description.content:
THE year 2010 is one the Government Institutions Pension Fund (GIPF) would like to forget, largely because of the continued fallout from its failed Development Capital Portfolio (DCP), which it thought it had laid to rest four years ago.
DCP loans were given to 16 start-up projects, which in many instances were backed by politically connected 'entrepreneurs'. GIPF suffered approximately N$650 million in capital losses and a "further approximately N$1,2 billion in opportunity costs - a total loss therefore, of over N$1,8 billion", according to Namfisa.
The resurrection of the DCP scandal caught Government and the GIPF off guard and remains the talk of the nation six months after the revelations were made. Government was forced to act, although timidly in many observers' eyes.
Auditor General Junias Kandjeke was appointed to preside over a forensic audit into the DCP. He appointed a local auditing firm to do the investigations. What perplexed the public was the rejection of a request by Prime Minister Nahas Angula for two board members, the CEO, the investments general manager and investment manager of GIPF to take voluntary leave while the audit is being done.
What became clear is that the GIPF board and its senior management are only answerable to themselves and not even to the PM's office, which is represented on the board by two people, has the power to recall them. It's not only Government that claims its hands are tied. The Namibia Financial Institutions Supervisory Authority (Namfisa), the regulator responsible for GIPF, also claims that it has no power to take appropriate action, despite legislation empowering it to do so.
Namfisa in 2006 kick-started investigations into the DCP and appointed a South African forensic auditing firm to probe the failed programme. It was the Namfisa report that concluded that DCP was "fatally flawed" and uncovered damning evidence regarding both the companies that benefited and some GIFP trustees' conduct, as it found that the GIPF had done virtually nothing to recover workers' pension money when these projects went bust.
The regulator briefed both Prime Minister Angula and Finance Minister Saara Kuugongelwa-Amadhila in 2007 about the DCP flop. The regulator recommended that a presidential commission of inquiry be instituted and the board and management of GIPF be replaced. It was also recommended that those responsible for not repaying DCP loans be brought to book.
Angula claimed that he was only briefed but was not given recommendations to act, but The Namibian obtained his briefing documents and discovered that recommendations were indeed made to the Prime Minister.
Those in the know said that most of the businesspeople who benefited from the DCP were politically well connected. It is believed that Angula and President Hifikepunye Pohamba feared that should Government take steps against those businesspeople, they might also have to take steps against certain politicians and the move might be seen as a witch-hunt, as the Swapo Party was in a crisis ahead of the 2007 congress, which saw Angula almost losing his seat in the party's Politburo. Even the Anti-Corruption Commission at first denied having been briefed about the DCP, but The Namibian was leaked a letter dated June 2007 indicating that the ACC was briefed on the DCP three years ago. Government was finally forced to take action after pressure from the workers' unions and party structures ahead of the November regional and local government elections. In October Cabinet decided to freeze GIPF's four-billion-dollar Unlisted Investment Policy, which was hedged to replace the infamous DCP, after it emerged that some of the entities or individuals behind companies lined up for the new scheme were the same people who had benefited from DCP. It was at the same meeting that Cabinet assigned Angula to preside over a forensic audit of the DCP.
The decision to freeze the unlisted investment policy was not well received and led to the resignation of GIPF board chairman Hartmut Ruppel. Ruppel resigned because he felt Cabinet's decision to instruct the GIPF board not to follow through on trustee decisions and commitments made his position as Government-appointed trustee on the board "untenable" and showed that Government had no faith in the trustees.
Before Government's halted the dishing out of funds under the new investment scheme, Ruppel publicly gave assurances that GIPF won't make the same mistakes it had made under the DCP and that investment managers, and no longer GIPF trustees, would approve these "investments".
Business partners in the new scheme criticised Government, saying the move could have legal repercussions as the GIPF board could be sued for acting on pressure from outside.
Ruppel's resignation was followed a month later by that of GIPF's investment and finance general manager, Neville Field. Field is serving a three-month notice period before leaving GIPF at the end of January. The unions and the workers were the other dimension to the GIPF saga which was ignited in July this year. In fact the unions have been blamed for the resurrection of the DCP ghost.
Union leaders accused National Union of Namibian Workers (NUNW) secretary general Evilastus Kaaronda of using the DCP to retain his position at the NUNW congress held early in September. Despite the federation's central executive attempts to keep the GIPF DCP issue off the congress agenda, pressure from the delegates led to it being discussed.
The main casualty at the congress was general secretary of the Namibia Public Workers' Union (Napwu), Peter Nevonga, and those he supported. Nevonga is the longest-serving GIPF trustee and is also chairperson of the trustees' investment committee. Some union leaders accused Kaaronda of having a personal vendetta against Nevonga and using the DCP saga to get rid of Nevonga. As a result Kaaronda lost support from his union peers, senior Government and Swapo officials.
At the congress the workers made resolutions demanding that the entire GIPF board of trustees and management be suspended. The workers also called for a presidential commission of inquiry, demanded that the money lost in the DCP be recovered and for the rules governing the GIPF be changed to make room for more worker involvement and to allow workers to benefit more from surpluses generated by the GIPF. The two unions represented on the GIPF board, Napwu and the teachers' union Nantu, refused to recall their representatives on the board.
Kaaronda was then left isolated and sidelined by his fellow unionists, with only the workers to support him as he continued pushing for the interest of the workers.
The workers, with only Kaaronda on their side, decided to go it alone without union support to firmly put the DCP on the national agenda. A committee of civil servants was formed to organise a mass demonstration with the aim of pressurising Government to do something. Government pulled out all the stops to prevent the demonstration from going ahead shortly before the November elections. The mass demonstration, scheduled to take place on November 11, was called off hours before it could start.

description.hltext_display: 知事「沖縄以外を探す方が早い」 普天間で前原氏に
리니지, '남들 놀 때 달려라!' 12주년 & 크리스마스 이벤트 실시
description.content:
엔씨소프트(대표 김택진)는 자사에서 개발 및 서비스 중인 롤플레잉 온라인게임 '리니지'의 게이머들을 대상으로 12주년 기념 크리스마스 이벤트를 실시한다고 금일(22일) 밝혔다.
오는 29일까지 진행되는 이번 이벤트에서는 화이트 크리스마스를 맞이할 수 있도록 아덴 전 지역의 마을에 눈이 내리며, 마법의 눈덩이를 청소해 마력의 결정을 모으면 원거리 공격, 마력 회복, 체력 회복 중 랜덤하게 1가지 기능을 지원하는 눈사람 마법 인형을 얻을 수 있다.
엔씨소프트의 한 관계자는 "크리스마스를 맞이해 '리니지'에서도 화이트 크리스마스의 분위기를 느낄 수 있도록 준비했다"며 "모든 게이머 분들이 12주년과 크리스마스를 즐겁게 보냈으면 좋겠다"고 말했다.
이에 대한 자세한 사항은 '리니지' 홈페이지(lineage.plaync.co.kr)에서 확인할 수 있다. 김형근 기자 noarose@gamedonga.co.krⓒ게임동아 & GameDonga.co.kr, 무단 전재 및 재배포 금지

description.hltext_display: 農業再生新政策の検討を要請へ 実現会議が全府省に
Des hivers plus froids parce qu'il fait plus chaud
description.content:
Selon des scientifiques, les hivers rigoureux qui se succèdent en Europe depuis dix ans sont liés, en grande partie, au réchauffement climatique.
La hausse du thermomètre serait précisément à l'origine des hivers rigoureux. (photo: AFP)
Sur ce sujet
Au premier regard, la froideur glaciale qui s'est abattue sur l'Europe semble peu compatible avec la hausse moyenne des températures attendue d'ici la fin du siècle et qui pourrait atteindre de 5 à 6 degrés.
Diaporama Neige en SuisseTempêtes de neige en Europe.
Aux climato-sceptiques qui y voient la preuve que le changement climatique n'existe pas, certains scientifiques répondent que ces vagues de froid sont un refroidissement temporaire, au sein du réchauffement global.
Mais, une nouvelle étude va plus loin, et montre que la hausse du thermomètre est précisément à l'origine de ces hivers enneigés et particulièrement froids.
Calotte glaciaire arctique
Le coupable serait la fonte de la calotte glaciaire arctique. Le réchauffement, deux à trois fois supérieur à la moyenne, a entraîné sa réduction de 20% ces 30 dernières années. Elle pourrait même disparaître entièrement durant les mois d'été d'ici la fin du siècle.
Les rayons du soleil, qui ne sont plus repoussés par la glace, réchauffent encore un peu plus la surface du globe à cet endroit.
Une mer sans glace, et c'est tout le système de pressions qui s'en trouve bouleversé.
«Mettons que l'océan soit à zéro degré», explique à l'AFP Stefan Rahmstorf, spécialiste du climat au prestigieux Institut Potsdam (Allemagne) pour la recherche sur l'impact climatique.
«Il est ainsi beaucoup plus chaud que l'air ambiant dans cette zone polaire en hiver. Vous avez alors un important flux chaud qui remonte vers l'atmosphère, que vous n'avez pas quand tout est recouvert de glace. C'est un changement énorme», ajoute-t-il.
Air polaire
Le résultat, selon une étude publiée au début du mois par le «Journal de Recherche Géophysique», est un système de hautes pressions qui pousse l'air polaire, dans le sens inverse des aiguilles d'une montre, vers l'Europe.
«Ces anomalies pourraient tripler la probabilité d'avoir des hivers extrêmes en Europe et dans le nord de l'Asie», y explique le physicien Vladimir Petoukhov, qui a dirigé l'étude.
D'autres explications pour ces hivers atypiques, comme une baisse de l'activité solaire ou des changements dans le Gulf Stream, «ont tendance à en exagérer les effets», ajoute M. Petoukhov.
Il souligne également que lors de l'hiver glacial de 2005-2006, quand les températures étaient de 10° inférieures à la normale en Sibérie, aucune anomalie n'avait été constatée dans l'oscillation nord-atlantique, phénomène météorologique avancé par certains comme une explication possible de ces hivers rigoureux.
2010, chaude année
Et les chercheurs de souligner que ces hivers particulièrement froids en Europe ne reflètent pas la tendance globale constatée sur l'ensemble du globe, où 2010 devrait être l'une des trois années les plus chaudes jamais enregistrées.
«Quand je regarde par ma fenêtre, je vois 30 cm de neige et le thermomètre dit -14°», raconte M. Rahmstorf, qui s'exprimait au téléphone depuis Potsdam.
«En même temps, au Groenland, nous sommes au-dessus de zéro en décembre».
(afp)
(1) Commentaires
Rédiger un nouveau commentaire
allez savoir..!
"Des hivers plus froids à cause du réchauffement" !? Et si c'était des étés plus chaud à cause du refroidissement climatique ! Bref, avec ce genre d'affirmation tout est possible!

description.hltext_display: Mourinho se autoimpone la 'Ley del silencio'
description.content:
· El portugués no ofrecerá su habitual rueda de prensa previa a los partidos · En su lugar lo hará Aitor Karanka ·Jose Mourinho no comparecerá en rueda de prensa este martes como suele ser habitual en el entrenador portugués antes de un partido. El Real Madrid juega este miércoles contra el Levante en Copa y será Aitor Karanka el encargado de comparecer ante los medios. El vasco sólo lo había hecho esta temporada cuando Mourinho estuvo sancionado.
En principio, no parece haber ningún motivo por el que Mou se niegue a aparecer ante los medios. Esto no hace más que avivar la tensión entre el portugués y el club, después de lo ocurrido en el partido del Madrid contra el Sevilla y en el que Jose Mourinho había pedido al club que defendiera más los intereses del Real Madrid ante los árbitros.
Además, sigue la guerra abierta entre Mourinho y Valdano que no solventaron sus diferencias en la comida del club de este lunes. El portugués ha tomado una decisión al respecto sobre todo el asunto. Y es optar por una 'Ley del silencio'.

description.hltext_display: Viking Linen tilaus varmistui - STX ilmoittaa yt-neuvottelujen tuloksista iltapäivällä
description.content:
Viking Linen laivatilaus STX Finlandin Turun telakalta on varmistunut. Molemmat osapuolet ovat päässeet keskiviikkona yhteisymmärrykseen sopimusehdoista. Yksi ehdoista koski ympäristötukea, josta liikenne- ja viestintäministeriö päätti eilen tiistaina. Tuen maksaminen edellyttää, että Euroopan unionin komissio hyväksyy tukiohjelman ja Viking Linen tukihakemuksen.
25. lokakuuta allekirjoitettu aiesopimus on siis nyt saatettu voimaan. Sopimus sisältää option toisesta laivasta. Investointi on noin 240 miljoonan euron arvoinen.
Alus rakennetaan Turun-telakalla, ja se tulee Turku–Ahvenanmaa–Tukholma-reitille. Uuden risteilijän rakentaminen merkitsee telakkayhtiölle noin 2 600 henkilötyövuotta. Laivan arvioidaan valmistuvan vuoden 2013 alussa.
Uusi laiva on noin 214 metriä pitkä ja sen bruttovetoisuus on 57 000. Alus on suunniteltu 2800 matkustajalle ja sitä operoi 200 hengen miehistö. Matkustajahyttejä laivassa on 880.
- Olemme kiitollisia hankkeemme saamasta, monien eri yhteistyökumppaneiden ja -tahojen tuesta sekä erityisen iloisia siitä, että pystymme näin joulun alla lupaamaan uutta työtä tuhansille ihmisille Turun seudulla, sanoo Viking Linen toimitusjohtaja Mikael Backman.
Yt-neuvottelut päättyvät keskiviikkona Tilauksen varmistumisen vaikutuksista STX:n Turun telakan päättyviin yt-neuvotteluihin ei vielä tiedetä. Yt-neuvottelujen on tarkoitus päättyä keskiviikkona. STX ilmoittaa vähennyksistä iltapäivällä. YLE Turku

description.hltext_display: 介護職員月給１万５千円増 昨年比、１０年６月時点
'올 것이 왔다' KTH, 풋볼매니저 온라인 사이트 오픈
description.content:
유럽에서 이혼제조기로 알려진 유명 PC게임 '풋볼매니저'의 온라인버전 '풋볼매니저 온라인'의 브랜스 사이트가 오픈됐다.
KTH(대표 서정수)는 자사의 게임포털 올스타에서 2011년 서비스 예정인 '풋볼매니저 온라인'의 브랜드 사이트를 오픈 하고, 서비스에 첫 시동을 걸었다고 금일(22일) 밝혔다.
풋볼매니저 온라인은 6백만 게이머가 즐긴 일본 세가(SEGA) 퍼블리싱의 유명 PC 패키지 게임 '풋볼매니저'의 핵심 콘텐츠를 온라인 환경에 최적화시킨 신작으로, 풋볼매니저 시리즈를 탄생시킨 SEGA의 개발 스튜디오, 스포츠 인터랙티브(Sports Interactive)와 KTH가 함께 개발 중인 축구 시뮬레이션 게임이다.
KTH는 브랜드 사이트 오픈과 함께 풋볼매니저 온라인의 BI(brand identity)와 인트로 영상을 공개했다.
브랜드 사이트는 기존 축구 게임들과 달리 게이머 스스로 구단주가 되어 선수들을 영입하고, 전략을 세워 플레이 하는 방식이 특징인 게임의 콘셉트를 잘 살려내, 작전 상황판의 역동적인 플래시 영상 등으로 알기 쉽고 깔끔하게 표현해냈다.
또한, 트위터, 페이스북 등 SNS(소셜 네트워크 서비스)를 연동해 회원들이 언제 어디서나 실시간으로 풋볼매니저 온라인에 대한 개발 방향 등 다양한 의견을 나누고, 새로운 정보들을 접할 수 있는 소통의 창구로 적극 활용할 계획이다.
KTH 게임사업본부 홍희정 PD는 "앞으로 풋볼매니저 온라인의 브랜드 사이트를 통해 지속적인 개발 소식과 발빠른 정보를 제공하는 등 여러 가지 장치를 마련할 것"이라며, "세계 최고의 온라인 축구 게임을 표방하는 '글로벌 프로젝트'인 만큼 많은 분들의 기대에 부응할 수 있도록 최선을 다하겠다"라고 말했다.
게임에 대한 자세한 내용은 풋볼매니저 온라인 홈페이지(www.allstar.co.kr)에서 확인할 수 있다. 최호경 기자 neoncp@gamedonga.co.krⓒ게임동아 & GameDonga.co.kr, 무단 전재 및 재배포 금지

description.hltext_display: 펀치몬스터, 크리스마스 이벤트 실시
description.content:
엔씨소프트(대표 김택진)는 자사에서 서비스 중인 캐주얼 액션 온라인게임 '펀치몬스터'의 게이머들을 대상으로 크리스마스 이벤트를 실시한다고 금일(22일) 밝혔다.
이번 이벤트에서는 '빼앗긴 산타 선물 찾기' 퀘스트를 비롯해 '크리스마스 트리 장식' '크리스마스 케이크 만들기' ' 파티 초대장 돌리기' 등 크리스마스를 연상시키는 다양한 퀘스트들이 추가되고, 이를 완수한 게이머에게는 다양한 게임 내 아이템이 선물된다.
이와 함께 실시되는 '펀몬산타가 전하는 7일간의 선물폭격' 이벤트에서는 오는 29일까지 마을에 있는 산타NPC를 찾아가면 크리스마스 코스튬 아이템인 '큐트 베이윙'과 '시베리아 장갑', 능력치 상승 물약을 받을 수 있는 '크리스마스 선물 상자'를 매일 받을 수 있다.
엔씨소프트의 신민균 실장은 "크리스마스 시즌을 맞이해 게이머들에게 풍성한 즐길 거리를 제공하기 위해 크리스마스 신규 퀘스트와 펀몬산타가 전하는 7일간의 선물폭격 이벤트를 준비했다"며 "모든 게이머들이 펀치몬스터에서 풍성하고 행복한 크리스마스를 맞이하길 바란다"고 말했다.
이에 대한 자세한 사항은 '펀치몬스터' 홈페이지(punchmonster.plaync.co.kr)에서 확인할 수 있다. 김형근 기자 noarose@gamedonga.co.krⓒ게임동아 & GameDonga.co.kr, 무단 전재 및 재배포 금지

description.hltext_display: На Тернопільщині близько 8 тис. школярів візьмуть участь у ЗНО
description.content:
На Тернопільщині близько 8 тис. школярів візьмуть участь у зовнішньому незалежному оцінюванні у червні 2011 року. Такий прогноз оприлюднив на прес-конференції у Тернополі директор Івано-Франківського регіонального центру оцінювання якості освіти Богдан Томенчук.
Про це повідомив 22 грудня власкор ЗІКу.
Реєстрація на тестування-2011 розпочнеться у перший день нового року – 1 січня і триватиме до 28 лютого включно. Процес відбуватиметься в інтернеті на сайті test.if.ua. Напередодні всі школярі Тернопільщини отримають методички про правила реєстрації.
«Уже не потрібно з віддаленого села їхати у райцентр, аби зареєструватися для проходження тестування. Це можна буде зробити у школі, звичайно, якщо вона підключена до інтернету. В іншому випадку ми забезпечимо дітей диском із відповідною програмою. А комп’ютерний клас є в кожній ЗОШ», – сказав Томенчук.

Give2Asia Announces New Partnership with Thabyay Education Network in...
description.content:
Give2Asia, a US-based public charity promoting transformative philanthropy, today announces a new partnership with Thabyay Education Network to help Burmese students pursue a university education outside of Burma.
“We are excited to be partnering with Thabyay Education Network,” said Ray Klinke, Give2Asia’s Interim CEO. “The organization serves to connect socially-engaged individuals with resources to pursue a higher education in order to support development in Burma.”
Thabyay seeks to foster reconciliation and social justice, alleviate poverty and marginalization, and support sustainable development in Burma through providing access to higher education opportunities. The organization helps key community members to develop skills, knowledge and networks that they can use to strengthen the capacity of local communities and wider society.
“The individuals that we support are working on the front line of the struggle to alleviate poverty and foster social justice in Burma,” said Shona Kirkwood, Thabyay’s Executive Director. “They are the educators, health workers, and development specialists who are laying the foundations of a better future for all Burmese people. We hope that, in partnership with Give2Asia, we can reach out to donors who can help these individuals make a difference”
Established in 1996, Thabyay Education Network is a registered non-profit foundation in Thailand. To date, Thabyay has supported almost 800 students from Burma to study at universities across Asia.
The partnership between Thabyay and Give2Asia will support U.S. fundraising for scholarships at universities in Asia outside of Burma. U.S. donors can make tax-deductible donations online to Give2Asia in support of Thabyay Education Network at http://www.give2asia.org/ten, or by sending donations to “Give2Asia” by check, wire, or securities transfer.
A Give2Asia Fiscal Sponsorship partnership helps approved Asia-based charitable groups establish a U.S. presence, provides professional donor stewardship, and makes possible tax-deductible support for Asia-based groups. Give2Asia currently provides fiscal sponsorship to over 100 charitable institutions across the Asia-Pacific region.
About Give2Asia
Give2Asia combines exceptional stewardship with comprehensive, on-the-ground knowledge to promote actions benefiting Asian communities. Founded by The Asia Foundation, with more than 50 years of grant-making experience in the Asia-Pacific region, Give2Asia helps overcome the common challenges associated with giving overseas and has allowed for over US$150 million in donations since its inception in 2001.

description.hltext_display: FDA approves Medtronic aneurysm device
description.author: info@tradingmarkets.com
description.content:
More than a million people in the United States have a "silent killer" lingering in their bodies.
Called an abdominal aortic aneurysm, this dangerous bulge in the body's largest artery usually has no symptoms -- unless it ruptures, a condition that is often deadly.
Fridley-based Medtronic Inc. said Tuesday that the Food and Drug Administration approved its Endurant AAA Stent Graft System to address the condition. Endurant is a stent made of a flexible wire frame sewn into a fabric tube that is used to create a new pathway for blood flow in the patient's aorta.
The device is inserted in a minimally invasive manner, through the blood vessels in the groin. Medtronic claims Endurant is easier for doctors to use than similar devices, and it conforms better to each patient's unique anatomy.
Women and people with smaller bodies are good candidates for the device, which costs roughly $15,000 to $20,000 per procedure.
About 75 percent to 90 percent of undiagnosed AAA patients will die if their aneurysm ruptures.
The FDA approved the Endurant product after Medtronic conducted a 150-patient clinical trial at 26 medical centers in the United States. The company said there were no post-implant aneurysm ruptures or aneurysm-related deaths in study subjects, nor were there complications related to leaks or device migration.
The Endurant device, which received European regulatory approval in 2008, will compete against products made by Cook Medical, Gore Medical and Endologix Inc.
Janet Moore --612-673-7752
For full details on Medtronic Inc (MDT) MDT. Medtronic Inc (MDT) has Short Term PowerRatings at TradingMarkets. Details on Medtronic Inc (MDT) Short Term PowerRatings is available at This Link.

description.hltext_display: 데카론, 'Action 8. Cross 엇갈린 운명' 대규모 업데이트 실시
description.content:
게임하이(대표 주민영 )는 자사가 개발, 서비스 중인 MMORPG 데카론의 대규모 업데이트 'Action 8. Cross : 엇갈린 운명' 을 실시했다고 최근 밝혔다.
이번 업데이트의 핵심은 고레벨 게이머들을 위한 신규 월드 '용의 계곡'. 용들이 살고 있다는 전설의 땅인 '용의 계곡'은 기존 월드에서 볼 수 없었던 몽환적인 분위기를 자아내는 신규 월드로 '카론'에 대항할 수 있는 궁극의 마법이 숨겨진 미지의 땅이다.
'용의 계곡'은 '계곡의 틈(사냥터 입구)', '환영의 땅(필드)', '엘론옴 성지(다이나믹필드)', '엘론옴(인스턴스던전)'으로 총 네 개의 인스턴스 던전과 맵으로 구성돼 있다.
이 중 환영의 땅은 이번 콘텐츠의 가장 큰 맵으로 새롭게 등장하는 몬스터들과의 전투가 펼쳐질 예정이다. '엘론옴 성지'는 데카론 최초로 도입되는 '다이나믹 필드'로 몬스터가 항상 상주하는 기존 필드와 달리 특정 상황이 필드에 일어날 경우 사전에 의도된 전투 패턴을 제공해 더욱 박진감 넘치는 게임을 즐길 수 있다.
'엘론옴 성지'를 통해 진입이 가능한 ‘엘론옴’은 원거리 클래스와 근거리 클래스간의 전략적인 협동을 통해 진행이 가능한 지능형 인스턴스 던전으로 이를 통해 게이머들은 색다른 재미를 느낄 수 있다. 또한 신규 월드가 들어감에 따라 30여 종의 신규 몬스터와 21차 무기, 레전드 액서서리, 레어 이동수단 등과 같은 아이템들이 추가된다.
게임하이 데카론 개발본부 곽명현 본부장은 "오랜 시간 동안 신규 콘텐츠에 목말라 하던 고레벨 게이머들을 위해 다양한 콘텐츠 제작을 위해 노력했다"며, "내년에는 더욱 풍성한 업데이트를 앞세워 진보해가는 데카론의 세계를 구현하겠다"고 전했다.
한편 게임하이는 이번 업데이트를 기념해 오늘부터 다음 달 25일까지 다양한 이벤트를 펼친다.
먼저 게임 누적 플레이 1시간 마다 1포인트가 획득 가능, 최대 하루 3포인트를 획득할 수 있는 출석체크 이벤트가 진행된다. 모은 포인트가 40포인트 이상이 되면 경품 이벤트에 자동 응모되며, 이 중 추첨을 통해 5명에게는 아이패드를 선물하고, 모은 포인트로 ‘대장장이의 축복 상자’, ‘아이템 랜덤박스’, ‘코스모스의 축복’ 등 다양한 게임아이템을 선물로 받을 수 있다.
또한 11월 이전 이후로 접속 기록이 없는 게이머들을 대상으로 복귀 이벤트도 펼쳐진다. 새롭게 데카론에 복귀한 게이머들은 8종의 캐쉬 아이템 중 3개를 선택해 지급받을 수 있으며, 추첨을 통해 아이패드를 지급한다.
마지막으로 이벤트 기간 동안 캐릭터명에 ‘CROSS’ 혹은 ‘크로스’가 포함된 게이머와 게임을 즐기게 되면 10%의 추가 경험치를 받을 수 있으며, 102레벨 이하 캐릭터 플레이 시 경험치를 2배로 얻을 수 있는 파격적인 이벤트로 펼쳐지게 된다.
'Action 8. Cross : 엇갈린 운명'에 대한 업데이트 정보는 데카론 홈페이지(dekaron.gamehi.co.kr)에서 확인할 수 있다. 최호경 기자 neoncp@gamedonga.co.krⓒ게임동아 & GameDonga.co.kr, 무단 전재 및 재배포 금지

description.hltext_display: El portavoz de Mou niega rumores sobre su posible regreso al Inter
description.content:
Eladio Paramés: "Tiene un contrato y lo respetará" · "Nunca ha dejado un proyecto tras el primer año" · "Pero en fútbol nunca se puede decir nunca"Eladio Paramés, portavoz del técnico madridista José Mourinho, ha desmentido que su representado haya mantenido estos días contacto alguno con Massimo Moratti, presidente y accionista de referencia del Inter de Milá, señalando además que el portugués "nunca deja un proyecto tras un año".
"No ha existido ni existirá contacto alguno en Madrid entre José Mourinho y Massimo Moratti; no tendría sentido. Tiene un contrato y lo respetará", ha comentado Eladio Paramés, a la agencia italiana Ansa.
La presencia en Madrid, por motivos profesionales, de Moratti y las declaraciones efectuadas el último domingo por Mourinho, tras el partido liguero Real Madrid-Sevilla (1-0), habían levantado ciertas especulaciones en Italia sobre una posible vuelta del técnico al club milanés.
Paramés, al ser preguntado sobre si al final de la presente campaña Mourinho podría dejar el Real Madrid, dijo: "Creo que sería difícil, pero en el fútbol no se puede decir nunca jamás".
"No es normal que Mou deje un proyecto tras un solo año; nunca lo ha hecho", añadió Paramés.

description.hltext_display: Private pupils 55 times as likely to go to Oxbridge
description.content:
Children at independent schools are 55 times more likely to go to Oxford or Cambridge than the poorest state school students, the Daily Mail reported Tuesday.
The gap extends to Britain’s other top-­ranking universities, where private pupils are 22 times more likely to get in than those entitled to free school meals ­ the Government’s ­measure of poverty.
The research on social mobility by education charity The Sutton Trust suggests that success at getting into elite universities is largely based on wealth.
Oxford's famous dreaming spires: Private school pupils are 55 times more likely to attend Oxbridge colleges than Britain's poorest state school students.
Only one in 100 students admitted to Oxbridge between 2005 and 2007 had been entitled to free school meals. At the 25 most academically selective universities, free schools meals pupils made up just 2 percent of the student intake.
It said: ‘This newly available data provides an insight into the extent of the widening education gap between the latest cohorts of the poorest and most privileged students both at school and university.’
Sir Peter Lampl, chairman and founder of the Sutton Trust, said the situation would get worse as a result of Government cuts and allowing universities almost to treble tuition fees.’
Sally Hunt, general secretary of the University and College Union, which represents lecturers, said the Coalition was sending ‘a clear message that university is only for those able to afford it’ and that ‘social mobility remains a pipe dream for far too many people’.
옥스브리지 입학, 사립학교 학생이 55배 높아
사립학교에 다니는 학생들이 국가 급식으로 다니는 최빈층 학생들보다 영국 2대 명문인 옥스포드나 � 브리지 입학 가능성이 55배 높은 것으로 나타났다� 영국의 데일리 메일이 화요일 보도했다.
이 같은 갭은 다른 상위권 대학에서도 나타나 사립학교생이 무료급식 학생들보다 이들 대학에 들어갈 가능성이 22배나 높았다. 교육자� 단체인 서튼 트러스트는 사회 이동에 대한 이 같은 연구에서 명문대학에 성공� �으로 입학하는 데는 주로 부에 달� �있음을 보여주� 있다� 말했다. 옥스포드의 � 명한 ‘드림잉 스파이어스’(각양 각색의 건물로 이뤄� � 옥스포드를 이� �게 부름): 사립학교 학생이 최빈층 국립학교 학생들보다 옥스브리지에 들어갈 가능성이 55배나 높았다.
2005년과 2007년 사이 옥스브리지에 입학한 100명 중 한 명만이 무료급식을 받은 학생이었다. 25개 최� 대학에서는 무료급식을 받은 학생이 총 입학생의 2%에 불과했다.
이 같은 새로운 데이터는 중등학교와 대학에서 극빈층과 최상위층간의 교육 갭이 � �� � 더 벌어지� 있음을 보여 주었다� 이 연구 보� 서는 말했다. 서튼트러스트 창시자이자 회장인 피터 람플 경은 � �부 보조의 삭감과 대학에 등록금을 3배나 올리게 한 결과 이 같은 상황은 더 악화� 것이라� 밝혔다. 대학 및 단과대협회 관계자는 대학은 돈이 있는 자들을 위한 것이 돼 사회 이동은 너무도 많은 사람들에게 몽상에 그치� 만다� 분명한 메시지를 보내� 있다� 밝혔다.
