description.hltext_display: Il tribunale alla Moratti: «Case popolari ai Rom»
description.content:
MILANO
Hanno chiamato in causa il ministro dell'Interno, Roberto Maroni, il sindaco di Milano, Letizia Moratti e il prefetto del capoluogo lombardo Gian Valerio Lombardi, e hanno «vinto» una causa civile intentata contro di loro.
Così dieci nomadi romeni del grande campo milanese di via Triboniano si sono visti riconoscere dal Tribunale civile di Milano il diritto ad entrare in quelle case popolari che gli erano state prima assegnate e poi negate per ragioni che lo stesso giudice ha definito di «origine etnica».
Contro la decisione favorevole ai rom, presa dal giudice Roberto Bichi della prima sezione civile, non si è fatta attendere la reazione della Lega Nord, che ha convocato per stamattina, davanti a Palazzo di Giustizia, un presidio diprotesta. «Questa sentenza», ha attaccato Matteo Salvini, eurodeputato e consigliere comunale milanese della Lega», ci pare sì discriminatoria, ma nei confronti di tanti italiani che da troppo tempo aspettano una casa popolare».
All'origine del ricorso dei nomadi, assistiti dagli avvocati Alberto Guariso e Livio Neri, c'è una convenzione del maggio scorso stipulata tra la Prefettura, il Comune e alcune onlus, tra cui la Casa della Carità, con la quale era stato varato «un piano di aiuto per l'inserimento abitativo di famiglie rom». Poi una delibera della Regione Lombardia del 5 agosto aveva autorizzato l'Aler (l'ente che si occupa dell'edilizia popolare) «a destinare 25 alloggi» ad alcuni nomadi del campo di via Triboniano. Tutto il progetto però, come ricostruisce il giudice nella sua ordinanza, «si era improvvisamente fermato nel settembre» scorso. Nel corso di una conferenza stampa il 27 settembre scorso, infatti, il ministro Maroni, «affermò che i ricorrenti (come gli altri destinatari dei 25 alloggi) non avrebbero potuto acquisire gli alloggi indicati nei rispettivi progetti, bensì altri, che sarebbero stati reperiti facendo leva «sul gran cuore di Milano».
Il giudice, invece, ha disposto che «non oltre il termine del 12 gennaio 2011 i predetti appartamenti siano posti a disposizione» dei rom, come prevvedono le convenzioni e i conseguenti contratti Aler. Ossia, secondo il giudice, l'accordo c'è stato e deve essere rispettato. Inoltre, per il magistrato il Ministero dell'Interno, il Comune e la Prefettura non hanno fornito una «motivazione per spiegare la persistente inattuazione degli accordi». Trova riscontro, dunque, secondo il Tribunale, il fatto che questo comportamento sia dovuto «alla mera constatazione dell'appartenenza all'etnia rom dei beneficiari». Per il giudice però, anche sulla base della Costituzione, non si può impedire «il raggiungimento di un legittimo vantaggio a persone, in dipendenza dell'origine etnica».È SCONTRO. Chiamati in causa dalla sentenza anche il ministro Maroni e il prefetto Lombardi

description.hltext_display: Call Kurtis: Laptop Fixed Four Times
description.content:
Reporting Kurtis Ming
You expect when buy a brand new laptop it will last for years. But a Roseville woman says her new computer started acting up right away.
Debbie Camillo admits, she loves playing Farmville with friends. She deserves it. She’s retired and after working in the California Department of Education’s IT office for 20 years she’s ready to have fun with computers. But the former web designer says her problems started just three weeks after she bought her laptop.
“My screen started flickering, it would shut down and then it would do a recovery on its own,” Camillo tells us. “I would like a computer that I don’t have to fix and work on. I don’t work anymore. I don’t want to have to work on computers.”
After a quick Google search, Camillo realized she wasn’t alone. She found a number of blogs and chats filled with other Toshiba Satellite owners experiencing similar flicker problems.
“People were scrambling trying to fix it themselves and I just thought, you know, I shouldn’t have to fix it myself,” Camillo says.
The laptop was covered under Toshiba’s manufacturer’s warranty and she’s now sent it in four different times. But every time she gets it back, Camillo says there are problems. She showed us screen images of various error messages that pop up.
We asked Toshiba how many times does a customer have to send in their computer before it’s time to send them a new one? The company didn’t answer that question. But California’s Lemon Law says, “If, after a reasonable number of attempts, the defect has not been fixed, the buyer may return this product for a replacement or a refund subject, in either case, to deduction of a reasonable charge for usage.”
After we got involved Toshiba gave Camillo two similar options: either a comparable laptop or a Toshiba credit that’s equal to the depreciated value of her computer. She chose the new laptop. But when that new laptop arrived, Camillo found it was a different model than we were told she was getting. It was comparable to her old model, so she’s fine with it. Camillo is also still waiting for a 50-dollar credit Toshiba promised so she could upgrade the battery.

event_or_fact.property: she loves playing Farmville with friends
But every time she gets it back

description.hltext_display: "Avvakta i KappAhl oc...
description.content:
Morgonens rapporter från Kappahl och MQ reflekterade inte oväntat den tuffa marknaden under hösten. Medan Kappahl redovisade en besvikelse mot förväntningarna på 24 procent så visade MQ dock styrka med en lönsamhetsförbättring på 17 procent, trots sämre jämförbar försäljning. Med dåliga förutsättningar för en bra julhandel, och en kommande press från stigande inköpskostnader så väljer vi att fortsätta hålla oss avvaktande till aktierna.
Svagheten var störst hos Kappahl trots bolagets påstådda lägre känslighet i svaga marknader, en myt bolaget själva odlat och som baseras på deras defensiva kundgrupp av medelålders kvinnor inom sjukvård och liknande yrken. Kappahls resultat kom in som en riktig kalldusch jämfört med förväntningarna. Försäljningen i jämförbara butiker backade med 3,1 procent, vilket var sämre än marknadsutvecklingen i Sverige på 2,6 procent. MQ å andra sidan, tappade 1 procent på jämförbara butiker. MQ:s rörelseresultat ökade dock med 8 miljoner till 54 miljoner, vilket motsvarade en marginalexpansion på 1,7 procentenheter till 14,8 procent.
Visserligen kan en fortsatt förbättring av arbetsmarknaden hjälpa bolagen och klädhandeln i stort nästa år. Kappahl fortsätter att förvänta sig 25 nya butiksöppningar det här verksamhetsåret, och MQ öppnade sin andra butik i den för bolaget så viktiga Norgeexpansionen den 9 december.
Samtidigt ligger stigande inköpskostnader i andra vågskålen. Inköpskostnader som inte kommer gå helt smärtfritt att passa vidare på kunderna. Kappahls VD Christian W Jansson kommenterade att bolaget kommer att genomföra blygsamma prishöjningar på ett lågt ensiffrigt tal. Kappahls bruttomarginal tappade 1,5 procentenheter till 63,4, vilket var 0,3 procentenheter svagare än väntat. Som jämförelse höll MQ uppe sin bruttomarginal riktigt bra, ner 0,2 procentenheter jämfört med föregående år, till 64,5 procent. Det berodde på ”effektivare inköpsprocesser och flytt av produktion samt positiva valutaeffekter vilket dock motverkades av fler kampanjaktiviteter än föregående år."
Kappahlaktien är ner nära 30 procent hittills i år. MQ-aktien har återhämtat sig något de senaste veckorna, efter att ha tappat så mycket som 16 procent sedan noteringen i början på sommaren, och är nu back ca 9 procent innan börsens öppning.
Kappahlaktien handlas innan börsens öppning till p/e 11 gånger 2010/2011 och 9 gånger 2011/2012. MQaktien handlas till p/e 9 gånger 2010/2011 och 7,5 gånger 2011/2012 (båda bolagen bryter räkenskapsåret i augusti). Den relativt lägre värderingen i MQ speglar till stor del osäkerheten i bolagets expansion in i Norge, men också en del av deras utmaningar inom damsortimentet.
De senaste dagarnas snökaos lär knappast vara till hjälp för något av bolagen, så nästa kvartalsrapport blir sannolikt ingen munter läsning heller. Visserligen är värderingen inte särskilt utmanande men givet en trolig dålig julförsäljning, svaga redovisade siffror, och en press på bruttomarginalen från stigande inköpskostnader så fortsätter vi att hålla oss avvaktande till att investera i bolagen.

description.hltext_display: 薄・軽・頑丈なモバイルSSDノートはコレだ！
description.content:
東芝13.3型ノート「dynabook R730/39A」
文● 後藤宏、写真●篠原孝志（パシャ）／吉田武
「もう我慢ならない！」。
そう逆ギレして、家電量販店に駆け込んだ。何が我慢できないかといえば、仕事で使っているノートPCの重量、約3kgである。某社のA4ノートPCで、Core2 Duoを搭載している。
そもそもモバイルPCにカテゴライズされるマシンではないのだが、仕事柄画像や動画の編集が必要なため、必然的にマシンパワーを確保しやすいA4ノートPCを肩の痛さにもくじけず持ち歩いていた。
ところが、ノートPCの重さに加え、筆記用具／手帳／デジカメなど諸々の小物が約2kgという重量（計5kgだ）に対して、カバンが先に音を上げた。肩ヒモが内側から壊れ、あえなく中破。買い替えを余儀なくされたのだ。ここに至り、所有しているA4ノートのモバイル利用を断念し、モバイルPCの導入に踏み切ったのである。
パワフルで軽い、東芝「dynabook R730/39A」！ 新たに導入したノート...

description.hltext_display: In Your Town: Briefs from across Marin for Dec. 22, 2010
description.content:
the county
Transit district gets clean bill of health
An audit has given the Marin County Transit District a clean bill of health.
The review of the books by Maher Accountancy put the district's net assets at $10.3 million, including $2.5 million in vehicles.
It reported the district spent $1 million in federal funds last fiscal year, most of it stimulus money. "The auditor found no material weaknesses or significant deficiencies in internal control over major federal award programs," the audit said.
One "misstatement" that turned up was $1.7 million in fixed assets, which was corrected after it was improperly recorded due to the county's computer problems.
The audit was approved Monday by transit directors.
BELVEDERE
Branson student makes jazz ensemble group
Zachary Ostroff of Belvedere, a student at the Branson School, is one of 30 high school students from across the United States selected to participate in the Grammy Jazz Ensemble program.
The students, representing 30 cities and 12 states, will travel to Los Angeles for a week to include a Feb. 9 performance at the Los Angeles Grand Ballroom and a Feb. 10 performance at Spaghettini's Italian Grill & Jazz Club. Also, the students will attend the 53rd annual Grammy Awards on Feb. 13 as guests and will perform at the Grammy celebration after-party.
CORTE MADERA
New coupon program provides discounts
Corte Madera has posted discounts available at local stores, restaurants and other businesses as part of its new coupon program with the Chamber of Commerce.
The program, which the Town Council approved unanimously in November, features a printable list of businesses with 10 and 20 percent discounts or special deals on the Corte Madera Chamber of Commerce and town websites, which will be good for a month at participating restaurants and stores.
To see January's list, go to www.ci.corte-madera.ca.us.
KENTFIELD
COM board names Conti president
The College of Marin Board of Trustees chose Diana Conti as its new president at its Dec. 14 meeting.
Former President Eva Long will serve as vice president, while trustee James Namnath will serve as clerk for the coming year.
MILL VALLEY
Camp Tam provides activities for children
Camp Tam at Homestead Valley, a winter break camp for elementary school children, will continue 9 a.m. to 4 p.m. Dec. 22-23 and Dec. 27-30 at the Homestead Valley Community Center at 315 Montford Ave. in Mill Valley. Each day will include hands-on activities with a different theme.
The cost is $45 to $50 per day. For more information, visit www.homesteadvalley.org or call 388-0128.
Throckmorton lane closes for sewer repair
The westbound lane of Throckmorton Avenue will be closed between Olive and Old Mill streets in Mill Valley from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. daily through Dec. 31 while the city repairs a sewer main. The closures will end at noon on Dec. 24 and 31.
During the closures, westbound traffic will detour right on Olive Street, left on Lovell Avenue and left on Old Mill Street.
For information, call 200-5125.
NOVATO
Senior center plans chair aerobics class
Novato's Margaret Todd Senior Center will offer a Tuesday morning chair aerobics class beginning Jan. 4.
The program blends elements of tai chi, yoga, low-impact aerobics and meditation. The center is at 1560 Hill Road. For information, call 899-8290.
POINT REYES STATION
Discussion planned on Obama presidency
The Dance Palace will host Bill Press and Norman Solomon in a discussion of the Obama presidency at 7 p.m. Dec. 29.
The two will discuss the impact of the November elections, the tax bill, "don't ask don't tell," the current relations between politics and media and some predictions for how things may go in the coming year. Admission is $15.
The Dance Palace is at 503 B St. in Point Reyes Station.
SAN RAFAEL
Professor gets grant for science course
Dominican University professor Diara Spain has received a SENCER-National Science Foundation sub-grant to develop a new science course for non-science majors enrolled in the school's honors program.
Spain, an associate professor of biology and director of the honors program at the San Rafael university, has created a class tentatively titled "Aquatic Ecosystems: San Francisco Bay Area." Among other goals, students in the class will learn to comprehend how environmental issues like sustainability, natural disasters and invasive species affect humans.
Paintings exhibited at Dominican gallery
Watercolor artist Sister Joanne Cullimore is exhibiting her paintings at Dominican University's San Marco Gallery through Dec. 31.
The exhibition, titled "Reflections of the Light," highlights Cullimore's recent watercolor collection of outdoor landscapes and local scenes.
The gallery is at 50 Acacia Ave. in San Rafael.
Hours are 8 a.m. to 10:30 p.m. Monday through Thursday, 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. Friday and 2 p.m. to 10:30 p.m. Sunday.
SAUSALITO
Housing committee meeting canceled
The regulary scheduled meeting of the city of Sausalito Housing Element Committee set for Monday has been canceled.
The next regularly scheduled committee meeting will be Jan. 10.
Send us your news: We want more news items from Marin's cities and towns. E-mail them to our City Desk at localnews@marinij.com, mail them to City Desk, Marin Independent Journal, 150 Alameda del Prado, Novato, CA 94949, or fax them to 883-5458. For more information about towns in Marin, visit the IJ's website at marinij.com.

description.hltext_display: Sale of Goa land to foreigners, mafia in 2010 RTI hall of fame
Unhealthy lifestyle makes women look '4 years older' than their actual age
description.content:
Many of us crave to look 10 years younger. However, a new research has revealed that we are not helping ourselves to stay youthful.
The study has revealed that unhealthy lifestyles are fuelling a premature ageing epidemic with the average woman looking more than four years older than their actual age, reports the Daily Mail.
According to a poll of 8,000 British women aged over 25, unhealthy habits, including smoking, drinking, eating junk food, using sun beds and not looking after skin, are making women look old.
The results indicated that modern lifestyles are having a detrimental effect on looks, making women look 4.25 years older than they actually were.
In this image-conscious age, the survey also uncovered that a quarter of women spend 10 minutes a day worrying about their ageing, adding up to two and half days every year.
Recently, Jennifer Aniston, 41, topped the list of celebrities who looked best for their age, while Amy Winehouse, 27, was voted the celebrity who looks the worst for her age.
Women in North East London are ageing the fastest, feeling that they look an average of six years older than their years, which is no surprise considering they also smoke and drink the most, use sun beds and a third regularly go out in the sun without wearing any protection.
While scientists did not analyse participants skin, the group were asked what age they felt they looked.
The questions revealed that one in five dont use moisturiser, 40% regularly go out in the sun without any SPF protection, a quarter eat junk food two to three times a week and the average woman drinks 448 units of alcohol and smokes 894 cigarettes a year.
Dr Ravi Jain, from the Riverbanks Clinic, in Bedfordshire, said his mantra was to stub out the cigarettes and wear sun protection every day.
He also encouraged drinking lots of water and eating berries to stop going over the hill prematurely. Collagen production in our skin naturally slows as we age, with a loss of about a third of collagen normal by the age of 45 causing a reduction of facial volume and the appearance of wrinkles and folds, he said. However, smoking, alcohol consumption, sun damage, poor diet and even a lack of exercise can accelerate collagen breakdown and cause us to age prematurely, Dr Jain added. For a third of the women who took part in the poll, by collagen replenishment treatment Sculptra, the biggest concern was looking less attractive, while one in 10 people aged 25 to 30 were anxious their partner would leave them.
One in ten women aged 51 to 55 said they agonised about looking like their mother.
Around one in ten women, who were aged between 25 and 66, said they would have an injection to look young, while 9% would opt for plastic surgery and 66% would fancy a makeover to help them shave off the years.

However, smoking, alcohol consumption, sun damage, poor diet and even a lack of exercise can accelerate collagen breakdown and cause us to age prematurely

description.hltext_display: El eclipse lunar solo pudo ser disfrutado parcialmente en Canarias
description.content:
Al final el eclipse lunar total no pudo observarse en la península ibérica, debido a la hora en que tuvo lugar el evento astronómico, ya que ha esa hora ya había amanecido, sin embargo si se pudo observar parcialmente en las Islas Canarias, donde el Teide se convirtió en un escenario perfecto para su observación. Donde si se pudo observar el eclipse en toda su majestuosidad fue en Norteamérica y partes de Sudamérica.
El eclipse lunar comenzó a las 07:32 de la mañana, hora peninsular, cuando el sol ya había salido, por lo que el espectáculo no fue observable, sin embargo sí se pudo observar en las islas canarias, que si bien no pudieron observar el momento central del eclipse lunar, que tuvo lugar a las 08:40, hora peninsular, si observaron su inicio. El paraje natural del Teide creo una extraña conjunción que fue disfrutada por muchos curiosos, ya que la situación de la montaña hace que todos los amaneceres y atardeceres, su propia sombra se proyecte sobre la atmósfera, dando la sensación de que el Teide está muy cercana de la Luna, lo que esta mañana permitió que la sombra del Teide se proyectara sobre el eclipse.
Sin embargo el amanecer en las Islas Canarias cortó el espectáculo antes de que el primer eclipse lunar en tres años llegara a su momento cumbre, cuando después de desaparecer la Luna, vuelve a aparecer y la luz solar reflejada en la Tierra da una tonalidad rojiza a la Luna. A pesar de todo, los eclipses de Luna son bastante comunes, con una media de uno al año, y el 2011 doblará la media con dos. Además el próximo cuatro de enero podremos asistir a un eclipse parcial de sol, los cuales son más escasos que los lunares, y el cual si podrá ser perfectamente observable desde España. Habrá que esperar a tener más suerte la próxima vez y así poder observar un eclipse lunar y la luna roja sobre nuestras cabezas en directo.
El eclipse lunar observado en Norteamérica
Imagen: eldiariomontanes.com
Tags: eclipse lunar España eclipse lunar canarias eclipse lunar eclipse Luna ciencia vídeos

description.hltext_display: Il Papa condanna la pedofilia e attacca il '68
description.content:
CITTA' DEL VATICANO
Benedetto XVI torna sul tema della pedofilia nel discorso di Natale.
Il 2010 doveva vedere il culmine dell'anno sacerdotale e si è trasformato invece nell'anno della «dimensione inimmaginabile» degli abusi di sacerdoti sui bimbi. Il Papa ne trae un invito alla Chiesa a cogliere nella «umiliazione» dello scandalo «una esortazione alla verità e una chiamata al rinnovamento».
E la stessa esortazione alla verità Benedetto XVI scorge nella violenza patita dai cristiani in Medio Oriente: non è la diversa fede a indurre la cristianofobia, dove per secoli si è convissuto fianco a fianco, bensì «l'avidità di lucro e l'accecamento ideologico». Si levino dunque le «voci della ragione», ancora «troppo deboli», e si impegnino i leader religiosi e politici.
Nel sesto discorso di Benedetto XVI alla Curia per gli auguri natalizi, nella Sala Regia del Palazzo apostolico, il Papa ha collocato il tema della pedofilia sullo sfondo della riflessione su un mondo in crisi perchè, come alla fine dell'Impero romano, si sta «dissolvendo il consenso morale», «senza il quale le strutture giuridiche e politiche non funzionano». Un mondo nel quale la «assenza di Dio» è apparente: nei viaggi internazionali a Cipro, Gran Bretagna, Malta, Portogallo e Spagna, confida il Pontefice ai collaboratori, ha visto «che la fede non è una cosa del passato...». Con un ammonimento agli ecclesiastici: «anche in noi tante volte la fede dorme» e dobbiamo «svegliarci dal sonno di una fede divenuta stanca e ridarle il potere di spostare i monti».
Davanti al governo della Chiesa e della Città del Vaticano il Papa riassume la sua riflessione sugli abusi dei preti: «le ferite di Cristo restano aperte per le colpe dei sacerdoti», il volto della Chiesa è «impolverato», «il suo vestito è strappato», bisogna sforzarsi di «fare tutto il possibile nella preparazione al sacerdozio perchè una tale cosa non possa più succedere».
Il «mercato della pornografia» e il turismo sessuale fanno dei bimbi un «articolo di mercato», in cui la droga «stende i suoi tentacoli di polipo intorno all'intero globo terrestre»: «ogni piacere diventa insufficiente, in nome di un fatale fraintendimento della libertà». Qui Benedetto XVI rinnova la sua condanna del fatto che «negli anni Settanta la pedofilia venne teorizzata come una cosa del tutto conforme all'uomo e anche al bambino». E denuncia la «perversione del concetto di ethos» in quegli anni «persino nell'ambito della teologia cattolica»: «non esisterebbe male in sè e bene in sè, esisterebbe solo un meglio e un peggio di». E «la morale viene sostituita da un calcolo delle conseguenze e con ciò cessa di esistere».IL DISCORSO DI NATALE. Il Pontefice ha invitato il clero a ritrovare entusiamo e slancio nell'opera di evangelizzazione

description.hltext_display: Самарские медики готовы к работе в новогодние каникулы
description.content:
В дни новогодних и рождественских праздников служба скорой медицинской помощи в городском округе Самара будет работать в штатном режиме, то есть круглосуточно, сообщили корреспонденту ИА REGNUM-ВолгаИнформ в управлении информации и аналитики администрации городского округа Самара. Дополнительно, в новогоднюю ночь 31 декабря во время проведения праздничных мероприятий на площади им. Куйбышева организовываются дежурства врачей "Скорой помощи". Кроме того, поликлинические отделения муниципальных медицинских учреждений готовы оказывать экстренную и неотложную помощь населению. Все клинические отделения и диагностические службы городской клинической больницы №1 им. Н.И. Пирогова, городской клинической больницы №2 им. Н.А. Семашко, а также дежурящие в соответствии с графиком другие стационары, будут работать круглосуточно.
Во всех лечебных учреждениях назначены дежурные службы, включающие врачей и ответственного администратора. Медучреждения обеспечены необходимым количеством медикаментов и перевязочных средств. В праздничные дни будут усилены противопожарная и антитеррористическая деятельность в больницах и поликлиниках города.

description.hltext_display: Dos sicarios le quitaron la vida a "El Terror"
description.content:
CORTAZAR, Gto.- Al parecer fueron dos sujetos los que ultimaron a José Juan Ramírez Hernández, alias "El Terror", pues la policía encontró casquillos percutidos de calibre 45 y de nueve milímetros, aunque las ojivas que rescataron los médicos forenses en el cuerpo fueron de la segunda arma.
Testigos dijeron a la policía que la víctima platicaba con un compadre en la puerta de su casa en la calle Matamoros de la comunidad El Diezmo, cuando llegaron dos sujetos, y uno que vestía playera blanca sin decir palabra sacó una pistola y comenzó a disparar.
Sin embargo, se cree que el otro también jaló el gatillo de su arma, pues los casquillos encontrados fueron de calibres distintos, de nueve y 45.
Después de disparar, los sujetos corrieron y por lo menos uno se perdió entre los terrenos de sembradío, aunque del segundo no se precisó hacia dónde huyó.
Los resultados de la necropsia indicaron que la muerte de "El Terror" ocurrió por la penetración de tres balas en el cráneo y una más en el tórax, aunque en total se localizaron seis heridas de entrada y dos de salida, según se informó. Del cuerpo se rescataron cinco ojivas de nueve milímetros.
José Juan Ramírez "El Terror" tenía antecedentes por amenazas y escándalos en la comunidad, pues los vecinos también dijeron que era muy agresivo y que cuando estaba ebrio le daba por hacer escándalos y hacer detonaciones con su arma.
Según los vecinos, a "El Terror" lo tenían amenazado de muerte desde los Estados Unidos en donde mataron a su madre y los delincuentes dejaron un recado que decía que el siguiente sería él.
La policía comenzó con las investigaciones para tratar de encontrar a los responsables de este homicidio.

description.hltext_display: 20名高校大学生获徐邦达奖学金
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
本报讯（记者 丁肇文）以鉴定大师徐邦达名字命名的艺术教育奖学金中国嘉德徐邦达艺术教育奖学金，昨天下午在京首次颁奖。来自北大、清华等国内10所高校的20名优秀大学生，获得了每人1万元的奖学金。
今年百岁的徐邦达不到30岁即以擅鉴古书画闻名于江南，在文物鉴定和学术研究上有极高造诣，据说看到书画的半尺之内就能断其真假，有“徐半尺”之称，全国各大博物馆所藏字画的一级品全部经过他的鉴定。中国嘉德出资100万元，同时每年增资20万元，设立奖学金，用于奖励中国10所著名高等院校的文博、考古及艺术类专业的优秀学生。

description.hltext_display: Estado demandado por inanición
description.author: Diariocritico Colombia
description.content:
22-12-2010 - Diariocrítico - El Espectador (Bogotá)
Los niños indígenas muertos con desnutrición hace tres años persiguen como fantasmas al Estado colombiano. En el Tribunal Administrativo de Quibdó se tramitan 38 demandas de sus deudos contra entidades gubernamentales por este motivo. De ser falladas a su favor, implicarían al menos 18.000 millones de pesos contra el erario público.
Las entidades demandadas son: la Presidencia de la República, el Ministerio de Protección Social, el ICBF, la Gobernación de Chocó y las alcaldías de Riosucio y Carmen del Darién.
En su momento, el país se indignó con los informes de prensa del drama de 17 niños con problemas de diarrea y vómito prolongados. Los indígenas documentaron otros 21 casos de menores muertos. Víctor Carpio, un líder del Cabildo Mayor Indígena del Bajo Atrato (Camizba), explica que decidieron demandar al Estado porque, para su organización, "todo pasó porque no hay atención en salud".
El proceso más avanzado es la demanda de Jerónimo Chamorro por su hija Dilmary, quien falleció de desnutrición severa siendo una bebita, el 20 de marzo del 2007.
El 7 de febrero del 2011 será la audiencia de conciliación, aunque se prevé que no habrá acuerdo entre las partes.

description.hltext_display: Washington, DC: From Federal Government Hub to Business Center
description.content:
People often associate Washington and the rest of the DC area with government activity. Such a fact is not surprising, as the Federal Government remains the largest single employer in the metropolis. Media also plays a huge role in this perception since much of the reports that they do about Washington are usually about government and politics.
In recent years, however, the DC area is reinventing itself. Washington and surrounding communities in Maryland and Virginia are now exerting effort in attracting private businesses to the region. The reason for this is their aim to have a diversified economy that is not completely dependent on government activity for sustenance.
So far, the effort to attract businesses in the DC area has worked. Adding to the already existing list of businesses operating from Washington are enterprises that are engaged in areas such as biotechnology, science and engineering, computers, research and media. In 2006, a business magazine recognized Washington as one of the top ten cities in the United States that are favorable for business expansion.
The demand for office space in the DC area increased tremendously over a significant period of time as businesses start to establish themselves. For example, more businesses are now looking for Dulles VA office space as compared to previous years. Businesses, government and non-government related entities all ask for a piece of office space in Washington and surrounding areas.
Fortunately, real estate developers in the DC area are able to cope up with the increasing demand. The development of Dulles VA office space and others in the DC area resulted in increased profit for real estate developers and salespeople. Aside from developing new office spaces, developers have also engaged in renovations, wherein old dilapidated inner areas of Washington, especially those close to key areas such as the United States Capitol and the White House, are being renewed in order to become great business locations.
With the increased influx of private businesses and demand for the likes of Dulles VA office space, Washington is clearly on its way towards a diversified economy. Sooner or later, Washington will be able to assert itself not just as a center of government activity but also as a hub for businesses. Even the planners of Washington during the 18th century would be proud to see how their city has transitioned into a diverse, multi-functional community.

description.hltext_display: Cortei, si cerca un'intesa per isolare i più violenti
description.content:
ROMA
«Dialogo» e invito ad una «assunzione di responsabilità» da parte degli studenti, specie l'ala più estrema, ma pugno di ferro con i violenti: è questa la linea che le autorità di pubblica sicurezza intendono seguire in vista della temuta manifestazione di Roma di domani. Ad azioni dure da parte dei manifestanti ci sarà una reazione dura da parte delle forze dell'ordine; l'obiettivo è infatti che non si ripetano gli atti di violenza e devastazione che si sono registrati martedì scorso.
La questura di Roma sta cercando una mediazione con i rappresentanti degli studenti sulle possibili iniziative che potrebbero essere messe in atto oggi e soprattutto domani in concomitanza con il voto del ddl Gelmini. Una delle preoccupazioni principali è assicurare il regolare svolgimento dei lavori parlamentari, garantendo l'inaccessibilità ai manifestanti dell'area a ridosso di Palazzo Madama, della Camera e di Palazzo Chigi.
Sarà dunque riproposta una «zona rossa» nel centro di Roma e sarà mobilitato un gran numero di forze di polizia. «Preferisco fare un appello alle responsabilità che criminalizzare, ma dico con chiarezza a tutti: il centro storico di Roma nun se tocca», ha detto il sindaco Gianni Alemanno. «Credo che la cosa migliore adesso sia isolare i violenti».
Assemblee e dibattiti si sono svolti ieri nelle Università italiane. Mobilitazione in Lombardia e Veneto. Gli studenti veneti, tuttavia, non scenderanno a Roma, ma ricercatori e universitari di Ca' Foscari stanno comunque progettando per il domani un'iniziativa simbolica, forse un flash mob.
Intanto si è autodenunciato il giovane che ha colpito un casco uno studente «L'ho fatto per evitare scontri tra la polizia e gli studenti. Per difendere la polizia dagli universitari che lanciavano frutta e puntavano al Senato».
È questo il motivo che ha spinto Manuel De Santis, di 21 anni, ad aggredire con un casco sul volto, Cristiano, di 15 anni, ricoverato dal 14 dicembre scorso all'ospedale San Giovanni di Roma. Manuel lavora in una pizzeria, non ha precedenti, non è uno studente, è di sinistra ma alla manifestazione era presente «come precario». La famiglia De Santis è pronta a risarcire i danni e ad incontrare la famiglia di Cristiano, anche se per ora non c'è stato alcun contatto. Circostanza prematura per il padre di Cristiano, Claudio, avvocato.

description.hltext_display: Morgonens rapporter från Kappahl och MQ reflekterade den tuffa marknaden under hösten.
description.content:
Morgonens rapporter från Kappahl och MQ reflekterade inte oväntat den tuffa marknaden under hösten. Medan Kappahl redovisade en besvikelse mot förväntningarna på 24 procent så visade MQ dock styrka med en lönsamhetsförbättring på 17 procent, trots sämre jämförbar försäljning. Med dåliga förutsättningar för en bra julhandel, och en kommande press från stigande inköpskostnader så väljer vi att fortsätta hålla oss avvaktande till aktierna.
Svagheten var störst hos Kappahl trots bolagets påstådda lägre känslighet i svaga marknader, en myt bolaget själva odlat och som baseras på deras defensiva kundgrupp av medelålders kvinnor inom sjukvård och liknande yrken. Kappahls resultat kom in som en riktig kalldusch jämfört med förväntningarna. Försäljningen i jämförbara butiker backade med 3,1 procent, vilket var sämre än marknadsutvecklingen i Sverige på 2,6 procent. MQ å andra sidan, tappade 1 procent på jämförbara butiker. MQ:s rörelseresultat ökade dock med 8 miljoner till 54 miljoner, vilket motsvarade en marginalexpansion på 1,7 procentenheter till 14,8 procent.
Visserligen kan en fortsatt förbättring av arbetsmarknaden hjälpa bolagen och klädhandeln i stort nästa år. Kappahl fortsätter att förvänta sig 25 nya butiksöppningar det här verksamhetsåret, och MQ öppnade sin andra butik i den för bolaget så viktiga Norgeexpansionen den 9 december.
Samtidigt ligger stigande inköpskostnader i andra vågskålen. Inköpskostnader som inte kommer gå helt smärtfritt att passa vidare på kunderna. Kappahls VD Christian W Jansson kommenterade att bolaget kommer att genomföra blygsamma prishöjningar på ett lågt ensiffrigt tal. Kappahls bruttomarginal tappade 1,5 procentenheter till 63,4, vilket var 0,3 procentenheter svagare än väntat. Som jämförelse höll MQ uppe sin bruttomarginal riktigt bra, ner 0,2 procentenheter jämfört med föregående år, till 64,5 procent. Det berodde på ”effektivare inköpsprocesser och flytt av produktion samt positiva valutaeffekter vilket dock motverkades av fler kampanjaktiviteter än föregående år."
Kappahlaktien är ner nära 30 procent hittills i år. MQ-aktien har återhämtat sig något de senaste veckorna, efter att ha tappat så mycket som 16 procent sedan noteringen i början på sommaren, och är nu back ca 9 procent innan börsens öppning.
Kappahlaktien handlas innan börsens öppning till p/e 11 gånger 2010/2011 och 9 gånger 2011/2012. MQaktien handlas till p/e 9 gånger 2010/2011 och 7,5 gånger 2011/2012 (båda bolagen bryter räkenskapsåret i augusti). Den relativt lägre värderingen i MQ speglar till stor del osäkerheten i bolagets expansion in i Norge, men också en del av deras utmaningar inom damsortimentet.
De senaste dagarnas snökaos lär knappast vara till hjälp för något av bolagen, så nästa kvartalsrapport blir sannolikt ingen munter läsning heller. Visserligen är värderingen inte särskilt utmanande men givet en trolig dålig julförsäljning, svaga redovisade siffror, och en press på bruttomarginalen från stigande inköpskostnader så fortsätter vi att hålla oss avvaktande till att investera i bolagen.

description.hltext_display: Un jamón para el profesor denunciado por un musulmán
description.content:
Empresarios de Trévelez han decidido, a raíz de la polémica suscitada, regalar un jamón de los que se elaboran en dicho municipio al profesor de La Línea que fue denunciado por un alumno musulmán al hablar en clase de este producto tan apreciado. Perplejos como buena parte de la sociedad española ante la denuncia presentada por la familia contra el docente, que consideró ofendía a las creencias del alumno, los productores de jamón intentan localizar al maestro para hacérselo llegar.
Por su parte, el profesor José Reyes, que llegó a mostrar ante diversos medios su hastío por el revuelo organizado y tuvo que prestar declaración ante la Policía, intenta mantenerse en un segundo plano para no avivar la polémica. En cualquier caso, el profesor del IES Menéndez Tolosa insistió en que no hizo en ningún momento apología del consumo de cerdo o de jamón serrano, y consideró que el alumno sufre las consecuencias de una educación 'intolerante y fanatizadora'.
En cualquier caso, el apoyo al profesor José Reyes ha sido masivo, tanto por parte de alumnos y la comunidad docente como en lo que respecta a las autoridades y la clase política tras ser denunciado. Así, incluso el responsable de la Federación Española de Entidades Religiosas Islámicas, Mohamed Hamed, tildó de 'soberana tontería' la denuncia interpuesta contra el maestro, y aclaró que el Corán no prohíbe, en ningún caso, que se hable de productos como el jamón o el vino aunque sí prohíba su ingesta.
Imagen: arteyfotografia.com.ar
Tags: regalo jamón profesor denunciado musulmán jamón profesor instituto La Línea profesor denunciado jamón sociedad

description.hltext_display: 胡兵出席“旷世藏表”鉴赏会 为名表走秀(图)
description.author: www.qq.com
description.content:
胡兵出席第二届“旷世藏表”鉴赏会胡兵台风惊艳全场胡兵领衔演绎名表风采腾讯娱乐讯 近日， 第二届“旷世藏表”鉴赏会在澳门DFS环球免税店隆重开幕。开幕晚会奢华高雅，名流云集，知名艺人胡兵应邀出席，并为名表走秀，领衔演绎名表风采，明星名表相映生辉。
胡兵近年来少有走秀，当晚演绎名表风采，台风惊艳全场。胡兵表示，他的很多朋友和他本人也很喜欢收藏名表，不仅仅因为名表价值斐然，更是因为每只表里都有不同的故事。收藏不同的表，就像是阅历了不同的人生，非常有意义。
胡兵笑说，自己也有收藏一块很珍贵的手表，全球限量版一共30块，自己的是28号。很好奇其他的号码都是谁拥有。

description.hltext_display: WATCH: Tim And Eric : Awesome Show, Great Job! Season 4
description.content:
What: Tim And Eric : Awesome Show, Great Job! Season 4
When: Out now on Madman DVD
Win: Thanks to Madman , we have 1 x set of seasons 1-4 to giveaway! To enter, email us with your postal address and the subject line, "the only married news team in the tri-county area"
Take every awkward moment you've seen on television - scripted or spontaneous - every unattractive actor who can't act, and every tacky outfit, visual effect, or song; intensify that tenfold, and you have the bad taste wonderland that is Tim And Eric : Awesome Show, Great Job!.
Often reaching David Lynch levels of menace and surrealism, T&E is more like video art than sketch comedy. They skewer and subvert a seemingly endless supply of TV cliches: infomercials, bad local news shows, feathered hair, Cosby sweaters , cheesy 3-D graphics, talk shows, celebrity impersonators, music videos, kids programs, local business commercials, and more. This clip from Season 3 here is a good introduction.
T&E have always wrangled awesome guest cameos, and Season 4 features John C. Reilly, Alan Thicke, Zach Galifianakis, Jonah Hill, Flight of the Conchords, Josh Groban, and an episode guest-directed by Tommy Wiseau (of The Room ). Their greatest achievement, IMHO? Making a TV viewing experience that both duplicates for the sober how absurd TV looks when you're stoned, and makes watching 'normal' TV look downright ludicrous afterwards. Well done.

description.hltext_display: Bahrain eyes nuclear power by 2017 - newspaper
description.content:
* Plans to privatise power distribution in long term
MANAMA, Dec 22 - Gulf Arab state Bahrain plans to use nuclear power by 2017 and is considering privatising power distribution, a government minister said in remarks published on Wednesday. The Gulf Cooperation Council -- a loose economic and political alliance of six Gulf Arab states -- said in 2007 it was studying a joint nuclear programme to meet rising power demand.
The United Arab Emirates last year awarded a South Korean consortium a contract to build four nuclear power plants and top oil explorer Saudi Arabia is also exploring nuclear energy. "It will be some time before we can adopt nuclear sources here in Bahrain as experts have to be brought in, designs prepared and facilities built, but our plan is to have it by 2017," Fahmi al-Jawder, minister for electricity and water affairs, was quoted as saying in the Gulf Daily News.
Bahrain is a small producer of oil and gas. A close ally of the United States, it needs to find new sources of energy to meet demand in a growing economy.
It is currently building the 1,200 megawatt Al Dur power and water plant, in which France GDF Suez GSZ.PA holds a 45 percent stake.
Jawder said Bahrain also planned to privatise power distribution in the long term. "We have also privatised power production and there are plans to privatise distribution, but they are not in our immediate agenda," he said. Bahrain is facing rising fiscal deficits, partially due to its subsidies on power, water and fuel.

event_or_fact.property: We have also privatised power production and there are plans to privatise distribution, but they are not in our immediate agenda

description.hltext_display: Napolitano: no alle elezioni la legislatura deve continuare
description.content:
ROMA
«La protesta pacifica, benché spesso sviata da inammissibili violenze, di tanti cittadini nelle strade delle nostre capitali, è una spia di malessere che le democrazie non possono ignorare». Il presidente della Repubblica Giorgio Napolitano, durante la tradizionale cerimonia al Quirinale degli auguri al corpo diplomatico, è voluto intervenire con decisione sulle polemiche a proposito delle manifestazioni di piazza e degli scontri che stanno accompagnando l'approvazione della riforma dell'Università.
E con quel «non possono ignorare» ha invitato apertamente tutti a evitare rigide chiusure e a cercare di comprendere e interpretare le spinte che vengono dal mondo degli studenti e da quello del lavoro precario. Argomento ripreso nel pomeriggio nell'incontro con le alte cariche dello Stato a cominciare dal premier Silvio Berlusconi. «Guai a sottovalutare il malessere dei giovani», ha sottolineato, «è un malessere concreto, per l'incertezza del futuro, per il vacillare delle speranze. È necessario aprire nuovi canali di comunicazione con le nuove generazioni invitando al tempo stesso i giovani che esercitano il loro diritto di riunirsi, manifestare, protestare, a stare in guardia, a tenere fermamente le distanze da gruppi portatori di una nuova intollerabile illegalità e violenza distruttiva».
Parole che rispondono a distanza al capogruppo Pdl Maurizio Gasparri che aveva parlato di arresti preventivi e invitato i genitori a tenere a casa i figli, perché alle manifestazioni ci sono «poteziali assassini».
«Non capisco le manifestazioni degli studenti», dice da parte sua il presidente del Consiglio Silvio Berlusconi, che però plaude alle parole di Napolitano.
Il capo dello Stato ha parlato anche del futuro della legislatura, annunciando che - stando alle sue prerogative - farà di tutto per evitare lo scioglimento anticipato delle Camere. Si tratta, ha detto, di «un'improvvida prassi tutta italiana da cui speravamo di esserci liberati e al cui ripetersi sono tenuto a resistere nell'interesse generale». Per il resto il presidente è tornato sugli appelli alla concordia e alla responsabilità più volte lanciati negli ultimi mesi ricordando i rischi per il Paese causati dal «distacco allarmante tra politica e istituzioni da una parte e forze sociali e culturali dall'altra», dalle «amare cronache della politica» e dalle «risse continue». «Serve un salto di qualità della politica» - ha invocato - «nessuno si sottragga a proprio esercizio di responsabilità».
Nei due discorsi Napolitano si è poi soffermato sulla situazione economica e in particolare a quella dell'euro. E ha dato il suo pieno appoggio alla proposta del ministro Tremonti e del presidente dell'Eurogruppo Junker sugli Eurobond.
Intanto la polemica politica su Gasparri non si placa. È compito della «classe politica» ascoltare «il timore dei giovani per il domani», dice il presidente della Camera Gianfranco Fini. E il presidente del Senato Renato Schifani sottolinea la necessità di una maggiore «comprensione delle tante inquietudini» e insieme una «ferma e coerente condanna verso ogni forma di reazione violenta». Berlusconi, fermo nel suo sostegno alla riforma, glissa sulla proposta di Gasparri: «È un tema che attiene ai ministri responsabili».
Il segretario del Pd Pier Luigi Bersani, attacca: mentre il governo è «sordo a ogni dialogo», dal Pdl vengono idee «irresponsabili» come quella di Gasparri, ma chiede agli studenti di tenersi «lontani dai violenti». Franco Frattini parla di una «battuta», ma Antonio Di Pietro rincara: «L'unico vero potenziale assassino è Gasparri: assassino della democrazia». Dalla Lega il capogruppo Federico Bricolo parla di «tolleranza zero».I NODI POLITICI CRUCIALI. Dopo gli scontri di Roma, il capo dello Stato invita a non sottovalutare i problemi dei giovani

description.hltext_display: Cold winters 'driven by global warming'
description.content: Counter-intuitive but true say scientists: a string of freezing European winters scattered over the last decade has been driven in large part by global warming.

description.hltext_display: Triste aniversario: 13 años en poder de las FARC
description.author: Diariocritico Colombia
description.content:
22-12-2010 - Diariocrítico - EFE (Bogotá)
El sargento del Ejército José Libio Martínez, el militar que más tiempo lleva en poder de las FARC, cumplió 13 años de cautiverio, en medio de los llamamientos por su liberación.
Martínez fue secuestrado por las FARC, en la toma que la guerrilla hizo a la base militar de Patascoy, en el departamento de Nariño, el 21 de diciembre de 1997. En la acción el grupo guerrillero asesinó a 10 militares y secuestró a 18 más, de los cuales 16 fueron liberados después.
El otro rehén de esta cruenta toma fue el cabo del Ejército Pablo Emilio Moncayo, quien fue liberado por decisión unilateral de las FARC el pasado mes de marzo tras más de 12 años cautivo.
Actualmente Martínez, de 34 años y quien ha pasado su juventud en las selvas colombianas, hace parte de una lista de 15 secuestrados que las FARC buscan canjear por medio millar de guerrilleros presos o extraditados a Estados Unidos.
A propósito de que se cumplen trece años del cautiverio de Martínez, el hijo del militar, Johan Steven Martínez, quien no conoce a su padre porque nació cuando ya estaba secuestrado, rogó a la guerrilla que lo deje en libertad pues quiere conocerlo y abrazarlo. Y es que Johan Steven conoce a su padre sólo a través de relatos que le han hecho su madre y otros familiares.
"Mi mamá me ha contado que mi padre es una persona muy fuerte, responsable y activa y me ha dicho que me parezco mucho a él", relata Johan con la elocuencia de un adulto. El pequeño ha acudido a todas las formas posibles para reclamar la liberación de su padre, incluso hizo una larga caminata de 100 kilómetros, entre Ospina y Pasto, capital de Nariño.
Entre tanto, la Asociación Colombiana de Familiares de Miembros de la Fuerza Pública Retenidos y Liberados por Grupos Guerrilleros (Asfamipaz) reclamó en su tradicional plantón de los martes en el centro de Bogotá la liberación de todos los secuestrados.
Marleny Orjuela, presidenta de la organización, señaló que "este triste aniversario" les permite seguir reclamando ante el Gobierno no "sólo la liberación de Libio, sino de todos los secuestrados". "Insistimos en que aparte de las liberaciones unilaterales, como las anuncias por las FARC, se necesaria una salida política para el tema de los secuestrados", señaló Orjuela.
Así mismo, recordó que otros militares y policías están a punto de cumplir 12 años "pudriéndose en la selvas de Colombia" sin solución alguna, al condenar "cualquier intento de rescate por parte del Gobierno colombiano, pues la vida de los rehenes corre peligro".
Orjuela se mostró confiada en que pese a lo que ella llamó "oscuro panorama sobre el tema del canje", el reciente anuncio de las FARC sobre la liberación unilateral de cinco secuestrados y la gestión de la ex senadora Piedad Córdoba sean "una puerta que se abre para lograr una solución definitiva al drama de los rehenes".

description.hltext_display: Parents kill son, wife
Padoa-Schioppa, oggi l'addio all'economista
description.content:
Tommaso Padoa-Schioppa ROMA
L'economista Tommaso Padoa Schioppa, scomparso sabato per infarto all'età di 70 anni, sarà tumulato a Canepa, frazione di Sori (Genova), dove nacque la madre Stella. Il funerale si svolgerà invece oggi a Roma, alla chiesa di Santa Maria degli Angeli, alle 11.
La camera ardente, aperta ieri alle 14.30 nella sede romana dell'Unione europea, ha visto un sussesuirsi di personalità della politica e dell'economia, a fare l'ultima visita all'economista, ex ministro del Tesoro nel governo Prodi.
Dopo la famiglia, sono giunti il governatore della Banca d'Italia, Mario Draghi, e il presidente emerito della Repubblica ed ex governatore di Palazzo Koch, Carlo Azeglio Ciampi. Con loro anche il direttore generale di Via Nazionale, Fabrizio Saccomanni. E Lorenzo Bini-Smaghi, membro del board esecutivo della Bce, Guglielmo Epifani, ex segretario generale della Cgil e Luigi Abete, presidente della Bnl. È arrivato anche Giorgio Napolitano: «È stata una grande figura, protagonista della scelta e dell'adozione dell'Euro», ha detto. Il Senato gli ha dedicato un minuto di silenzio.

description.hltext_display: 汉语口语水平举行首场测试
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
本报讯 近日，本市首场汉语口语水平测试在北京联合大学举行。来自韩国、秘鲁、俄罗斯、利比里亚等12个国家、地区的32名留学生参加了此次测试。
“汉语口语水平测试”（HKC）是教育部、国家语委为构建中国全方位、立体化的汉语言文字水平测试体系，满足国际汉语学习交流的需要而设立的。HKC项目是针对母语非汉语人群、华人华裔实施的一项语言类标准化水平测试，为母语非汉语人群、华人华裔提供了学习汉语口语的新途径，为评价和检验他们的汉语口语水平提供了客观的测试标准。HKC采用计算机测试，完全在人机对话环境中进行。

description.hltext_display: FIVE LIVE: What To Do This Weekend (12/22/10)
description.content:
nd, 2010
Last updated Tue, Dec 21st, 2010
Stuffed on turkey and ham? Why not come out for some Fattburger?
Courtesy photo
Great local tributes to Daft Punk, Rolling Stones and Johnny Cash. Perfect shows if you’re “cashed out” from all the presents. And an interesting father/son comedy show.
December 22: A.J. Croce and friends
Where: Lestat’s/Normal Heights
Tickets: $15
Lestat’s has quietly become the venue for lots of local talent. That can be poetry readings, comedy, and lots of local music. Ingrid and Jim Croce’s son A.J. has been tearing up the local music scene forever. Just like his papa, he’s a great singer/songwriter. He can blend rock, with blues, jazz, and old time classics. Nothing better than when he’s bangin’ out the boogie woogie on piano. A.J. has played all the late night shows, some of the national morning shows – and in 2005, he was the only artist to have a song (“Don’t Let Me Down”) on the Top 40 charts from an independent label. Rolling Stone once named him one of the country's best young songwriters, and now at almost 40 – he’s certainly one of the most underrated. His self-titled debut album, a Top Ten on the jazz charts in 1993, is still my favorite. I saw him at Ceasar’s in Las Vegas in support of that album and it was a great show. Which way Steinway? Take any of the freeways to Adams Avenue to head to this show.
December 23: Cash’d Out Christmas/Hell on Heels
Where: Belly Up Tavern
Tickets: $15
The Mar Dels Christmas Show is at 5:30 p.m., with no cover. Later in the evening, it’s River City – an energetic six-piece rockin’ folk band. You’ll get a nice dose of mandolin, banjo, and fiddle with your guitar, bass, and drums. Hell on Heels is a burlesque show with lots of women that’ll have everyones tassels twirlin’. Cash’d Out is the only tribute band endorsed by the official Johnny Cash website. I’ve seen them almost 10 times, and always hear something different. You’ll get the early stuff, duets with June Carter, and all the hits you know and love – Walk the Line, Ring of Fire, Cocaine Blues, A Boy Named Sue, and many more. And if you dig the tribute band thing, and also like laser shows with your rock (what happened to the Space Theater having those?), Daft Punk’d will be doing there thing at the Belly Up on Sunday. (more info: 858-481-8140)
December 24/25: Sammy & Pauly Shore
Where: The Comedy Store/La Jolla
Tickets: $20
Everyone knows Pauly Shore from his many movies, and the show he hosted on MTV. A lot of people know his mom Mitzi owns the Comedy Stores (the first one opened in 1972). Dad Sammy Shore is a legendary comedian that opened for Elvis between 1969 and ’72. When he played a show for President Ford, the President was quoted as saying “Bob Hope was great, but Sammy Shore stole the show.” He’s been in a handful of movies (a few Mel Brooks pictures). And now is your chance to see them both together. A weird way to spend Christmas, unless you don’t celebrate Christmas. (more info: 858-454-9176)
December 24: Exile on Kettner Blvd.
Where: Casbah
Tickets: Free
I’ve been to this show a few times over the year. It happens every Christmas Eve, spearheaded by The Dragons singer Mario Escovedo (yes, from the famous musical Escovedo family). The stage ends up being filled by so many local musicians, and it’s better than any holiday party you can picture. It’s a tribute to The Rolling Stones (Exile on Main Street is how the show got its name). And there’s not a better way to ring in the New Year early. (more info: 888-512-7469)
December 26: Fattburger
Where: Humphrey’s Backstage Live/Shelter Island
Tickets: $15
Jose Serrano plays some smooth jazz during the brunch (no cover). At night, local jazz legends Fattburger take the stage. They won’t have the late Hollis Gentry, and they’ll have new keyboardist Allan Phillips. Their jazz-funk-fusion thang has been making music fans happy for years. And when they reunited for some shows in 2009, a whole new generation of fans got to enjoy them. It’s Good News they have another show, that’ll be a Sizzlin’ night for all you folks Livin’ in Paradise. Don’t skip this show because you have Work to Do the next day; TGI Fattburger isn’t playing on Friday, but Sunday. Go to church, watch football, and see a One of a Kind band.(more info: 619-224-3577)

event_or_fact.property: ?Bob Hope was great, but Sammy Shore stole the show.? He?s been in a handful of movies (a few Mel Brooks pictures)

description.hltext_display: Kirk Communications Enters into Agreement with ConVerge Diagnostic...
description.content:
Kirk Communications (http://www.kirkcommunications.com), has entered into an agreement with ConVerge Diagnostic Services™ of Peabody, MA, a regional diagnostic lab services company operating in New England. In addition to performing market research, Kirk will create a new optimized website for the company, which offers state-of-the-art lab services in Massachusetts, New Hampshire, Maine and Vermont. ConVergeDx is known for offering personal service, lower costs and a number of exclusive lab tests, most notably in ob-gyn. Unlike many large national lab chains, ConVergeDx performs all of their services locally in New England and offers high levels of personal attention to
healthcare providers and their patients.
"We think we're better in almost every way than expensive hospital labs and the national lab companies," said Bob Gorman, CEO of ConVergeDx. "With more and more patients being required to pay for part or all of their labs, we need to get the word out that, in most cases, they'll pay a lot less with us," Gorman said. "We chose Kirk because of their vast experience in healthcare and the work they currently do for the kind of clients we already serve, particularly in the area of ob-gyn," he said. "They also have the kind of expertise we're looking for in advertising, PR and website optimization--all of which will help doctors and their patients know what we're all about."
"It's always good to have a client with something that differentiates them in their market category, said Nate Tennant. "ConVergeDx is obviously that kind of client. We're thrilled to be partnering with them."
About Kirk Communications
With offices in Portsmouth, N.H. and New Delhi, India, Kirk Communications is a global provider of integrated marketing solutions that include public relations, graphic design and interactive services including advanced 2D and 3D animation, website development and e-marketing.
About ConVergeDx
ConVerge Diagnostic Services combines the broad knowledge and experience of leading pathologists and scientists to provide their clients with a full array of laboratory solutions. Healthcare professionals rely on ConVergeDx for advanced laboratory testing options supported by attentive, local customer service.

description.hltext_display: SHOP: Noise Pollution Records
description.content:
What: Noise Pollution Records
Where: 280 William St, Northbridge
When: Now! Open Mon-Sat 10am-6pm, Sun 12pm-4pm
How much: Vinyls $30+
Noise Pollution's Maurice is the kind of record owner you gotta take seriously. Owner of William St's latest piece of High Fidelity real estate, Maurice is the kind of guy you'd briefly say hi to at the pub, only to find yourself falling out the door six hours later, after being plied with booze and stories of the good old days of rock.
Ask him about the genre of album covers called 'Sexy Bachelor Cheescake Pop Art', and you'll be directed to a 'behind the counter' collection full of albums united by the buxom blonde pin-ups on their covers. There's Maurice's favourite album cover (The Who's Magic Bus on Tour ), or he'll happily tell you about when Molly Meldrum showed the latest Birthday Party album Junk Yard on Countdown .
Noise Pollution is the record store that William St (and the vinyl-adoring collectors in all of us) have been waiting for. Head in for a chat to our man Maurice, and get your mits on some of his sexy cheesecake vinyl.

description.hltext_display: Jail inmates' allegations incorrect: Tihar chief
"Avvakta i KappAhl och MQ"
description.content:
Morgonens rapporter från Kappahl och MQ reflekterade inte oväntat den tuffa marknaden under hösten. Medan Kappahl redovisade en besvikelse mot förväntningarna på 24 procent så visade MQ dock styrka med en lönsamhetsförbättring på 17 procent, trots sämre jämförbar försäljning. Med dåliga förutsättningar för en bra julhandel, och en kommande press från stigande inköpskostnader så väljer vi att fortsätta hålla oss avvaktande till aktierna.
Svagheten var störst hos Kappahl trots bolagets påstådda lägre känslighet i svaga marknader, en myt bolaget själva odlat och som baseras på deras defensiva kundgrupp av medelålders kvinnor inom sjukvård och liknande yrken. Kappahls resultat kom in som en riktig kalldusch jämfört med förväntningarna. Försäljningen i jämförbara butiker backade med 3,1 procent, vilket var sämre än marknadsutvecklingen i Sverige på 2,6 procent. MQ å andra sidan, tappade 1 procent på jämförbara butiker. MQ:s rörelseresultat ökade dock med 8 miljoner till 54 miljoner, vilket motsvarade en marginalexpansion på 1,7 procentenheter till 14,8 procent.
Visserligen kan en fortsatt förbättring av arbetsmarknaden hjälpa bolagen och klädhandeln i stort nästa år. Kappahl fortsätter att förvänta sig 25 nya butiksöppningar det här verksamhetsåret, och MQ öppnade sin andra butik i den för bolaget så viktiga Norgeexpansionen den 9 december.
Samtidigt ligger stigande inköpskostnader i andra vågskålen. Inköpskostnader som inte kommer gå helt smärtfritt att passa vidare på kunderna. Kappahls VD Christian W Jansson kommenterade att bolaget kommer att genomföra blygsamma prishöjningar på ett lågt ensiffrigt tal. Kappahls bruttomarginal tappade 1,5 procentenheter till 63,4, vilket var 0,3 procentenheter svagare än väntat. Som jämförelse höll MQ uppe sin bruttomarginal riktigt bra, ner 0,2 procentenheter jämfört med föregående år, till 64,5 procent. Det berodde på ”effektivare inköpsprocesser och flytt av produktion samt positiva valutaeffekter vilket dock motverkades av fler kampanjaktiviteter än föregående år."
Kappahlaktien är ner nära 30 procent hittills i år. MQ-aktien har återhämtat sig något de senaste veckorna, efter att ha tappat så mycket som 16 procent sedan noteringen i början på sommaren, och är nu back ca 9 procent innan börsens öppning.
Kappahlaktien handlas innan börsens öppning till p/e 11 gånger 2010/2011 och 9 gånger 2011/2012. MQaktien handlas till p/e 9 gånger 2010/2011 och 7,5 gånger 2011/2012 (båda bolagen bryter räkenskapsåret i augusti). Den relativt lägre värderingen i MQ speglar till stor del osäkerheten i bolagets expansion in i Norge, men också en del av deras utmaningar inom damsortimentet.
De senaste dagarnas snökaos lär knappast vara till hjälp för något av bolagen, så nästa kvartalsrapport blir sannolikt ingen munter läsning heller. Visserligen är värderingen inte särskilt utmanande men givet en trolig dålig julförsäljning, svaga redovisade siffror, och en press på bruttomarginalen från stigande inköpskostnader så fortsätter vi att hålla oss avvaktande till att investera i bolagen.

description.hltext_display: El Congreso vota la polémica Ley Sinde
description.content:
La Ley Sinde se enfrenta hoy a su aprobación en el Congreso de los Diputados rodeada, como desde que se formularan sus bases, de una amplia polémica y con más problemas de los inicialmente previstos para sacarla adelante. Así, el PNV, el único aliado con que contaba el PSOE para lograr aprobarla en el Congreso, ha anunciado que no votará a su favor, de acuerdo con Josu Erkoreka, por cuestiones relacionadas tanto con el fondo como con la forma de la Ley Sinde, cuyo punto más polémico es que permite el bloqueo de webs que faciliten la descarga de contenidos protegidos.
Por otra parte, la oposición a la Ley Sinde va en aumento tanto a nivel de Internet como en la propia calle. Después de poner en marcha iniciativas de todo tipo para protestar contra su aprobación, que el Gobierno quería posibilitar a través del procedimiento de urgencia el próximo 31 de diciembre, internautas procedían hoy al bloqueo de la web del Congreso de los Diputados. Mientras, el PSOE pasaba al contraataque mostrando, en la suya, un único contenido: sus argumentos para aprobar esta ley que, según diversos sectores, ataca frontalmente a nuestras libertades más básicas.
De este modo, la única manera que el PSOE tendría de aprobar la Ley Sinde sería con el apoyo de CIU, que propone la enmienda a la totalidad de esta norma que se enmarca en la Ley de Economía Sostenible ideada por el Gobierno de Zapatero. Después de que anoche no fructificaran las conversaciones entre miembros de CIU y PSOE, y con el anuncio de que el PP votará en contra, habrá que ver cómo se desarrolla la jornada en el hemiciclo y si, finalmente, la Ley Sinde pasa a ser una realidad.
Tags: votación Ley Sinde Congreso Ley Sinde Congreso Ley Sinde sociedad

description.hltext_display: Hearing postponed for siblings accused of Rose Bowl violence
description.content:
PASADENA - A preliminary hearing scheduled for three siblings accused of violence in a Rose Bowl brawl before a USC-UCLA football game earlier this month was continued Tuesday until Jan. 25.
A Los Angeles County Superior Court Judge agreed to continue the case until next month after a request was filed by one of the defendants' attorneys.
Prosecutors charged Anthony Richard Cisneros on Dec. 9 with one count of attempted, willful, deliberate and pre-meditated murder and another count of attempted murder for allegedly assaulting two men with a knife.
Vimal Patel, 24, of Pasadena suffered eight stab wounds in the back. A second alleged victim, Joshua Dirling, 27, of Simi Valley, suffered a stab wound in the face, prosecutors have said.
Cisneros' siblings, Arthur Joseph Cisneros, 25, and Akira Sheree Cisneros, 24, were charged with one count each of assault by means likely to produce great bodily injury.
While Anthony Cisneros was still in custody Tuesday, Arthur and Akira were no longer in custody and were sitting in the audience with supporters before the judge's decision.
Bail was set on Dec. 9 for Anthony Cisneros at $2.06 million while bail had been set for Arthur and Akira Cisneros at $30,000 each.

description.hltext_display: Farmer alleges inaction by district collector in land case
description.content:
A farmer has accused revenue officials of wrongly registering some persons as owners of a 50-acre land near Lonavla in contravention of court orders and alleged that the district collector, Chandrakant Dalvi, had not conducted any inquiry into the matter despite an order by the state information commissioner, Vijay Kuvalekar, about four months ago.
The issue is related to land in Sadapur village, 4 km from Lonavla. The estimated market price of the land is around Rs20 crore. A farmer, Nathu Sakharam Gaikwad, from Kambarenama village, 22 km from Lonavla, has been
pursuing the matter.
Gaikwad told DNA on Tuesday that after court orders in a bogus sale deed case during 1980s, names of six villagers were restored in revenue records in 1988. However, in 1989, the revenue officials wrongly entered the names of SS Gokhale, NS Biradi and SK Anand in the revenue records of the land.
Gaikwad said that he had sought details on entry of names in revenue records under the Right to Information (RTI) Act, 2005, but did not receive any information in the matter. He ultimately had to file an application with the state information commission (SIC), Pune bench.
Kuvalekar passed an order on July 24 asking the district collector to initiate a thorough investigation into the entry of wrong names in revenue record and submit a report to the SIC by August 30. He had also asked the district collector to provide the applicant with all details regarding the change in names of land holders, which were earlier entered as per the Supreme Courts (SC) order. He had also asked the district collector to inform the applicant in writing if no documentary evidence in the case was available. Gaikwad said that he had not received any information on the matter from the district collector.
Kuvalekar had also asked the district collector to file a criminal complaint against the revenue officials, who were responsible for the loss of documents on the basis of which the names of Gokhale and others were entered in the
revenue records.

event_or_fact.property: he had not received any information on the matter from the district collector.
after court orders in a bogus sale deed case during 1980s, names of six villagers were restored in revenue records in 1988.
he had sought details on entry of names in revenue records under the Right to Information (RTI) Act, 2005, but did not receive any information in the matter.

description.hltext_display: Washington, DC: The Natural Venue of Choice for Event Organizers
description.content:
As the nation's capital, Washington, DC serves as home to all three branches of the Federal Government the Executive Branch, the Legislative Branch and the Judiciary, and all activities related to them. It is also the home to some foreign institutions such as the World Bank and the International Monetary Fund. Washington and its suburbs are now slowly but surely becoming a hub of commerce and industry.
Being right at the steps to the corridors of power, Washington is the natural choice for event organizers. Such access gives organizers the privilege to guest some of the most powerful people in the world to grace their events. Of course, national and international attention can be generated easily by well-publicized events that select the DC area as their venue.
As a city that hosts conventions, meetings and other similar events, Washington boasts of having some of the best known event centers in the United States. They can range from full-pledged stadiums and sports centers that can host athletic events to convention halls that can accommodate good-sized crowds. For simple business meetings, conference rooms and other meeting spaces are available throughout the DC area.
The meeting rooms Washington DC has are very accessible to public transportation, which links them to various points in the city and to the DC area airports- Reagan National, Dulles International and Baltimore-Washington International. DC area's main rapid transport system, the Washington Metro, can be accessed from any one of those venues. They are also accessible via the Metrobus bus service and taxi fleets.
As the most preferred venue for conventions, meetings and other similar events, the meeting rooms Washington DC has are very much sought after. Bookings have to be made in advance in order to assure that the venue of choice within the city will be available on the day of the event itself.
Washington, DC, the nation's capital, is truly the Convention City. The meeting rooms Washington DC has are among the best maintained and most sought after in the country. When one decides to hold an event, Washington and the rest of the DC area are one of the most ideal choices.

description.hltext_display: Estado se raja en atención a desplazados
description.author: Diariocritico Colombia
description.content:
22-12-2010 - Diariocrítico - Semana (Bogotá)
Un informe del Gobierno de Uribe, que manifiesta la presunta efectividad del Estado frente a la atención de la población desplazada, fue duramente controvertido por la Corte Constitucional, que asegura que esto no es verdad, y que aún el Gobierno cuenta con serias falencias y vacíos a la hora de atender y hacer valer los derechos de la población desplazada en algunas zonas del país.
El Alto reiteró que “persiste el estado de cosas inconstitucional” para la población víctima de desplazamiento forzado, y recordó que ya en 2004 le había señalado al Ejecutivo cuáles eran las falencias que lo impedían, le había impartido órdenes concretas y le habían fijado parámetros específicos, con el fin de que la población desplazada lograra el goce efectivo de sus derechos.
De esta forma, la Corte envió un mensaje duro: insistió que El Estado no ha podido garantizar los derechos de un grueso de la población (en algunos registros equivale casi al 10 por ciento). Estos autos obligan a quienes diseñan las políticas a favor de las víctimas a tomar en cuenta sus argumentos. De lo contrario, leyes que no interpreten correctamente los argumentos de la Corte podrían ser declaradas inconstitucionales.
Aunque no le menciona explícitamente, los autos también lanzan una advertencia: la Corte no está dispuesta a ceder en el argumento de que el Estado es quien debe garantizar los derechos de la gente, independientemente de los recursos con los que cuenta. Esto en un momento en el que el Gobierno promueve una ley de “sostenibilidad fiscal” que, en criterio de los constitucionalistas, lo que busca es supeditar los derechos de la ciudadanía al presupuesto.

description.hltext_display: 嫦娥二号从容应对月食
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
本报讯（记者蔡文清 通讯员姜宁）昨天14时50分，正在绕月飞行的嫦娥二号卫星遭遇月食，北京航天飞控中心根据事先的计划，有条不紊地对卫星实施了控制，3小时后卫星走出阴影区，安然度过月食考验。
北京航天飞控中心副总工程师周建亮介绍，月食期间嫦娥二号卫星面临三大考验:一是仅靠蓄电池长时间运行；二是卫星直接面对太空零下200℃的低温；三是受地球自转、月食发生时刻影响，国内测控站不能全程跟踪和控制卫星。
面对诸多挑战，北京航天飞控中心于11月30日开始对卫星进行相位调整，即通过调整轨道，每圈改变它的轨道周期约10秒钟，经过20多天的累积，使月食发生时卫星处于阴影区的时长最短。逐步关闭卫星上的CCD相机等“非必需”设备，就像进入“冬眠”状态，只保证大脑和心脏运行。卫星走出月食环境便会逐步打开，恢复各项设备运行。调整卫星姿态，使太阳帆板一直对着太阳，确保在进入月食之前蓄电池保持充满状态。此外由于嫦娥二号卫星进入月食阴影前6小时处于国内测控站跟踪范围之外，为填补这期间的测控空白，通过国际合作，由欧洲空间局测控站为嫦娥二号卫星提供测控支持，保证了卫星在月食前后均能获得有效的监测，确保了卫星安全度过月食。
【免责声明】本文仅代表作者本人观点，与和讯网无关。和讯网站对文中陈述、观点判断保持中立，不对所包含内容的准确性、可靠性或完整性提供任何明示或暗示的保证。请读者仅作参考，并请自行承担全部责任。

description.hltext_display: I 75 di Veltroni: «Alleanza solo con il Terzo polo»
description.content:
Nel centrosinistra continua il dibattito sull'efficacia delle primarie e sulle future alleanze.
Dopo lo scontro di vedute tra D'Alema e Vendola, che insiste sulle primarie del Pd, i 75 parlamentari della minoranza Modem, riuniti ieri sera da Veltroni, Fioroni e Gentiloni, hanno hanno fatto il punto della situazione, in vista della Direzione del partito convocata da Pier Luigi Bersani per giovedì. Fioroni ha rotto gli indugi sposando l'alleanza «solo» con il Terzo polo: «Il partito deve fare scelte chiare di programma per il Paese, e l'allenaza con Casini e il suo Polo può essere credibile, ma sono perfettamente consapevole che per fare questo il Pd dovrà dire dei no pesanti ad altre alleanze, perciò il nuovo Prodi dovrà essere scelto con coraggio». I veltroniani restano però fedeli alle indicazioni di sempre: prima il progetto, solo poi le alleanze, e su questo chiedono una parola chiara dal segretario Bersani.
Intanto, nel caso di voto anticipato, si inizia anche a ragionare sul candidato che possa battere la destra e sia rappresentativo di una coalizione riformista. Secondo l'ex ministro Livia Turco, però, si devono utilizzare le primarie che sono «nel dna del Pd». Il senatore Vincenzo Vita ha cercato di spiegare che se da un lato «le primarie sono l'unico metodo democratico per scegliere i candidati», dall'altro «dischiudono più facilmente il rapporto con la sinistra e i mondi estranei alla politica». Secondo Giorgio Merlo, vicepresidente Commissione Vigilanza Rai, le primarie sarebbero «una cortesia alle ambizioni personali Vendola e per stringere un'alleanza con il giustizialismo di Di Pietro». «Non si può respingere Vendola come fosse un untore», ha risposto Gavino Angius. E per l'Idv «se il Pd farà un'alleanza con il Terzo polo perderà ancora». Pure Claudio Fava, del coordinamento di Sel, ha avvertito: «Inseguire Fini, escludere la primarie, vagheggiare alleanze con alleati indisponibili: il Pd sta preparando la sua sconfitta».

description.hltext_display: Playing Honma 904 Iron Set Is Wise!
description.content:
Many of us hate the crosswind, especially left to right with our slice lurking. Instead of trying to compensate by trying to draw the ball to hold into a left to right wind or cut into into a right the lefter (leave it to the pros), go with thew flow and play along with it. Take plenty of club and allow the wind to blow your ball back on line.
The Honma 904 Irons provide the workability of a blade and forgiveness of a cavityback iron. The 904 is a precision cast-forged design to provide outstanding feel,with blade-like featured.The 904's perimeter weighting delivers a higher moment of impact than a muscleback iron,but providing greater for giveness for improved results on off-center hits.
To be honestly, I bought the iron set 3 years ago moved up from Tommy Armour V series, proir Iron set Wilson Staff RM. This was my first set of irons with graphite shafts. I am able to work the ball left to right. I found I am able to hit he ball 8-10 yards further with the graphite shaft. Irons are accurate, dead on when well struck. Would I buy a new set , not likely unless I won the lottery.
The only disadvantage of the 904 Irons for me as purist is the look from the six iron down to the wedge, as they all show a little bit of offset, which the blades i owned before the ping did not have. But the way the mass sits behind the sweet spot and gives you tremendous feel and power when you strike the ball although you have a forgiving perimeter weighted club in your hand makes up for that easily. And besides that they don't collect dings as fast as other forged clubs as the process of casting and then forging seems to make them extremly dense and therefore solid. i will never need another club and i hope they will always stay on the market.

description.hltext_display: Adalta Real swings into profit
description.content:
Adalta Real posts total comprehensive income attributable to shareholders of �15,640 for the six months to the end of September.
This compares with a loss of �111.993 in the corresponding period last year which was prior to the sale of the company's then operating subsidiary.
The balance of shareholders' funds at 30 September was �580,119, which represents a similar result to the end of March.
Adalta Real said: "The board believes the maintenance of a healthy balance sheet is fundamental to the sustainability of the company in the turbulent times of the after effects of a such a severe recession in the UK."

description.hltext_display: STRAY: Boxing Day sales worth going to
description.content:
What: Boxing Day sales worth going to
Where: Zekka , 74 King St, Perth, Dilettante , 1/90 King St (men's) 575 Wellington St (women's), Perth
When: Zekka - Sun Dec 26, 10am - 5pm (also open Mon Dec 27 + Tue Dec 28) Dilettante - Sun Dec 26, 1pm - 5pm
How much: Up to 50% off
Every retailer under the sun will be hawking their wares for peanuts come Boxing Day, but doing the sale thing doesn't have to mean running through Myer's double doors with a bunch of middle aged women at 8am in the morning while being filmed for the 6 o'clock news. We are smarter than those people, so we only visit shops whose discounts are really worth knocking back a post-hangover Powerade for.
Dilettante are down with awesome labels all year long, but they down their awesomely high price tags but once a year. Money off the likes of A.F. Vandevorst , Dion Lee , Gareth Pugh , One Fell Swoop and Peachoo + Krejberg sounds OK by us.
It's been a big year for Zekka too, who launched a new womens' shop, whilst ensuring they kept their socks pulled up with the cafe. The sale is at King St, but covers both the laydees and the dudes, including Damir Doma , Devoa , Lumen et Umbra , Ann Demeulemeester , Julius and more. Romina from Zekka assures us "there will be PLENTY of bargains" (all wrapped in tonne gramme's tailor-designed wrapping paper ).
If you've got no pennies to spare, tell your ballin' mates, and together we can make sure these great stores do enough business to keep staying great.

El municipio de Gramalote, en el Norte de Santander, literalmente desapareció, la causa: una falla geológica que a través del tiempo, literalmente se ha ido tragando las viviendas del que hoy es un pueblo fantasma.
